49005019	Kixyolwaq chiwach ruk' Salmos, xoq'je' kixyolwaq chiwach ruk' b'ixnik chir kuya' Loq'laj Usantil chiw, chib'ixaj xoq'je' chiya' unimal uq'i'j Qajwal Dios piwanme'.
49005020	Kub'lek chityoxij iwenejel che Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw che nejel, pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo.
49005021	Chiya' iwib' ptaqek chiwach, chpam jn nab'alib' rech Qajwal Dios.
49005022	Ix k'le'naqtaq ixiqib', chiya' iwib' ptaqek che iwichijil chpa' unimxik Qajwal Jesucristo ki'no.
49005023	Mpa' uwi' jn xaq re' richijil, jla' chpa' Cristo Re' kiwi' ch'ob' che ajkojnel, ruk'ut oj ajkojnel, oj ukuerp Cristo, ruk'ut Cristo Re' ajsolel qech.
49005024	Jla' chpa' ch'ob' che ajkojnel kiyo'om kib' chixe' uq'atb'altzij Cristo, jla' xoq'je' k'le'naqtaq ixiqib' kiya' kib' chixe' uq'atb'altzij kichijil che nejel.
49005025	Chijab' chiloq'oj iwixiqil jla' chpa' Cristo xoj uloq'oj ch'ob' che ajkojnel chirij Re', qamalk'ut oj xujach rib' pe kamikal.
49005026	Rechwa' kub'an tyox che kik'aslemal ajkojnel, xoq'je' kub'an ch'aj che kikaslemal ruk' ja' rimal uyoloj.
49005027	Rechwa' kuya' chwach Re' putike'lam, jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chirij Qajwal Jesús, chir kpoqpetek, k'ot tz'il chirij, xoq'je' yuch'ta, xa'ne' tyoxchik xoq'je' k'ot k'amb'exwa' chpam tzij.
49005028	Jla'k'ut chib'ana' iwenejel ix chijab', chiloq'oj iwixiqil, jla' chpa' uloq'xik ityo'jil ki'no, naq kuloq'oj rixiqil, rib' re' kuloq'oj.
49005029	Mpa' k'ot jnaq chir kritzlaj utyo'jil, xa'ne' kutzuquj, xoq'je' kuloq'oj, xoq'je' jla' kub'an Cristo chke ch'ob' che ajkojnel.
49005030	Mpa' oj, oj utyo'jil, xoq'je' oj ub'aqil ukuerp Cristo.
49005031	Rechi' chir, naq chij re'chir k'le'k rajwixik kuya' knaq uchuch uqaw, kujunuj rib' ruk' rixiqil, che ikyeb' (2) kib'an xa' jun che tyo'jil.
49005032	Nim ub'antejik jn owam rajwerem Qajwal Dios, pumul en, jri' kimb'ij, mpa' je kinch'a'w chirij Cristo ch'il chirij jun ch'ob' ajkojnel.
49005033	Rechi' chir ix ptaq ijujnal chiloq'oj iwixiqil chpa' uloq'xik iwib' ki'no, xoq'je' ix ixiqi'b' chimeja' iwib' chikiwach iwichijil.
49006001	Ix alk'wa'lxel chiya' iwib' ptaqek chke ichuch iqaw pub'i' Qaqjaw, mpa' re' la' jn suk'laj k'aslemal.
49006002	Nim chiya'wa ichuch iqaw, mpa' re' la' jn nab'e taqnik chir xuya' Qajwal Dios, chir uk'omomlaq jn jitenem.
49006003	Rechwa' karaq jn utzil, xoq'je' karaq jn nimlaj k'aslemal chwach lew.
49006004	Ruk'ut ix chuch qajaw, xa' miyak kiywal iwilk'wa'l, xa'ne' chik'iysaj ruk' jn utzlaj suk'b'anik, ch'il jn suk'laj yaj rech Qajwal Dios.
49006005	Ruk'ut ix jaqlel ajnimnel chiya' iwib' ptaqek kuk' iwajaw wural chwach lew, ruk' nab'alib', xoq'je' nim chiya'wa, ruk' jn ch'iti'nlaj anme', jla' chpa' unimxik Cristo ki'no.
49006006	Utz ichak chib'ana', xo'wta re'chir kix il kimal iwajaw, chpa' ni'j chir i'ajb'anel woch, xa'ne' mpa' ix, ix jaqlel ajnimnel rech Cristo, ruk' nejel iwanme' kib'an rajwerem Qajwal Dios.
49006007	Chinimaj iwajaw ruk' nejel uk'uxlal chpa' unimxik Qajwal Jesús, chir jla'ta chpa' kinimxik wnaq.
49006008	T'amt'elek chir jnik'pla' utzil kub'an jnaq, jla' xoq'je' kya'na che rimal Qajwal Jesús, tne' che nimnek jaqlel ajnimnel, aj tzqaptel lewa'.
49006009	Xoq'je' ix, rajaw chak, janam chib'ana' kuk' jaqlel ajnimnel iwach, chiya' knaq jn yaj ruk' xib'nek, iwet'am k'ut chir iwajaw ix xoq'je' Re' kijaw ire', re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir k'o pkaj, chwach Re', xa' janam qab'anik.
49006010	Uk'isb'al tzij kimb'ij chiw ix wixlal, chikowersaj ik'aslemal ruk' loq'laj ukownem Qaqjaw.
49006011	Chib'ana' chpa' kub'an jn ajxolta't, chir kuto' rib' chwach rajch'oj. Chikojo' k'iy uwach che chakamb'al chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios chiw, rechwa' kito' iwib', xoq'je' xa' jun kixwab'wa' chwach jn tzel.
49006012	Mpa' kuk't wnaq chir k'o kityo'jil xoq'je' k'o kikik'el qajch'ojenwa', xa'ne' qajch'ojen kuk' tzeltaq santil chir k'o q'atb'altzij pe kiq'ab', xoq'je' kuk' tzeltaq santil chir k'o nimaqtaq choq'ab' pe kiq'ab', xoq'je' kuk' tzeltaq santil chir kitaqen chpam qu'mal, xoq'je' kuk' tzeltaq santil chir ik'o pkaj.
49006013	Rechi' kimb'ij chiw, chikojo' nejel to'b'al iwib' chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios chiw, rechwa' kich'ijo re'chir kpe jn k'axlaj q'ij chiwij, wa xb'antaj nejel, xa' jun kixwab'aqwa'.
49006014	Jn ajxolta't re'chir k'e pe ch'oj kow kuxim uxe' upam, jla'k'ut ix re'chir kixch'ojen ruk' jn tzel, kow chixima' uxe' ipam ruk' jn saqlaj tzij, xoq'je' jn ajxolta't kukoj jn k'o'x ch'ich' rech to'b'al uwach uk'u'x, xoq'je' ix, re'chir kixch'ojen ruk' jn tzel, chito' uwach ik'u'x ruk' jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij.
49006015	Jn ajxolta't kukoj utzlajtaq xajab' chirqan, re'chir k'e pch'oj, xoq'je' ix chikojo' che ixajab' jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo, chir kuya' jn loq'laj uxumb'al.
49006016	Jn ajxolta't re'chir k'e pch'oj, kukoj jn nimlaj xot ch'ich' rech to'b'al rib', jla' xoq'je' ix re'chir kixch'ojen ruk' jn tzel, chikojo' jn nimlaj xot ch'ich' rech kojb'al, rech kito'wa' iwib' che jn tzel re'chir kutoq chiwij jn ch'ich' chir k'o q'a' chitza'm.
49006017	Jn ajxolta't re'chir k'e pch'oj kukoj jn k'o'x ch'ich' puwi', rech to'b'al uwi', xoq'je' ix, re'chir kixch'ojen ruk' jn tzel chikojo' jn k'o'x ch'ich' piwi' rech jn solb'alib', xoq'je' chikojo' che imichit, jn michit rech Loq'laj Santil, jn michitla' re'k'ut uyoloj Qajwal Dios.
49006018	Chikojo' nejel chakamb'al rech ch'oj chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios chiw, chib'ana' loq'laj ich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios nejel taq q'ij pe Loq'laj Santil, xoq'je' chita' pich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios pikiwi' nejel ajkojnel, xoq'je' miya' knaq chajnem.
49006019	Xoq'je' kixch'a'waq ruk' Qajwal Dios pinwi', rechwa', re'chir kinch'awek, Qajwal Dios kuya' uyoloj chwe, xoq'je' rechwa' kinxijt wib' kinya' ub'ixik rajwerem Qajwal Dios chir owtel knaq, re'k'ut jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
49006020	Rechi' chir chinime' enximtelek, enk'o pche', rimal chir en, en ajb'anal uwichil Qajwal Dios chub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj, chita' che Qajwal Dios chir chuya' enchoq'ab' chir ruk't uxib'il ib' kimb'ij jn k'ak' yoloj chpa' rajwixik ub'ixik.
49006021	Xoq'je' rechwa' kiwet'maj ix, chir kux emb'onom, xoq'je' kiwet'maj chir kux kintijen chub'anik, nejel chir kux kimb'ono, nejel ri' kub'ijna Tiquico chiw chir loq'laj qaxlal, xoq'je' re' xa' jun k'owa' ukojb'al chunimxik Qajwal Dios.
49006022	Rimal k'ut ri' xintaq b'ik Tiquico iwuk', rechwa' kiwet'maj chiqi'j oj, xoq'je' rechwa' kub'e' iwanme'.
49006023	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo kuya' chiw ix qaxlal jn loq'laj uxunem rech anme', xoq'je' kuya' jn loq'b'al k'u'x ruk' kojb'al.
49006024	Kojoqb'la' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kuk' kinejel naqpla' chir sub'laj kiloq'oj Qajwal Jesucristo. B'antajaq b'la'.
50001001	Pablo ch'il Timoteo ijaqlel ajnimnel rech Cristo Jesús. Kintz'ib'aj chke kinejel tyoxtaq ajkojnel chirij Cristo Jesús chir ik'o pe tilimit Filipos, ch'il chke ajk'amal kib'ej ajyuq' chirij kojb'al, xoq'je' chke diáconos.
50001002	Chiw ix jn ritzil anme', xoq'je' jn uxunem rech anme' chir kpe ruk' Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' kpe ruk' Qajwal Jesucristo.
50001003	Kub'lek kintyoxij che Dios re'chir kixk'un pink'u'x.
50001004	Suk' kub'lek chpam taq nejel ench'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios, kintz'onoj piwi' ix che Qajwal Dios ruk' ki'kte'mal.
50001005	Rimal chir xa' janam qanme', xoq'je' en ito'om chub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo, chir xmajtajlaq nab'e q'ij re'chir xixkojnek suk'te' po'q'ij.
50001006	Wet'amk'ut en chi'ntere chirij ri': Jun chir xumaj jn utzlaj chak pik'aslemal, kuk'isna ub'anik suk'te' jn q'ij rech upetb'al Cristo Jesús.
50001007	Kumojo chir jri' kinchomen chiwij ix iwenejel, mpa' ix enk'omom chpam wanme', mpa' tne' enximtel che ximb'al ch'ich', kintijen lewa' chuto'ik wib' chikiwach q'atb'altzij rechwa' ukub'a'xik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo, ix iwenejel k'o iwechb'al wuk' pe jn loq'laj ritzil anme' chir kuya' Qajwal Dios.
50001008	Mpa' Qajwal Dios Re' kub'an ch'a'wem chuwij chir qatzij loq' kixwil ix iwenejel, ruk' jn loq'b'al uk'u'x Cristo Jesús.
50001009	Re'k'ut ri' kinta' chpam inch'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios chir nimraq jn loq'b'al ik'u'x ruk' jn suk'laj etamb'al, xoq'je' che nejel iwet'amb'al.
50001010	Rechwa' kiraq ucha'ik, naq che utz, xa'k'ut jla' kixkon chuk'amik jn saqlaj k'aslemal, xoq'je' k'ot jnaq kixuk'am chpam tzij; suk'te' che jn q'ij re'chir Cristo kpe jumulchik.
50001011	Kinta' che Qajwal Dios chir najaq iwanme' che uwach jn suk'laj k'aslemal chir petnaq ruk' Jesucristo, rech nimseb'al ub'i' Qajwal Dios.
50001012	Re' kwaj en, ix wixlal, chir kiwet'maj chir kux xinraqo, xto'n chunimersik uwach jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
50001013	Kinejel wnaq chir ik'o ptaq nimaqtaq jaj rech q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' kinejel ket'am chir enk'o pche' rimal tarjem chirij Cristo.
50001014	Xa' qe'nchik kraj, kinejel qaxlal xkub'e' kik'u'x chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, rimal enximtel che ximb'al ch'ich', sub'laj k'o anme' chke kiya' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios; ruk't na'b'alib'.
50001015	Qatzijk'ut chir ik'o jujun chir kiya' ub'ixik Cristo xa' rimal kontrenik ch'il ch'ojb'al, pumul ni'jchik kiya' ub'ixik Cristo ruk' nejel uk'uxlal.
50001016	Ruk'ut ni'jchik kiya' ub'ixik Cristo ruk' loq'b'al k'u'x xoq'je' t'amt'elek chir xnucha' Qajwal Dios rechwa' kinto' rij jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
50001017	Ruk'ut ni'jchik kiya' ub'ixik Cristo xa' rech utzukxik utzil kech ire', ruk't jn saqlaj tzij, re' kib'ij ire' chir kik'is ub'anik k'ax chwe chir enk'o pche'.
50001018	¿Pumul kuxt ku'no? Wa kya' ub'ixik Cristo ruk' jo'sb'al, ruk' lewa' saqlaj tzij, Cristo tijen kya' ub'ixik, re'k'ut la' chir kinki'ket en chirij.
50001019	Sub'laj kinki'ketna mpa' wet'am chir rimal ich'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' rimal chir knuto' Loq'laj Usantil Jesucristo, kintzqapses wa'laq pche'.
50001020	Qas sub'laj kwaj xoq'je' sub'laj kub'ul enk'u'x chir k'ot kya'wa' enk'ix, xa'ne' kub'ul enk'u'x chir tne' kinkamek, kink'ise' lewa' chinime' chpa' suk' kub'lek knimerses uq'ij Cristo pinkuerp.
50001021	Mpa' chwe en, Cristo Re' k'aslemal, ruk'ut jn kamikal, ch'ak'nem. Mpa' kinq'aten chpam jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik.
50001022	Pumul wa jn k'aslemal wural chwach lew rech qawochensaj chak rimal Qajwal Dios. Wet'am tuk'ut naq che kintzukuj.
50001023	Mpa' che kyeb' (2) praj utz chwe en, kwaj en kimb'ek kinkije' ruk' Cristo chir sub'laj utzna.
50001024	Pumul elem knaq pintyo'jil sub'laj rajwixik, xa' iwumal ix.
50001025	Kub'ul enk'u'x chirij ri', wet'am en chir knelknaq xoq'je' kintaqejna ub'anik ruk' iwenejel ix rechwa' kiy ikojb'al xoq'je' kixki'ket chirij kojb'al.
50001026	Rechwa' sub'laj kixki'ketna Chirij Cristo Jesús xa' wumal en, rimal chir enk'ochik chixo'l jumulchik.
50001027	Xo'w kwaj kimb'ij chiw, chir chib'ana' utz che ik'aslemal jla' chpa' jn k'ak' yoloj rech Cristo, rech chir tne' kimb'e chiwilik, tne' naj enk'owa' chiw, kinta'tb'ej chir xa' jun k'owa' ikojb'al, chir janam iwach kikoj ichoq'ab' rimal ikojb'al che uyoloj Cristo.
50001028	Xoq'je' mixij iwib' chke naq chir kixkitzlaj, qatzijk'ut chir re' ri' majb'al rech kisb'al kiwach, pumul chiw ix majb'al rech jn solb'alib' chir petnaq ruk' Qajwal Dios.
50001029	Mpa' chiw ix xya'wa' xo'wta chir kixkojon chirij Cristo, xa'ne' xoq'je' chir kiq'axajna k'ax rimal Re'.
50001030	Re'k'ut jn nimlaj k'axla' chir k'o wuk' nab'e knaq chir xiwulo, ruk'ut chinime' kito'o chir enk'ona chpan jn k'ax la'.
50002001	Rechi', wa k'onaq jorob'seb'al anme' pub'i' Cristo, wa k'onaq jorob'seb'al anme' rech loq'b'al k'u'x chirij Cristo, wa k'onaq raqb'al ib' rech Loq'laj Santil, wa k'onaq loq'b'al ib' chirij Cristo, xoq'je' wa k'onaq loq'laj toq'ob' chirij Cristo.
50002002	Chitz'aqatsaj enki'ktemal rechwa' chir xa' janam una'ik nejel ki'no, xa' janam loq'b'al ik'u'x, xa' janam iwanme', xa' janam ichomb'al chiwach.
50002003	K'o mib'ono chir xa' rech kitzukuj naq utzil chiw ix, xoq'je' k'o mib'ono xa' rech nimseb'al ib', xa'ne' chib'ana' ruk' matzkatem, ptaq ijujnal chinimersaj iwib' chiwach.
50002004	Xo'w kituyuj chir kux iwech ix, xa'ne' xoq'je' chirij kech ni'jchik.
50002005	K'olaqb'la' jn chomnike' iwuk', jla' chpa' jn chomnik chir xje' ruk' Cristo Jesús.
50002006	Re'k'ut Cristo Jesús chir xujunumsajt rib' ruk' Qajwal Dios tne' re' qatzij chir xa' janam ub'anik chpa' Dios.
50002007	Xa'ne' xuya' pnaq jla' chir kux rech Re', re' xuk'am pnaq kux ub'anik jn jaqlel ajnimnel xu'no chpa' wnaq.
50002008	Xub'an k'ut ch'iti'n che rib' putike'lam, xuya'rib' ptaqek che Qajwal Dios suk'te' chukamikal, kamikal chwach cruz.
50002009	Rmalk'ut ri' Qajwal Dios nim xuya'wa' puwi' nejel, xoq'je' xuya' jn ub'i' chir k'o pikiwi' nejel b'i' chir ik'o chwach lew.
50002010	Rechwa' chir pub'i' Jesús kixuke' nejel naq chir ik'o pkaj, xoq'je' naq chir ik'o chwach lew, xoq'je' naq chir ik'o xe' lew.
50002011	Rechwa' chir kinejel kit'maj chir re' Cristo Jesús Qaqjaw, rech unimersesik Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw.
50002012	Xa'k'ut jla' ix loq'lajtaq wixlal, chir kub'lek xiya' iwib' ptaqek xo'wta re'chir xinkije' iwuk', xa'ne' sub'lajna chinime' ri' chir enk'otchik iwuk', ruk' nab'alib' xoq'je' ruk' b'irb'itenem, wochnaqb'la' jn solb'alib' chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chiw.
50002013	Mpa' re' Qajwal Dios kuya' piwanme' ix uriyxik xoq'je' ub'anik chir kux kraj ranme' Re'.
50002014	Chib'ana' nejel ruk't jik'chi'nik xoq'je' ruk't ch'ojb'al.
50002015	Rechwa' kib'an ichomb'al chpa' rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios chir k'ot kixk'amwa' chpam yoq'b'al tzij xoq'je' saq chikixo'l jn xe'na'ale' chir jech' xoq'je' sub'laj itak chikixo'l k'ut ire' kixpoqpetek chpa' ch'imil chir ik'o pkaj.
50002016	Mitzq'apsaj ni'j yoloj rech k'aslemal, rechwa' chir sub'laj kinki'ket chiwij ix che jn q'ij re'chir Cristo ktzalajlaq, mpa' xa'tloq' xintzaq wanim xoq'je' xa'tloq' enchak chir emb'onom chwach Qajwal Dios.
50002017	Tne' kinkamsesek, xoq'je' kturuw enkik'el chwach Qajwal Dios, kinki'ket iwuk' ix iwenejel chirwa enk'aslemal kikojna ix che utzaq'at jn nimnek chir kib'an chwach Qajwal Dios rimal ikojb'al.
50002018	Xoq'je' ix kixki'ktaq wuk'.
50002019	Pumul kwiyi'ej chirij Qajwal Jesús utaqikb'ik Timoteo iwuk' pa'nim, rechwa' kub'e' enk'u'x rimal kwit'maj kux ib'onom ix.
50002020	Mpa' k'ot jnaqchik chpa' re' chir qatzij qaxew ranme' chiw.
50002021	Mpa' kinejel ni'jchik xo'w kitzukuj utzil kech ire', kitzkujt rech Cristo Jesús.
50002022	Mpa' iwet'am ix chir Timoteo sub'laj utzlaj wnaq, chir re' chakannaq wuk' chub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo, knunimaj chpa' naq alk'wa'lxel chir kunimaj uqaw.
50002023	Rechi' re' kwaj en kintaq b'ik iwuk' pa'nim, re'chir kwit'maj chir kux kwik'ewsaj.
50002024	Kub'e'k'ut enk'u'x chirij Qaqjaw chir kno'pen en xoq'je' iwuk' tla' pa'nim.
50002025	Kwil en chir rajwixik kintzilijb'ik qaxlal Epafrodito chpa' ixk'owa' ix, re'k'ut chir ajto'l wech xoq'je' wich'il ajxolta't rech ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj chir xitaqlaq wuk' chinnimxik che enrawixik.
50002026	Re' sub'laj kurij kril iwach iwenejel, sub'laj qaxew ranme' rimal chir ix xito'o chir yab' re'.
50002027	Mpa' qatzij chir xyab'nek, xril uwach ukamik, pumul Qajwal Dios xk'axk'ab' uk'u'x che, xo'wt che re' xk'axk'ab' uk'u'x xa'ne' chwe en, xoq'je' rechwa' kukamuluj tewa' emb'is cha't xkamek.
50002028	Rechi' chir kintaqb'ik iwuk' pa'nim rechwa' kixki'ktek chirilik jumulchik xoq'je' rechwa' kel qe'naq emb'is.
50002029	Rechi' chik'uluj b'la' ruk' nejel ki'kte'mal pub'i' Qajwal Jesús. Nim chiya'wa xoq'je' ni'jchik chir ijanam chpa' re',
50002030	mpa' xa' qe'nchik kraj xkamek xa' rimal unimxik Cristo, xuya'k'ut uk'aslemal pe xib'ilib' rimal ennimxik, nimnek chir xixkont ix chub'anik.
50003001	Che uk'isb'al, ix wixlal, kixki'ktaq chirij Qajwal Jesús, qatzij kuya't latz' chwe en uka'mluxik utz'ib'xik, mpa' rech kxuto'o chke ni'j chir kib'an k'ax chiw.
50003002	Chichajij iwib' chke ni'j wnaq chir xa' janam kib'anik chpa' tz'e', chke ni'j chir kib'an tzeltaq b'onoj, chichajij iwib' chke ni'j chir kik'ur kityo'jil.
50003003	Mpa' oj, oj wnaq rech circuncisión, chir rimal Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios qanimersaj ub'i' xoq'je' qanimersaj qib' pub'i' Cristo Jesús, qakub'a't qak'u'x chirij qatyo'jil.
50003004	Tne' en xoq'je' k'o uxlaj chir kub'e' enk'u'x chirij kux kb'an che tyo'jil. Wa k'o jnaq kuchomaj chir k'o uroson chir kub'ul uk'u'x chirij chir kux kb'an che tyo'jil, en, sub'lajna enroson.
50003005	En ximb'an circuncidar che waxqib' (8) q'ij, je petnaq enxe'na'al kuk' Rilk'wa'l Israel, rech jn ch'ob' che wnaq rech Benjamín, en hebreo, xoq'je' enchuch enqaw i'aj hebreo, chirij unimxik pixab', en Fariseo.
50003006	Rimal jn celosil chirij kikojb'al enchuch enqaw, en xiwaqtaj ch'ob' che ajkojnel chirij Cristo, rimal jn suk'laj k'aslemal, chir kub'ij pixab', en k'ot jnaq knuk'amb'ej chpam tzij.
50003007	Pumul k'iyk'ut ri' chir nim kib'anik chinwach nab'e knaq, chinime' ximb'an mes che xa' rimal Cristo.
50003008	Pumul chinwach en, qatzij chir nejel xintzaq pnaq jla' xa' rimal jn nimlaj etamb'al chirij Cristo Jesús chir wajaw en, rimalk'ut Re' xintzaq nejel xoq'je' ximb'an mes che xa' rimal uch'akik Cristo.
50003009	Xinjunuj wib' ruk' Cristo, pumul ruk't jn suk'laj k'aslemal chir utoqom Qajwal Dios chpam pixab' xa'ne' ruk' jn suk'laj k'aslemal chir petnaq ruk' kojb'al chirij Cristo, jn suk'laj k'aslemal chir petnaq ruk' Qajwal Dios chirij kojb'al.
50003010	Rechwa' kwit'maj uwach Cristo, kwit'maj jn loq'laj ukownem rech uk'astajb'al chikixo'l kamnaqib', xoq'je' kwit'maj jn raqb'al ib', kinq'axaj k'ax chpa' k'ax chir xuq'axaj Cristo, xoq'je' kwaj en kimb'an janam ruk' Cristo chirij ukamikal.
50003011	Jla' kwiyi'ej uraqik jn k'astajb'al chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
50003012	Re'ta chir xinkon churaqik nejel chir kux kraj Cristo chpam enk'aslemal, xoq'je' re'ta chir k'otchik rajwixik chpam enk'aslemal chwach Qaqjaw, emb'enaq rechwa' kinraq jn k'astajb'al chikixo'l kamnaqib', jla' chpa' enraqik en xub'an Cristo Jesús.
50003013	Ix wixlal, kimb'ijtna chir qas emroqomchik chir kux kraj Cristo chpam enk'aslemal. Pumul re' ri' kimb'ono: Chir kinsach knaq nejel chir kux xelknaq chuwij, re' kinkoj enchoq'ab' churaqik kux petnaq chinwach.
50003014	Rechwa' kinch'ak jn sip chir kuya' jn nimlaj sik'nem rech Qajwal Dios pub'i' Cristo Jesús.
50003015	Rechi' qanejel oj chir nimchik qakojb'al rajwixik chir jri' qajchomnaq. Wa ix jalan ichomnik, Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kuq'aljansajna rire' chiwach.
50003016	Pumul rajwixik qab'ana' che qak'aslemal jla' chpa' jn etamb'al chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios chqe.
50003017	Ix qaxlal, chib'ana' chpa' kimb'an en, xoq'je' chiya' iwach chke ni'jchik qaxlal chir ketmaj quk'. Chib'ana b'la' chpa' kib'an ire'.
50003018	Sub'laj rajlab'al emb'i'm chiw, ruk'ut chinime' kinka'muluj ub'ixik chiw ruk' uwa'l enwach, chir sub'laj ik'iy kib'an ajch'oj che jn k'ak' yoloj rech ucruz Cristo.
50003019	Che uk'isb'al, ksachna kiwach mpa' ire' re' kinimaj udiosil kiriyb'al, kinimersaj kib' puwi' kik'ixb'al, xo'w chpa'kux rech uwach lew kichomaj.
50003020	Pumul oj chir oj ajtilimit rech kaj qayi'em ajsolel qech pkaj chir Qajwal Jesucristo.
50003021	Re' kuk'ex uwach jn kixb'al laj qakuerp, kub'an janam che chpa' ukuerp Re' chir suk'laj kuerp rimal jn loq'laj ukownem Re', jn choq'ab' chir kumej nejel chwach Re'.
50004001	Rechi' chir ix loq'lajtaq wixlal, ixk'ut chir sub'laj kwaj kwil iwach, xoq'je' ix, ix enki'ktemal xoq'je' ix jn sip wech en, xa' junb'la' kixkojo'q chirij Qajwal Jesús.
50004002	At Evodia xoq'je' at Síntique kinta jn toq'ob' chiw chir xa' jun chib'ana' che ichomb'al chirij Qajwal Jesús.
50004003	Xoq'je' at chir at utzlaj wich'il chir qojchakan ruk' Qajwal Dios, kinta' chaw chir k'e ato' ni'j qaxlal, ni'j ixqib'e' ire'k'ut chir xinkito'o chub'ixik jn utzlaj k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo, xa' janam chpa' Clemente, xoq'je' chpa' ni'jchik chir ichakenaq wuk', ire' k'ut chir tz'ib'tal kib'i' chpam wuj rech k'aslemal.
50004004	Suk' kub'lek kixki'ktaq chirij Qajwal Jesús, kimb'ij chiw jumulchik kixki'taq.
50004005	Q'aljanaq chikiwach nejel wnaq jn ch'uch'ujlaj anme' chir k'o iwuk' mpa' Qajaw naqajchik k'owa' upetb'al.
50004006	Mat' k'o naq chpa'kux kixk'achi'n chirij, xa'ne' re'chir kixch'aw ruk' Qajwal Dios chijacha' puq'ab' xoq'je' chita' che chir kux k'o piwanme' ruk' tyoxnem.
50004007	Ruk'ut jn uxunem rech anme' chir q'atan puwi' nejel nimaqtaq chomb'al, kukolna iwanme' xoq'je' kukolna ichomb'al chirij Cristo Jesús.
50004008	Che uk'isb'al, ix wixlal, kixchomnaq chirij saqlaj tzij, kixchomnaq chirij kux k'o mejb'al ib' chpam, kixchomnaq chirij nejel chir suk', kixchomnaq chirij nejel chir ch'ajch'oj, xoq'je' kixchomnaq chirij nejel utzlaj anme', kixchomnaq chirij nejel chir qus ub'ixik kb'anek, kixchomnaq chirij nejel chir utz, xoq'je' chir kumojo knimerses uq'ij.
50004009	Chib'ana' b'la' chir kux xiwet'maj wuk' xoq'je' kux xik'am wuk', xoq'je' kux xita' wuk' xoq'je' kux xiwil wuk', ruk'ut Qajwal Dios rech jn uxunem rech anme' kije'na iwuk'.
50004010	Sub'laj kinki'ket chirij Qajwal Jesús rimal chir xixchomen chuwij jumulchik, kimb'ijta chir xinsach chiw xa'ne' chir loq't knito'o.
50004011	Kimb'ijt rire' rimal chir k'o rajwixik chwe mpa' wet'am chir kinki'ktek ruk' chir kux k'o wuk'.
50004012	Wet'am en kije'm pe powril, wet'am xoq'je' kije'm chpam mib'i'l, entyojim wib' che chir xa' kuxpla' kpetek, wet'am uq'axexik enk'aslemal re'chir kpe wi'jal xoq'je' wet'am uq'axexik enk'aslemal re'chir tzaq'atnaq kux kintijo, xoq'je' wet'am uq'axexik enk'aslemal wa k'olek kinkojo, xoq'je' wet'am uq'axexik enk'aslemal chirwa k'otaj.
50004013	Nejel kinkon chub'anik pub'i' Cristo, chir Re' kuya' enchoq'ab'.
50004014	Pumul utz xi'no chir ix jun wuk' ruk' jn enk'axe'.
50004015	Ix aj tilimit Filipos, re'chir xinmajlaq ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo, re'chir xnel laq Macedonia, k'ot junchik ch'ob' che ajkojnel xinkito'o xo'w ix itikel.
50004016	Re'chir xinkije' Tesalónica xitaqb'i'k chir kux rajwixik chwe suk'te' tla', jumul che uka'mul.
50004017	Re'ta chir kintzukuj en chir kiya' sub'laj sib' chwe, xa'ne' re' kintzukuj chir knimer uwach ikojb'al.
50004018	Xink'amk'ut nejel chir kux xitaqlaq chwe chinime', sub'laj nim chik k'o wuk', mpa' xuya' Epafrodito chwe chir kux xitaqlaq chirij, jn sip chir sub'laj kok' xoq'je' loq' chwach Qajwal Dios.
50004019	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir kuya' nejel chir kux rajwixik chiw chpa' nimaqtaq umib'i'l Re' chirij Cristo Jesús.
50004020	Qaya'b'la' che Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw jn unimal q'ij chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
50004021	Chiya' ritzil kiwach kinejel ajkojnel, xoq'je' qaxlal chir ik'o wuk', kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach.
50004022	Xoq'je' kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach kinejel ajkojnel pumul sub'lajna naq chir ik'o chirchoj César.
50004023	Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Jesucristo ruk' iwanme' ix. B'antajaq b'la'.
51001001	En, en Pablo, Apóstol rech Cristo Jesús chpa' rajwerem Qajwal Dios, k'o qaxlal Timoteo wuk.
51001002	Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chke tyox lajtaq ajkojnel xoq'je' xa' jun k'owa' kikojb'al chirij Cristo chir ik'o pe tilimit Colosas, chiw ix jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios ch'il jn uxunem rech anme'.
51001003	Suk' kub'lek qach'ab'ej Qajwal Dios chiwij ix, qatyoxij che Qajwal Dios chir uqaw Qajwal Jesucristo.
51001004	Mpa' xqata' ikojb'al chirij Cristo Jesús, xoq'je' loq'b'al ik'u'x chir kiya' chke kinejel tyoxtaq ajkojnel,
51001005	rimal jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir koltel chiw ix pkaj, re'k'ut jn ukub'ul k'uxla' chir xita' ix nab'e ruk' ixikin re'chir xb'i'x jn saqlaj tzij chiw, re'k'ut ri' jn k'ak' yoloj rech Cristo,
51001006	chir xo'pen iwuk' chpa' tijen ko'pen che nejel uwach lew, chpa' naq che' chir k'iyek xoq'je' uk'omomb'ik uwach, xmajtajb'ik che jn q'ij re'chir xito'o, xoq'je' xich'ob' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chpam jn saqlaj tzij,
51001007	chpa' xiwet'maj ix che Epafras, chir loq'laj qach'il jaqlel ajnimnel, ajchak rech Cristo chir suk' ukojb'al, rechwa' kuk'amb'ik utzil chiw ix.
51001008	Re'k'ut chir xuya' ub'ixik chqe oj jn loq'b'al ik'u'x chir uyo'om Loq'laj Usantil chiw.
51001009	Rechi' chir qe'oj, suk' che jn q'ijla' re'chir xq'itmaj chir kux kixtijen chub'anik, qayo'omt knaq che ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios piwi' ix, xoq'je' qata' che Qajwal Dios chir ixnajaq che jn rit'maxik chir kux rajwerem Re', ruk' nejel nimlaj nojb'al ch'il jn ch'ob'nem chir kuya' Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios.
51001010	Rechwa' chir kib'an che ik'aslemal chpa' kumaj che naq ajkojnel chirij Qajwal Dios, chib'ana' nejel chir kux qaj chwach Re' xoq'je' kixwachnaq chpam jn utzlaj ichak, chpa' naq che' chir kuya' utzlaj uwach, xoq'je' kixk'iyak che ret'amaxik uwach Qajwal Dios.
51001011	Xoq'je' chiya' uchoq'ab' iwanme' ruk' jn loq'laj kownem, rech unimal uq'ij, rech nejel kuyb'ul k'u'x, ch'il jn utzlaj anme',
51001012	ruk' ki'kte'mal chityoxij che Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut chir xub'an utzil chqe rechwa' qak'am jn echb'al chir kech tyox ajkojnel chpam jn nimlaj taqnik rech saqil.
51001013	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir xjukol che jn nimlaj ukownem qu'mal, xjuk'amb'ik chpam jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij loq'laj Uk'ijol.
51001014	Rimal ukik'el Uk'ijol chir qaraqwa' jn tzqaptejem, re'k'ut jn kuyb'ul qamak.
51001015	Mpa' Qajwal Dios re' q'alajta, pumul xqit'maj uwach rimal Uk'ijol, mpa' Uk'ijol xa' janam ka'yek chpa' Re', Uk'ijol Re' k'ochik nab'e xe'taq kaneyses nejel uwach lew.
51001016	Mpa' rimal Re' xb'an nejel chir ik'o pkaj, xoq'je' chir ik'o chwach lew, chir iq'alaj, xoq'je' chir iq'alajta, tne' nimaqtaq ajtaqnel, nimaqtaq kownem lewa', ukab'taq ajtaqnel lewa', q'atb'altzij lewa', nejel rimal Re' xb'anek xoq'je' rech Re' xb'anek.
51001017	Nab'e k'ut Cristo chikiwach nejel, xoq'je' rimal re' kiroqom kixlaj.
51001018	Cristo ktaqan pikiwi' kinejel ajkojnel, Cristo jla' chpa' qawi' chir ktaqan puwi' nejel qakuerp, Cristo Re' majb'al kech nejel ajkojnel xoq'je' Re' nab'e xch'akan puwi' kamikal, mpa' Re' xk'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib' rechwa' chir xo'w Re' nab'e chwach nejel.
51001019	Mpa' xqaj chwach Dios chir puk'aslemal Cristo kajaqe' nejel chir kux ub'anik Dios.
51001020	Xoq'je' xqaj chwach Dios chir rimal Cristo kyu'tzer ruk' Re' jumulchik nejel kuxpla' chir ik'o chwach lew xoq'je' nejel kuxpla' chir ik'o pkaj. Re' xuya' jn uxunem rech anme' rimal ukik'el chir xtix chwach cruz.
51001021	Nab'e knaq, ix rimal chir utzt ino'jb'al xoq'je' rimal tzeltaq ichak sub'laj naj ixk'owa' che Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' ix ajch'oj rech Qajwal Dios ruk' ino'jb'al.
51001022	Pumul chinime' Qajwal Dios xub'an utzil chiw chir xixtzalaj ruk' Re', xa' rimal ukamikal Uk'ijol chwach cruz, rechwa' chir Uk'ijol kxuk'ut chwach Qajwal Dios chir qatzij ix tyoxtaq ajkojnel chir k'ot tz'il chiwij, xoq'je' k'ot k'amaw iwech chpam yoq'b'al tzij,
51001023	chirwa qatzij kub'lek kixb'im chirij kojb'al, xoq'je' kitik iwib' chi'ntere xoq'je' utz ix wa'lwa' miya' knaq jn uku'b'ul k'u'x chir kuya' jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo. Re'k'ut chir xita' ix xoq'je' xya' ub'ixik chke nejel wnaq chri' ik'o xe' kaj, en Pablo, en jun chke ajnimnel rech jn k'ak' yoloje'.
51001024	Chinime' sub'laj kinki'ket chpam jn k'axe' chir tijen kinq'axaj rimal ub'anik utzil chiw ix, xoq'je' rech ktzaq'atwa' pintyo'jil en chir kux krajna che enq'axom chir xuq'at Cristo chuwij, utzilk'ut ri' che utyo'jil Cristo, re'k'ut jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel.
51001025	Xub'an k'ut Qajwal Dios chwe en, ajnimnel kech ajkojnel, xuchilb'ej chwe ub'anik jn chake' chixo'l ix, re'k'ut jn ub'ixik nejel uyoloj Dios.
51001026	Re'k'ut rajwerem Dios chir owtel nab'e knaq, pumul chinime' xq'aljanses chqawach oj tyoxtaq ajkojnel rech Re'.
51001027	Chke ire' k'ut, Qajwal Dios xqaj chwach uq'aljensik jn mib'i'l rech unimal uq'ij, rech rajwerem chir owtel nab'e knaq chikiwach wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel. Re'k'ut ri' Cristo chir jaqal pik'aslemal ix, re'k'ut jn uku'b'ul qak'u'x rech jn unimal q'ij chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
51001028	Re'k'ut Cristo chir qaya' ub'ixik, qab'ij k'ut utzlajtaq yaj chke nejel wnaq, xoq'je' qak'ut chikiwach nejel wnaq ruk' nejel loq'laj nojb'al rechwa' kiqajach nejel wnaq chwach Qajwal Dios suk'chik kik'aslemal rimal Cristo Jesús,
51001029	rimalk'ut ri' kinchaknek xoq'je' knok il, ruk' jn nimlaj ukownem Cristo chir sub'laj kchakan chpam enk'aslemal.
51002001	Mpa' kwaj en kiwet'maj ix chir sub'laj kintij enq'ij rimal ub'anik utzil chiw xoq'je' ub'anik utzil chke ajkojnel rech tilimit Laodicea xoq'je' ub'anik utzil chke kinejel ajkojnel chir kilomt enwach,
51002002	rechwa' chir kojorob'ses kanme' ire', xoq'je' ichaptal rimal loq'b'al k'u'x rechwa' kiraq nejel mib'i'l, re'k'ut ri' jn nimlaj mib'i'l chir qasqatzij iwet'am chir naq ixkojennaq chirij, re'k'ut ri' kub'an chiw chir kiwet'maj uwach jn rajwerem Dios chir owtel nab'e knaq, Re'k'ut Cristo.
51002003	Ruk' re' koltelwa' nejel mib'i'l rech nimaqtaq nojb'al xoq'je' etamb'al.
51002004	Kimb'ij k'ut ri' chiw rechwa' chir mat' k'o jnaq kxujo'saj ruk' utzlajtaq yoloj pumul k'o jo'sb'al chpam.
51002005	Mpa' tne' qatzij chir enk'ot iwuk' che wunaqil pumul k'elaq chir enk'o iwuk' mpa' suk' kub'lek ixk'o puwanme', kinki'ktek chir puxlaj ib'onom che nejel xoq'je' kinki'ket chir xa' jun k'owa' ikojb'al chirij Cristo.
51002006	Rechi', chpa' uk'amik Cristo Jesús xib'an piwanme', jla'b'la' kixb'inaq ruk' Re' xoq'je',
51002007	rajwixik kitik iwib' chi'ntere chirij Re' chpa' ib'onom petnaq xoq'je' rajwixik kitz'aq' iwib' chirij Re' chpa' naq jaj chir ku'b'ul chi'ntere chu' utz'aq'il, xoq'je' rajwixik chikowersaj iwib' ruk' ikojb'al jla' chpa' xk'ut chiwach, xoq'je' rajwixik kiyer uwach ityoxnem che Qajwal Dios.
51002008	Chichijij iwib' chir mat' k'o jnaq kxusokaj ruk' ni'j chomb'al chir k'ot kchakanwa', xoq'je' k'o jo'sb'al chpam chpa' kinoq'b'al chijab', chpa' chomnik rech uwach lew chir janamta chpa' utyojnik Cristo.
51002009	Mpa' nejel loq'laj uk'aslemal Qajwal Dios je' kraqtaj chirij uk'aslemal Jesucristo.
51002010	Ix, ix tz'aqat chirij Re', re'k'ut Re' kiwi' nejel nimaqtaq choq'ab' xoq'je' Re' kiwi' nimaqtaq q'atb'altzij.
51002011	Xoq'je' chirij Re' xixb'anwa' circuncidar ruk' jn circuncisión chir uq'ab't wnaq xb'anew rech, re'k'ut jn circuncisión la' chir xresaj pik'aslemal jn uriyxik ub'anik mak ruk' tyo'jil, re'k'ut ri' chir xub'an Cristo pik'aslemal.
51002012	Rechi' chir ix ixmuqtel ruk' Cristo chirij jn qasnik ja' chir rimalk'ut Re' xixk'asb'a'x chikixo'l kamnaqib' rimal ikojb'al chirij loq'laj ukownem Qajwal Dios chir xuk'asb'a' Cristo chikixo'l kamnaq'ib'.
51002013	Xoq'je' ix nab'e knaq k'ona pik'aslemal jn uriyxik ub'anik mak pityo'jil kawulpa' ixkamnaq chpam mak, pumul Qajwal Dios xusach nejel imak. Xuya' ik'aslemal jla' chpa' xub'an che Cristo xuya' ik'aslemal.
51002014	Ru'k'ut Qajwal Dios xuchupsaj mak chir tz'ib'tal knaq chwach wuj, chir tz'ib'tal qamak chpam chir kch'a'n chiqi'j, xresaj k'ut jn wuj la' mpa' xuklawxij chwach cruz re'chir xkam Jesucristo.
51002015	Xresaj k'ut jn nimlaj choq'ab' chke nimaqtaq kiq'atb'altzij tzeltaq santil xoq'je' chke nimaqtaq kichoq'ab' tzeltaq santil, xuq'aljansaj chikiwach kinejel chir xch'akan Re' pikiwi' ire' chwach cruz.
51002016	Rechi' chir mat' k'o jnaq kxuyoq'o chirij kux che tib'lil kitijo xoq'je' chirij lewa' kux che ja' kitijo chirij lewa' naq nimq'ij, chirij lewa' k'ak' ik', chirij lewa' q'ij sábado chir tyox q'ij.
51002017	Nejel ri' xa' janam ub'anik chpa' muj rech chir kux xb'i'x knaq nab'e chir kpena, pumul saqlaj tzij k'ut, naq chir kub'an jn mujla' Re' Cristo.
51002018	Mat' k'o jnaq kresaj jn sip chir kya'na chiw xa' rimal chir june' kuk'ul uk'u'x kub'an ch'iti'n che rib' xoq'je' kunimersaj kiq'ij utaqo'n kaj, kunimersaj ub'i' chir kux rilom chpam k'utumb'al, rimal ri' kunimersaj rib' chpa' uchomnik chir xa' rech wnaq.
51002019	Jn wnaqe' chaptelt ruk' Cristo chir k'o pqawi' oj chir oj ojkojnel chirij Re'. Re'k'ut chir kub'an chqe chir kije' qachoq'ab' oj chir oj ukuerp Re', mpa' xa' jun kub'an chqe, kub'an chqe chir qojk'iy chpam jn k'iyse'b'al chir kuya' Qajwal Dios rimal chir kichopom kib' qakuerp ptaq prajil rimal q'olb'al rech.
51002020	Wa ix ixkamnaq chik ruk' Cristo xoq'je' xixtzqaptaj che nimaqtaq choq'ab' rech uwach lew, ¿k'ux k'ut rech kiya'na iwib' chixe' utaqnik uwach lew jmulchik,
51002021	chir kib'ij: Michopo, xoq'je' mitak'o xoq'je' miteq'ej,
51002022	ni'j taqnike' chir xa' kech chijab' xa' janam kib'anik chpa' ni'j chpa'kux chir xa' rimal roksik ksach kiwach?
51002023	Qatzij k'ut chir ni'j taqnike' rilik chir je' ipetnaq ruk' nimaqtaq chomb'al pumul jla'ta, mpa' chir kux kinimersaj uq'ij xa' ire' ikaysenaq rech, rilik chir kib'an ch'iti'n che kib' xoq'je' kib'an k'ax che kityo'jil, pumul ni'j chir kux kinoq'sam kikont chresik tzeltaq uriyb'al tyo'jil.
51003001	Rechi', wa ix xixk'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib' ruk' Cristo, chitzukuj b'la' chir kux k'o pkaj chpa' kub'ulwa' Cristo puse'b'al Qajwal Dios.
51003002	Kixchomnaq chirij chir kux chir iq'alajta ik'o pkaj, mixchomen chirij chpa'kux chir iq'alaj rech uwach lew.
51003003	Mpa' ix ixkamnaq chik ruk' Cristo, ruk'ut jn k'ak' ik'aslemal chinime' je owtel knaq ruk' Cristo xoq'je' puq'ab' Qajwal Dios.
51003004	Re'chir k'un Cristo chir ik'aslemal ix, xoq'je' ix kixk'utenna ruk' Re' pe jn unimal q'ij.
51003005	Rechi' chir chikamsaj chir kux rech uwach lew chir k'o pik'aslemal, chpa' tzeltaq mak rech tyo'jil, ch'il nejel uwach che tz'iltaq mak, ch'il tzeltaq riyb'al, ch'il tzeltaq chomnik chirij uriyb'al tyo'jil, ch'il jn uriyxik k'iy uwach che chpa'kux, mpa' jn uriyxik k'iy uwach che chpa'kux xa' janam chpa' kinimxik wachb'al,
51003006	rimalk'ut ni'j make' kpe uk'anal Qajwal Dios pikiwi' wnaq chir kiya'tkib' ptaqek.
51003007	Nejel ni'j make' xib'an ix nab'e knaq re'chir ixk'olaq chpam.
51003008	Pumul chinime' xoq'je' mib'an chik nejel ni'jchik make': Iywal, k'anal, uriyxik k'ax chirij jnchik, uyoq'ik jnchik, ub'ixik wastzij.
51003009	Misokaj iwib' chiwach chinime' chir iwesamchik chir kux k'o pik'aslemal jer.
51003010	Ikojom chik jn q'u'b'al rech jn k'ak' k'aslemal rech jn k'ak' chij chir tijen kuk'ex rib' rechwa' kub'ono chpa' uk'aslemal Qajwal Dios chir xkaneysen rech, rechwa' krit'maj uwach chi'ntere.
51003011	Chpam jn k'ak' k'aslemale' ik'otchik wnaq aj Grecia xoq'je' ik'otchik wnaq aj Israel, ik'otchik wnaq chir kib'onom circuncidar kib' xoq'je' ik'otchik wnaq chir kib'nomt circuncidar kib' xoq'je' ik'otchik wnaq chir nimt ub'anik kitilimit ch'il wnaq chir k'ot ub'anik kitilimit xoq'je' ik'otchik wnaq chir itzqaptel che nimnek ch'il wnaq chir ijaqlel ajnimnel, pumul Cristo Re' k'o pikiwi' nejel wnaq xoq'je' Re' k'o chpam kik'aslemal nejel naq chir kikojon chirij Re'.
51003012	Rechi' chir ix, chir ix cha'telek xoq'je' ix tyoxtaq wnaq xoq'je' ix chir kixloq'ex rimal Qajwal Dios, chikojo' b'la' chiwij chpa' jn q'ub'al rech jn k'axk'ab'al k'u'x chpa' jn q'u'b'al rech jn ch'uch'ujlaj anme' chapa' q'u'b'al rech jn matzkatem chpa' q'u'b'al rech jn al laj anme' chpa' q'u'b'al rech jn kuyb'ul k'u'x,
51003013	chich'aja'b'la' iwib' chiwach xoq'je' chikuyu' imak chiwach, wa k'o jnaq chir k'onaq k'ax pranme' chirij jnchik, jla' chpa' Qajwal Dios xukuy imak xoq'je' ix chikuyu' imak chiwach.
51003014	Puwi' nejel ri' chikojo'b'la' jn q'u'b'al rech loq'b'al k'u'x chiwij mpa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x re' kuxim nejel ri'.
51003015	Ruk'ut jn uxunem rech anme' chir kuya' Dios kub'an uq'atb'altzij piwanme', mpa' rimal la' xixusik'ij Qajwal Dios chub'anik xa' jun che kuerp chirij Cristo, chityoxij che Qajwal Dios.
51003016	Sub'laj joqo'q b'la' uyoloj Cristo pik'aslemal xoq'je' chityojij iwib' xoq'je' chiya' ino'oj chiwach ruk' nejel nimlaj nojb'al xoq'je' kixb'ixnaq ruk' jn tyoxnem piwanme' che Qajwal Dios ruk' Salmos ch'il b'ixnik chir kunimersaj uq'ij Qajwal Dios.
51003017	Nejel kuxpla' chir kux kib'ij xoq'je' nejel lewa' chir kux ki'no chib'ana' nejel pub'i' Qajwal Jesús, chityoxij che Qajwal Dios chir Qajawxel pub'i' Jesús.
51003018	Ix k'le'naqtaq ixiqib' chiya' iwib' ptaqek che iwichijil chpa' kumojo chir jla' kb'anek chirij Qaqjaw.
51003019	Xoq'je' ix k'le'naqtaq chijab' chiloq'oj iwixiqil mikowersaj ino'jb'al kuk'.
51003020	Ix alk'wa'lxel chinimaj ichuch iqaw che nejel, mpa' re' ri' qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
51003021	Ix chuch qajaw xa' miyak kiywal iwilk'wa'l rechwa' ksacht kik'u'x.
51003022	Ix aj jaqlel ajnimnel chiya' iwib' ptaqek che nejel chke iwajaw rech uwach lew, xo'wta chir kixkil ruk' kib'aq'wach xa' rechwa' qaj chikiwach ire', xa'ne' ruk' jn anme' chir k'o saqlaj tzij chpam xoq'je' mejb'elib' chwach Qajwal Dios.
51003023	Nejel chir kux ki'no chib'ana' ruk' nejel iwanme' mpa' kawulpa' rech Qajwal Dios chak chir ki'no, kext wnaq.
51003024	Mpa' ix iwet'am chir Qajwal Dios kuya'na jn tojb'al iwech re'k'ut jn echb'al, mpa' ix tijen kinimaj Cristo chir Qaqjaw.
51003025	Mpa' naq kub'an naq k'ax, kuk'amna rijil uk'ixel jn k'ax chir xu'no mpa' Qajwal Dios chke kinejel xa' janam kub'an chke.
51004001	Xoq'je' ix rajaw chak chib'ana' tzaq'at xoq'je' chib'ana' suk' kuk' jaqlel ajnimnel iwech mpa' iwet'am chir ix xoq'je' k'o jn iwajaw pkaj.
51004002	Suk' kub'lek kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kixchajnaq chirij ich'a'wem ruk' tyoxnik.
51004003	Chich'ab'ej Qajwal Dios paqawi' oj rechwa' chir Qajwal Dios kute'b'a' qab'ej che naq k'ak' luwar, rechwa' qaya' uk'utik jn rajwerem Cristo chir owtelek nab'e knaq chir te' maja' naj xk'utnek rimalk'ut ri' enk'o pche',
51004004	rechwa' chir kimb'ij chir kux rajwixik kimb'ij.
51004005	Chikojo' b'la' jn nimlaj chomb'al kuk' naq chir ikojennaqta, utz' roksik itiemp chib'ana' re'chir kixyolow kuk' ire'.
51004006	Kixch'awaq ruk' mejb'al ib' xoq'je' kixch'awaq ruk' utzlajtaq yoloj kuk' ire', rechwa' kiwet'maj kux qas rajwixik uk'ulb'axik kib'an ptaq kijujnal.
51004007	K'o jun qaxlal chir loq' kwilo xoq'je' ajnimnel chir xa'jun ukojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xoq'je' wich'il chir oj jaqlel ajnimnel chirij Qajwal Dios, Tiquico ub'i' re'k'ut chir k'e uyolo' nejel chiw chir kux wik'iwsam.
51004008	Rmalk'ut ri' chir kintaqb'ik iwuk' rechwa' kiwet'maj kux qab'onom oj xoq'je' rechwa' kuya' uchoq'ab' iwanme'.
51004009	Xoq'je' b'enaq ruk' Tiquico jnchik qaxlal chir Onésimo ub'i' xoq'je' re' loq' kwilo, xoq'je' xa' jun ukojb'al xoq'je' ajtla' chpa' ixk'owa' ix, ire'k'ut kib'ijna chir kux qakiwsam wural.
51004010	K'o jnchik qaxlal chir xa' janam ojk'o pche' ruk', Aristarco ub'i' kutaqb'ik ritzil iwach xoq'je' Markos chir rikyaq' Bernabé kutaq b'ik ritzil iwach. Xinya' k'ut taqnik chiw, wa Markos kixb'e usiqij chik'uluj.
51004011	Xoq'je' kutaqb'ik ritzil iwach Jesús jun chir kb'ix Justo che, chir xo'wa' ire' chikixo'l ajkojnel chir iwnaq aj Israel chir kichakan wuk' rech utzil rech jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij Qajwal Dios, sub'laj k'ut kikub'a'm wanme'.
51004012	Xoq'je' kutaqb'ik ritzil iwach Epafras xoq'je' ajtla' chpa' kixpewa' ix, xoq'je' jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Jesucristo, re' suk' kub'lek kuch'ab'ej Qajwal Dios ruk' nejel uchoq'ab' piwi' ix rechwa' k'o ichoq'ab' chirij kojb'al xoq'je' ix tzaq'at che nejel chir kux kraj Qajwal Dios.
51004013	Mpa' en kinq'aljansaj chir Epafras sub'laj kok il xa' rimal ub'anik utzil chiw xoq'je' kok il chke ajkojnel chir ik'o pe tilimit Laodicea xoq'je' kok il chke ajkojnel chir ik'o pe tilimit Hierápolis.
51004014	Xoq'je' kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach Lucas chir loq'laj ajkun chir nim tyojb'al rib' xoq'je' Demas kutaqb'ik ritzil iwach.
51004015	Chiya' ritzil kiwach qaxlal chir ik'o pe tilimit Laodicea, xoq'je' chiya' ritzil uwach jn qaxlal xaq chir Ninfas ub'i' xoq'je' chiya' ritzil kiwach jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir kiraq kib' prichoj re'.
51004016	Xo'w knik'taj jn wuje' chixo'l ix chitaqa'b'ik kuk' jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel rech Laodicea rechwa' knik'ix chikixo'l ire' xoq'je' ix chinik'ij kiwuj aj Laodicea chir xintz'ib'aj b'ik.
51004017	Chib'ij che Arquipo: "Wla' jn chak chir xak'am che Qajwal Dios rechwa' ka'no chpa' xb'i'x chaw."
51004018	En Pablo xintz'ib'aj b'ik ruk' enq'ab' jn ritzil iwach, k'unaq pik'u'x chir en enk'o pche'. Re't k'ut jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk'. B'antajaq b'la'.
52001001	En Pablo, ch'il Silvano, ch'il Timoteo qatz'i'b'aj jn wuje' che jun ch'ob' che qaxlal aj Tesalónica chir ikojennaq che Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' che Qajwal Jesucristo. Chiw ix jn loq'laj ritzil anme' xoq'je' jn uxunem rech anme', rech Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
52001002	Suk' kub'lek qatyoxij che Qajwal Dios chiwij ix, xoq'je' kixqana'taj chpam taq qach'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios,
52001003	suk' kub'lek qaya't knaq una'texik chwach Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, jn uchak ikojb'al, xoq'je' jn uchak loq'b'al ik'u'x, xoq'je' chirij ijaqlem chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
52001004	Qaxlal mpa' oj qet'am, chir Qajwal Dios Re' loq' kix rilo, chir Re' xcha'w iwech.
52001005	Mpa' jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo chir xoq'je' qech oj, xo'pent iwuk' xa' ruk' yoloj, xa'ne' xo'pen iwuk' ruk' loq'laj kownem rech Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' xo'pen iwuk' ruk' Loq'laj Santil, xoq'je' xo'pen ruk' saqlaj tzij, ix iwet'am re'chir xojkije' chixo'l suk' re' xqatzukuj utzil iwech.
52001006	Xib'ank'ut ix chir kux xiwul quk' oj xoq'je' xib'ono chir kux xub'an Qajwal Jesucristo chir ruk' sub'laj q'oxmal xik'am uyoloj Qajwal Dios ruk' ki'kte'mal rech Loq'laj Santil.
52001007	Rimal k'ut ri', ix, ix jn k'amb'al nojb'al kech nejel qaxlal rech tilimit Macedonia xoq'je' kech ajkojnel rech Acaya chir xikojen chirij Cristo.
52001008	Mpa' iwuk' ix xmajtajwa'laq ub'ixik' uyoloj Qajwal Dios, chir xo'wt Macedonia ch'il Acaya, xa'ne' xoq'je' che nejel luwar xel ub'ixik ikojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios chir rajwixik te'chik qaya' ub'ixik oj.
52001009	Mpa' ire' pikitke'lam kiyol chiqi'j oj, chir kux qas qak'ulik xib'an ix, xoq'je' kux ub'anik xi'no chir xiya' knaq kinimxik ni'j wachb'al rimal unimxik jn qatzij xoq'je' k'aslek Dios.
52001010	Xoq'je' qayi'ej Uk'ijol chir kpe pkaj re'k'ut chir xukasb'a' chikixo'l kamnaqib', re'k'ut Jesús, chir kjusol che jn iywal chir petnaq chqawach.
52002001	Ix wixlal, ix iwet'am re'chir xixqasaqij, xa'tloq' xixqasaqij.
52002002	Xoq'je' chir nab'e knaq xiq'axaj jn q'oxom, xoq'je' sub'laj xojyoq' pe tilimit Filipos, pumul sub'laj xkub'e' qak'u'x chirij Qajwal Dios rechwa' xqaya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo chixo'l ix ruk' sub'laj che latz'.
52002003	Mpa' jn utzlaj yaj chir xqaya' chiw je't xpe ruk' sachb'al k'u'x, xoq'je' je't xpe ruk' tziltaq chomb'al, xoq'je' je't petnaq ruk' jo'sb'al tzij,
52002004	xa'ne' mpa' xojpaj rimal Qajwal Dios rechwa' qaya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Jesucristo chke ni'jchik, rechi' qab'ij re'ta chir kux qaj chikiwach wnaq, xa'ne' chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut chir kupaj qanme'.
52002005	Iwet'am xoq'je' chir mijumul xqakoj yoloj rech b'oychinik xoq'je' rexta chir qakuch rij jn uriyxik pwaq chiwij ix, Qajwal Dios ret'am chir jla'ta.
52002006	Xoq'je' re't qatzukuj unimal kiq'ij chijab', xoq'je' re't qatzukuj unimal iq'ij ix, xoq'je' re't qatzukuj unimal kiq'ij nik'ij chik, pumul tne' kumaj chqe oj qab'an eqa'n chiwij, mpa' oj, oj Apóstoles rech Cristo.
52002007	Xa'ne' xqab'an ch'uch'ujlaj anme' chixo'l ix, chpa' kub'an naq chuch chir kuchijij ral ruk' jn ch'uch'ujlaj anme'.
52002008	Sub'laj nimk'ut loq'b'al qak'u'x chiw ix, chir xqaj oj chir xo'wt xqaya' jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo chiw, xa'ne' xoq'je' xqaj oj uya'ik qak'aslemal, mpa' sub'laj kix qaloq'oj.
52002009	Mpa' k'un pik'u'x ix qaxlal, chirij qachak xoq'je' chirij qakosik, chir xojchaken chaq'ab' che paq'ij, rechwa' qaya'twa' eqa'n che jnaq chixo'l ix, re'chir xqaya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Dios chiw ix.
52002010	Ix, ix testig, xoq'je' Qajwal Dios testig chir xojb'in chixo'l ix chir ix ajkojnel, ruk' jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal, xoq'je' ruk' jn suk'laj k'aslemal, xoq'je' chir k'ot k'amwa' tzij pqawi',
52002011	mpa' ix xoq'je' iwet'am chir ptaq ijujnal qab'onom chiw chpa' kub'an naq qaw chke rilk'wa'l, xqaya' utzlaj yaj chiw xoq'je' ptaq ijujnal xqajorob'saj iwanme'.
52002012	Qachilb'ej k'ut chiw chir kixb'inaq chpa' kumaj che Qajwal Dios chir xixusik'ij chpam jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij, xoq'je' xixusik'ij pe jn unimal uq'ij.
52002013	Rimal k'ut ri' xoq'je' oj qaya't knaq utyoxexik che Qajwal Dios, mpa' re'chir xik'am uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xita' quk' oj, xik'omo xa'ta' chpa' kiyoloj chijab', pumul ix xik'omo chpa' jn qatzijlaj uyoloj Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut chir kchakan pik'aslemal ix chir ix ajkojnel.
52002014	Mpa' ix qaxlal, ix xik'am jn k'amb'al nojb'al kech nejel ch'ob' ajkojnel rech Dios chir ikojennaq chirij Cristo Jesús, chir ik'o Judea, mpa' xitij k'axk'olil kuk' iwnaqil, chpa' k'axk'olil chir xkiq'axaj ire' kuk' kiwnaqil aj Judíos.
52002015	Ire'k'ut Judíos xkikamsaj Qajwal Jesús xoq'je' xkikamsaj ajq'axal uyoloj Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut oj xojkesajlaq, xoq'je' qajt chwach Qajwal Dios chir kux ki'no, xoq'je' kik'le'laj kiwach nejel chijab'.
52002016	Qoj kiq'atuj re'chir qaya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj kuk' wnaq chir it aj Israel, rechwa' kisoltejek, nejel ri' chir ki'no kutzaq'atsaj kimak. Pumul kpe uk'anal Qajwal Dios pikiwi' ire' ruk' choq'ab'.
52002017	Pumul qech oj, ix qaxlal, chir qayo'om knaq rilik iwach kyeb'xub' q'ij pumul pe qanme', rimal ri' sub'laj qaj oj rilik iwach jumulchik.
52002018	Rimal k'ut ri' xqaj oj b'enem iwuk', en Pablo qatzij, jumul che ka'mul xwaj b'enem iwuk' pumul jn tzel xuq'atuj qab'ej.
52002019	Mpa' ¿naq k'ut che ukub'ul qak'u'x? Naq lewa' che qaki'kte'mal, naq lewa' che qakorona chir qanimersaj qib' chirij. ¿Wa ix, tuk'ut chwach Qajwal Jesucristo, pu petb'al?
52002020	Ix qaxlal, ix unimal qaq'ij, xoq'je' ix qaki'kte'mal.
52003001	Rimal k'ut ri' chir xinch'ij te'chik, xqachomaj elemknaq qatikel Atenas,
52003002	xqataqb'ik iwuk' qaxlal Timoteo, chir ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ajto'l qech chub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Jesucristo, rechwa' uya'ik ichoq'ab' xoq'je' ukub'a'xik ikojb'al.
52003003	Rechwa' chir k'ot jnaq kub'an kyeb' (2) uk'u'x rimal ni'j nimaqtaq q'oxmal anme' la', mpa' ix iwet'am chir rajwixik jri' k'ax qaroqo.
52003004	Mpa' oj, re'chir ojk'olaq iwuk' xqanab'ajsaj ub'ixik chir qaq'axajna sub'laj q'oxom, iwet'am k'ut ix chir jri' xqaroqo.
52003005	Rechi' chir xoq'je' en, kinch'ij te'chik xintaqb'ik Timoteo rechwa' kwit'maj chirij ikojb'al ix, mpa' wene' jn tzel xuxutaqchi'j chub'anik mak, rechwa' chir qachak kelt knaq che jla'.
52003006	Pumul re'chir Timoteo xtzalajlaq iwuk' xk'un quk' xuk'amlaq utzlajtaq yolb'al iwech chirij ikojb'al xoq'je' chirij loq'b'al ik'u'x, xoq'je' chir suk' kub'lek qoj ina'taj ruk' loq'b'al k'u'x, kiwaj ix kiwul qawach jumulchik, xoq'je' oj qaj qil iwach jumulchik,
52003007	rimal k'ut ri' ix wixlal chixo'l jn qarajwixik ch'il jn q'oxmal qanme', ix xijorob'saj qanme' rimal chir xa' jun ixwa'lwa' chpam kojb'al.
52003008	Mpa' chinime' qatzij chir ojk'aslek, rimal xqit'maj chir ix, xa' jun ixk'owa' chirij Qajwal Jesús.
52003009	Rimal k'ut ri', ¿kux k'ut che tyoxnik qaya' che Qajwal Dios xa' iwumal ix, rimal nejel ki'kte'mal chir qoj ki'ketwa' xa' iwumal ix chwach Qajwal Dios,
52003010	qab'an qach'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios chaq'ab' che paq'ij ruk' nejel qachoq'ab', rechwa' qil iwach, xoq'je' rechwa' ktz'aq'at kux kraj che ikojb'al?
52003011	Pumul suk' Re' Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo kuk'am qab'ej qojb'e iwuk'.
52003012	Re'k'ut Qajwal Jesucristo kxuk'iysaj xoq'je' kunimersaj jn loq'b'al k'u'x chiwach ix, xoq'je' chiwach iwenejel, jla' chpa' iloq'xik qab'an oj,
52003013	rechwa' xa' jun kub'ewa' iwanme', chir k'ot k'amwa' tzij piwi', xoq'je' tyox ik'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, pu petb'al Qajwal Jesucristo ruk' kinejel ajkojnel chirij Re', chir tyox kik'aslemal.
52004001	Xa'k'ut jla', ix qaxlal, qata' jn toq'ob' chiw, xoq'je' qaya' ichoq'ab' pub'i' Qajwal Jesús, chir jla' chpa' xiwet'maj quk' oj chpa' qas rajwixik kixb'inek, xoq'je' rechwa' k'amar ik'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios, sub'laj nimraqb'la' chir kux kixtijen chub'anik.
52004002	Mpa' iwet'am chik ix kux taqnik xqaya' chiw rimal Qajwal Jesús.
52004003	Mpa' re' ri' rajwerem Qajwal Dios chir kitzukuj jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal, chir kiya' knaq jn mak rech tyo'jil.
52004004	Ix chijab' ptaq ijujnal chiwet'maj utzukxik iwixiqil chpam jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal xoq'je' chpam jn mejb'al ib'.
52004005	Ruk't tzeltaq uriynik tyo'jil, chpa' kib'an wnaq chir ikojennaqt che Qajwal Dios.
52004006	Mat' k'o jnaq kub'an k'ax, xoq'je' mat' k'o jnaq kusokaj rixlal, mpa' Qajwal Dios Re' nejel k'uya' rijil uk'ixel, jla' chpa' qayo'om ub'ixik, xoq'je' qaq'aljansam chiw.
52004007	Mpa' oj usik'imt Qajwal Dios rechwa' qab'an tz'il lajtaq mak, xa'ne' xoj usik'ij rechwa' qatzukuj jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal.
52004008	Rechi' chir, naq kritzlaj uwach jn tyojneme', kritzlajt uwach naq wnaq xa'ne' Re' Qajwal Dios kritzlaj uwach, xoq'je' re'k'ut xuya' Loq'laj Usantil chqe.
52004009	Pumul chirij jn loq'b'al k'u'x chikixo'l alxik rajwixikt chiw ix kintz'ib'aj b'ik, mpa' ix ptaq ijujnal xiwet'maj che Qajwal Dios, chir kiloq'oj iwib' chiwach.
52004010	Xoq'je' jla' kixtijen chub'anik kuk' nejel qaxlal chir ik'o che nejel ujuyb'al Macedonia. Pumul qata' jn toq'ob' chiw ix qaxlal, chir sub'laj k'iyaqb'la' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chixo'l,
52004011	xoq'je' chitzukuj jn k'aslemal chir k'o loq'laj uxumb'al chpam, xoq'je' chib'ana' ichak ptaq ijujunal, xoq'je' kixchaknaq ruk' iq'ab' jla' chpa' taqnik qayo'om chiw,
52004012	rechwa' nim kix kiya'wa' kimal naq chir kikojomt utzij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' k'o iwuk' chir kux rajwixik chiw.
52004013	Xoq'je' qajt oj, ix qaxlal, chir mat' kiwet'maj chir kux kiq'axajna kamnaqib', rechwa' kixb'isenta chpa' ni'jchik chir k'ot uk'ub'ul k'u'x kuk'.
52004014	Mpa' wa qakojo chir Qajwal Jesús xkamek, xoq'je' qakojo' chir xk'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib', jla' xoq'je' Qajwal Dios kuk'amnelaq ruk' Jesús ajkojnel chir xikam chirij Re'.
52004015	Rimal k'ut ri' chir jla' xub'ij knaq Qajwal Jesús, qakub'a, ub'ixik, oj chir ojk'aslek, chir xojel knaq suk'te' che upetb'al Qajwal Jesús, qoj nab'ajt chikiwach naq chir ikamnaq chik.
52004016	Mpa' Qajwal Dios suk' re' qajlaq pkaj, ruk' uch'ab'al taqnik xoq'je' ruk' uch'ab'al arcangel xoq'je' ruk' uch'ab'al su' rech Dios, ruk'ut ajkojnel chir xikam chirij Cristo, nab'e k'astaj kiwach.
52004017	Ruk'ut oj chir ojk'asel knaq chir xjel knaq, pa'nim qojyakb'ik xa' janam kuk' ire' pe sutz, rech qak'ul Qajwal Jesucristo pe ki'qi', rechwa' qojkije' ruk' Qajwal Jesús chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
52004018	Rechi' chir chiya' ichoq'ab' chiwach ruk' ni'j yoloje'.
52005001	Pumul chirij uq'ijal xoq'je' chirij jn q'ij chir kpe ri', k'ot rajwixik chiw ix qaxlal chir kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw.
52005002	Mpa' ix sub'laj iwet'am chir jn q'ij rech upetb'al Qajwal Jesús, kpena chpa' upetb'al naq elq'om chaq'ab'.
52005003	Re'chir wnaq kib'ij, "k'o jn uxunem rech anme' quk'," xoq'je' "k'ot k'ax kpe chq'ij," te' ki'no chir xa'tqe'n kpe jn nimlaj k'ax chikij jla' chpa' jn q'oxom chir kpe chirij jn xaq re'chir ka'lnek, kikon te'chik kanij kib'.
52005004	Pumul ix wixlal, ix ixk'ot chpam qu'mal, rechwa' kix uxb'ijt jn q'ijla' chpa' kxib'en jn elq'om.
52005005	Mpa' iwenejel ix, ix rilk'wa'l saqil, xoq'je' ix rilk'wa'l paq'ij, ojt rilk'wa'l chaq'ab' xoq'je' ojt rilk'wa'l qu'mal.
52005006	Rechi' chir, mojwarek chpa' ni'jchik, xa'ne' qojk'ask'ataq xoq'je' qojkojo'q chpam jn saqlaj chomb'al.
52005007	Rechi' chir naq kiwarek, chaq'ab' kiwarek, xoq'je' naq kiq'ab'rek, chaq'ab' kiq'ab'rek.
52005008	Pumul oj, chir oj rech paq'ij, rajwixik chir qojkije' chpam jn saqlaj chomb'al, chpa' kub'an jn ajxolta't kukoj jn k'o'x ch'ich' rech to'b'al uwach uk'u'x re'chir k'e pe ch'oj, oj xoq'je' qakjo'b'la' jn k'o'x ch'ich' chwach qak'u'x rech kojb'al ch'il loq'b'al k'u'x, xoq'je' chpa' jn ajxolta't kukoj jn ch'ich' pwi' re'chir k'e pe ch'oj, oj xoq'je' qakojo' paqawi' jn ch'ich' pwi' rech jn ukub'ul k'u'x chirij jn solb'alib',
52005009	mpa' xoj usik'ijt Qajwal Dios, rechwa' qab'an jn nimlaj iywal, xa'ne' xoj usik'ij rechwa' qaraq solb'alib' qib' xa' rimal Qajwal Jesucristo.
52005010	Re'k'ut chir xkamek xa' qamal oj, rech chirwa qojk'ask'etek, qojwarlewa', jaqal qak'aslemal ruk' Re'.
52005011	Rimal k'ut ri' chir chikub'a' iwanme' chiwach, xoq'je' chiya' ichoq'ab' chiwach, jla' chpa' kixtijen chub'anik.
52005012	Ix qaxlal, kinta jn toq'ob' chiw, chir nim chiya'wa naq chir kichakan chixo'l, xoq'je' naq kik'am ib'ej pub'i' Qaqjaw, xoq'je' naq chir kixkiyojo;
52005013	rajwixik k'e iloq'oj, xoq'je' nim kilik chib'ana' rimal kichak chixo'l ix, xoq'je' k'olaq jn uxunem rech anme' chixo'l ix.
52005014	Xoq'je' qata' jn toq'ob' chiw ix qaxlal, chir chiyija' naq chir kichakanta, xoq'je' chiya' kichoq'ab' naq chir k'ot qas anme' chke, xoq'je' chito' naq chir ituqa'r, xoq'je' k'olaq kuyb'ul ik'u'x kuk' kinejel.
52005015	Chiwula' chir mat' k'o jnaq kutzilij rijil uk'ixel naq k'ax chir xb'an che, xa'ne' suk' kub'lek chitzukuj ub'anik utzil ni'j alxik kuk' ni'jchik alxik, xoq'je' chixo'l iwenejel.
52005016	Suk' kub'lek kixki'ktaq.
52005017	Suk' kub'lek chib'ij loq'laj ich'awem.
52005018	Chityoxij nejel che Qajwal Dios, mpa' Re' ri' rajwerem Qajwal Dios chiw ix chir ixkojennaq chirij Cristo Jesús.
52005019	Michupsaj Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios.
52005020	Miwitzlaj uwach uyoloj Dios chir q'axam rimal Loq'laj Santil.
52005021	Xa'ne' chicha' uwach nejel na'tb'al, chikolo' naq che utz.
52005022	Chitoso' iwib' che nejel tzeltaq b'onoj.
52005023	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir rajaw jn uxumb'al rech anme' kub'an tyox che ik'aslemal che nejel ikuerp ch'il isantil ch'il iwanme' koltelek rechwa' k'ot tz'il kraqtaj kuk' ire' re'chir kpe Qajwal Jesucristo.
52005024	Jun chir kxusik'ij Re' xa' jun k'owa' ranme', Re' ku'no chir kux ub'im.
52005025	Qaxlal chib'ana' loq'laj ich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios pqawi' oj.
52005026	Chiya' ritzil kiwach kinejel qaxlal ruk' jn tyoxlaj tz'ub'nik chi'.
52005027	Kinya' jn taqnik chiw pub'i' Qajwal chir kisik'ij uwach jn wuje' chikiwach kinejel ajkojnel.
52005028	Kojoqb'la' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Jesucristo iwuk'. B'antajaq b'la'.
53001001	Pablo ch'il Silvano ch'il Timoteo kitz'ib'aj chke jun ch'ob' ajkojnel rech Tesalónica chir ikojennaq chirij Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
53001002	Chiw ix jn loq'laj ritzil anme' xoq'je' jn uxunem rech anme' rech Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
53001003	Ix qaxlal, rajwixik chir kub'lek qatyoxij che Qajwal Dios chiwij ix, ix qaxlal, mpa' utz chir jla' kb'anek, rimal chir tijen k'iyer ikojb'al, xoq'je' rimal chir k'iyer ptaq ijujnal jn loq'b'al k'u'x chke kinejel.
53001004	Rimal k'ut ri', oj qanimersaj qib' chiwij ix chir kixqayol kuk' kinejel ch'ob' che qaxlal chirij Qajwal Dios, rimal ikojb'al, xoq'je' rimal kuyb'ul ik'u'x chpam nejel itzukxik rechwa' kb'an k'ax chiw xoq'je' chpam nimaqtaq q'oxmal chir tijen kiq'axaj.
53001005	Chri' qilwa' chir Qajwal Dios suk' uchomb'al chuq'atik tzij, chir xixuk'am pnaq, xoq'je' chir xix k'amar chwach rechwa' kxok chpam jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij Dios, rimal k'ut ri' chir kitij sub'laj q'oxmal.
53001006	Mpa' suk'laj k'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios chir re' kutoj ruk' nimlaj q'oxmal chke naq chir kiya' nimaqtaq q'oxmal chiw.
53001007	Ruk'ut ix chir kitij nimlaj q'oxmal, Qajwal Dios kuya' jn uxumb'al chiw chpa' kuya' chqe oj che jn q'ij re'chir k'uten Qajwal Jesús suk'te' pkaj kuk' utaqo'n kaj chir k'o loq'laj kikownem.
53001008	Ruk' urep q'a' rechwa' k'un uya' rijil uk'ixel chke naq chir xkit'majt uwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' xkiya't kib' ptaqek che jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
53001009	Re'k'ut nik'ije' chir kya' k'ajse'b'al wach chke, xoq'je' ksachna kiwach chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, kye'sesb'ik chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kye'ses b'ik che jn unimal uq'ij rech loq'laj ukownem.
53001010	Re'chir kpe che jn q'ijla' rech knimerses uq'ij chikixo'l ajkojnel chirij Re' xoq'je' kinejel naq chir xikojnek ktzaq kik'u'x chirij mpa' xo'ksek chir kux xqab'ij chixo'l ix.
53001011	Rimal k'ut ri' chir kub'lek qoj ch'a'w ruk' Qajwal Dios piwi' ix, rechwa' chir Qajwal Dios kxukojo chir kumaj chiwix jn sik'nem chir xub'an chiw xoq'je' chir chub'ana nejel chomnik rech jn utzlaj anme' xoq'je' nejel chak rech kojb'al chir kib'am ruk' ukownem chir ujitom.
53001012	Rechwa' knimerses ub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo chiwij ix, xoq'je' ix kya' unimal iq'ij chirij Re' rimal jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo.
53002001	Pumul chirij upetb'al Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' chirij jn raqb'al qib' ruk' Re', qachilb'ej chiw, ix qaxlal.
53002002	Rechwa' chir pa'nimt kik'ex ichomb'al xoq'je' mat' ksach ik'u'x xa' rimal naq santil xoq'je' xa't rimal naq yoloj, xoq'je' xa't rimal naq wuj kawulpa' chir qech oj, chir qab'ij xo'pen uq'ijal upetb'al Qajwal Jesús.
53002003	Mat' k'o jnaq kxusokaj mpa' kpetna Qajwal Jesús chir wa kpet nab'e jn q'ij chir wnaq kiya'kna kib' chirij Qajwal Dios, tere' k'uten jn chij rech mak jn rilk'wa'l tzaqel.
53002004	Rek'ut chir kuwab'a' rib' xoq'je' kwa'laj chirij Qajwal Dios, knimerses k'ut uq'ij, kub'e'k'ut chpam loq'laj jaj, kukojrib' che dios.
53002005	Wa k'un tuk'ut pik'u'x re'chir enk'olaq iwuk' re' ri' ximb'i'j chiw,
53002006	ruk'ut ix chinime' iwet'am chik chir kux q'atannaq rech, rechwa' kuk'ut rib' suk'te' puq'ijal.
53002007	Qatzij k'ut chir jn owam nojb'al rech jn tzel mak tijen pchak, xo'w mpa' chinime' k'o q'atannaq rech, suk'te' ke'sesna jun chir k'o chixo'l,
53002008	tere' k'utenna jn ajb'anal mak, re'k'ut chir kamsesna rimal Qajwal Jesús xa' ruk' usantil uchi', xoq'je' kusachna uwach ruk' nimlaj poqpetem rech upetb'al.
53002009	Ajb'anal mak chir kpetek xa' rimal uchak jn tzel, chir ruk' nimlaj kownem xoq'je' ruk' jo'sb'altaq k'utumb'al ch'il mayjab'al,
53002010	xoq'je' ruk' nejel jo'sb'al rech tzeltaq mak, chke ni'j chir irech tzaqel, mpa' ire' xkajt xkik'am jn loq'b'al k'u'x rech jn saqlaj tzij rechwa' kisoltejek.
53002011	Rimal k'ut ri' Qajwal Dios xutaqlaq jn jo'sb'al nimlaj choq'ab' rech kikojwa' ire' chirij jn sokb'ale'.
53002012	Rechwa' chir kiqases xe' mak kinejel naq chir xikojent chirij jn saqlaj tzij, xa'ne' utz xkina' ire' ub'anik mak.
53002013	Pumul oj kub'lek rajwixik qaya' tyoxnik che Qajwal Dios chiwij ix qaxlal, ix, chir ix loq' rimal Qajwal Dios, mpa' ix xixcha' rimal Qajwal Dios re'chir xmajtajlaq jn solb'alib', rimal jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal rech Loq'laj Santil ch'il kojb'al chirij jn saqlaj tzij.
53002014	Rimal ri' xixusik'ij Qajwal Dios rimal jn k'ak' uyoloj Qajwal Jesucristo, chir qech oj, rechwa' kiraq jn unimal uq'ij Qajwal Jesucristo.
53002015	Xa'k'ut jla' ix qaxlal xa' jun kix wab'aqwa' chikolo' jn tyojnem chir xk'ut chiwach chirij yoloj chir qab'i'm chiw chirij lewa' wuj chir qatz'ib'am chiw,
53002016	re'k'ut Jesucristo chir Qaqjaw, ch'il Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, re'k'ut chir xjuloq'oj xoq'je' xujorob'saj qanme' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, xoq'je' xuya' jn utzlaj ukub'ul k'u'x chqe rimal jn loq'laj ritzil ranme'.
53002017	Kuya' uchoq'ab' iwanme', xoq'je' kukub'a' iwanme' che nejel utzlaj yoloj, xoq'je' che nejel utzlaj chak.
53003001	Xa'k'ut jla', ix qaxlal, chib'ana' ich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios pqawi' oj, rechwa' chir kb'in uyoloj Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' knimerses uq'ij jla' chpa' xib'an ix xinimersaj uq'ij.
53003002	Xoq'je' rechwa' qojto'taj pe kiq'ab' tzeltaq wnaq, xoq'je' ajmakib', mpa' jn kojb'al kecht kinejel.
53003003	Pumul suk' ranme' Qajwal Dios chir kukub'a' iwanme' xoq'je' kxukol che jn tzel.
53003004	Kub'e' qak'u'x chirij ikojb'al chir iyo'om chirij Qajwal Dios, chir kib'ono, xoq'je' kib'anna chir kux ix qatoqom chub'anik.
53003005	Ruk'ut Qaqjaw kuk'am ub'ej iwanme' che loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' che jn kuyb'ul uk'u'x Cristo.
53003006	Qaya' jn taqnike' chiw, ix qaxlal, pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo, chir chitoso' iwib' che naq qaxlal chir kchakenta xa' ajqasal q'ij, chir janamta chpa' tyojnem chir qayo'om chiw.
53003007	Mpa' ix iwet'am chir kux ub'anik ki'no rechwa' kib'an iwech chir kux qab'an oj, mpa' qe'oj sub'laj xojchaknek re'chir xojkije' chixo'l ix.
53003008	Xoq'je' k'ot jnaq xqatij ukixlinwaj xa' che jla', xa'ne' xojchaken chirij jn kowlaj chak xoq'je' kosb'al laj chak; chaq'ab' che paq'ij, rechwa' xqaya't eqa'n chirij jnaqaq chiwe ix.
53003009	Jla' xqa'no re'ta chir mat' kumaj chqe rechwa' kjito', pumul xojchaknek rechwa' qaya' jn k'utumb'al chiwach xoq'je' rechwa' kib'an iwech.
53003010	Mpa' re'chir xojkije' iwuk', xqaya' jn taqnike' chiw: "Naqpla' chir krajt kchaknek xoq'je' mutij waj."
53003011	Mpa' xqata' ruk' qaxikin chir ik'o jujun chixo'l ix chir kichakanta, xa' kiqasaj q'ij, xoq'je' xa' kiminkib' kuk' ni'jchik.
53003012	Ire'k'ut ni'je' chir qaya' jn taqnik chke xoq'je' k'e qayaj chirij Qajwal Jesucristo chir kichaknaq pu'tzil, rechwa' kitzuq kib' ruk' kichak.
53003013	Ruk'ut ix qaxlal, mixkos chub'anik utzil.
53003014	Wa k'o jnaq kunimajta chir kux qab'ij chpam jn wuje', chiya' retal naq, rechwa' kijunujt iwib' ruk' rech kpe uk'ix.
53003015	Pumul mikontrij, xa'ne' chiyija' chpa' naq ixlal
53003016	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir rech jn uxunem rech anme' suk' kub'lek kuya' jn uxunem rech anme' chiw che nejel. Re't b'la' Qajwal Dios k'o iwuk' iwenejel.
53003017	Jn ritzil iwach chir xintz'ib'ajb'ik, ruk' enq'ab' xintz'ib'aj chiw, re'k'ut ri' retal 'En Pablo', jri'k'ut kintz'ib'aj che nejel wuj.
53003018	Kojoqb'la' jn loqlaj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Jesucristo iwuk' B'antajaq b'la'.
54001001	En Pablo, Apóstol rech Jesucristo, jla' chpa' utaqnik Qajwal Dios Ajsolel qech, xoq'je' chpa' utaqnik Cristo Jesús chir ukub'ul k'u'x qech oj.
54001002	Kintz'ib'aj chaw at Timoteo chir at enk'ijol chirij kojb'al, kwaj en kije' pawanme' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme', jn uk'axk'ab'al k'u'x, tne' kumajt chaw, ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' rech Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
54001003	Chpa' toq'ob' xinta' chaw re'chir xtinya' knaq Éfeso re'chir ximb'e Macedonia, rechwa' kaya' taqnik chke jujun qaxlal chir mat' kik'ut jalanlaj tyojnem.
54001004	Xoq'je' b'i'j chke ire' chir mat' kiya' kixikin che ni'j nuk'um jo'sb'altaq tzij chir k'ot ra', xoq'je' miya' ixikin chke ni'j yoloj chir kch'a'w chirij qaxe'na'al chir k'ot k'isb'al rech; chir xo'w kik'amlaq k'elaj tzij, re' kich'awaq chirij jn k'iyse'b'al chir kuya' Qajwal Dios chir je petnaq ruk' kojb'al, re' la' kinchilb'ej chaw chinime'.
54001005	Mpa' re' uchak jn taqnike' chir qaloq'oj qib' ruk' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'se'naqlaq ruk' jn saqlaj anme', xoq'je' chir k'se'naqlaq ruk' jn utzlaj anme', xoq'je' chir k'se'naqlaq ruk' jn kojb'al chir k'ot jo'sb'al chpam.
54001006	Rimal k'ut ni'j ri' chir ik'o jujun xkik'ex kib'ej chub'ixik tzij chir k'ot ub'ej.
54001007	Kaj ire' chir kib'an ajtyojnel rech upixab' Qajwal Dios, pumul kich'ob'ta chir kux kib'ij xoq'je' kich'ob'ta chir kux kik'utu'.
54001008	Pumul qet'am chir pixab' utz, chir wa utz roksik kb'anek.
54001009	Qet'am chir pixab', xya't che naq wnaq chir suk' uk'aslemal, xa'ne' xya' chke wnaq chir kikojenta, xoq'je' chke wnaq chir sub'laj itak, chke ritzlal taq wnaq, chke ajmakib', chke naq chir k'ot ik'owa' chirij kojb'al, chke naq chir kixo'lq'opij pixab', chke naq chir kikamsaj kichuch kiqaw, chke ajkamsenel.
54001010	Chke wnaq chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil, naq chir kimaken chirij k'le'b'al, chke chijab' chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil kuk' ni'jchik chijab', chke ixiqib' chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil kuk' ni'jchik ixiqib'; chke aj elq'antaq wnaq, chke jo'slajtaq wnaq, chke ajtz'aqal tzij, che uk'isb'al, pixab' xya' chke kuxpla' chir kb'anek chir k'le'lent ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnem.
54001011	Re'k'ut ri' chir ktyojen jn k'ak' yoloj chir nim uq'ij, rech Qajwal Dios, chir xchilb'ex chwe en ub'ixik.
54001012	Kintyoxij che Qajwal Jesucristo, Re'k'ut chir xuya' enchoq'ab', rimal ri' chir nim xrilo chir suk' enkojb'al, xnukoj che rajchak rech ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj,
54001013	chir nab'e knaq en ximb'i'j wastzij chirij Qajwal Jesús, xoq'je' xiwaqtaj, xoq'je' ximb'an tzij chikij ajkojnel, pumul Re' xuya' uk'axk'ab'al uk'u'x chwe; tne' en kumajt chwe, xuya't prajlal kux ximb'ono mpa' k'ot wet'am xoq'je' enkojenaqta.
54001014	Pumul sub'laj xk'iy jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qaqjaw pinwi', xuya'k'ut kojb'al ch'il jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o quk' rimal Cristo Jesús.
54001015	Kux kimb'ij chinime' qas qatzij, rajwixik chir kinejel wnaq kikojo chir Cristo Jesús xk'un chwach lew, chkisolik ajmakib', chir en qas en nab'e ajmak chikixo'l ajmakib'.
54001016	Pumul tne' sub'laj nim nmak, Jesucristo xnuk'uluj ruk' k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' en kumajt chwe, rechwa' chir Jesucristo nab'e kuk'ut pink'aslemal en jn ritzil uk'u'x, rechwa' chir en kimb'an jn k'utumb'al chikiwach naq chir kokojenna che Cristo kik'am jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik.
54001017	Rechi' chir jn nimlaj ajtaqnel rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, Jun chir kamta, Jun chir q'alajta, Jun chir xa' Jun, xoq'je' Jun chir k'o loq'laj etamb'al ruk', che Re' jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' nim yo'oqwa' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
54001018	At enk'ijol Timoteo, kinchilb'ej jn taqnike' chaw, rechwa' chir xa' janam chpa' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir q'axam knaq chir xch'a'w chawij at nab'e knaq, kwaj en kab'an achak chpa' rire'.
54001019	Taqej b'la' jn kojb'al, rajwixik kana' pawanme' chir k'ot k'ax ab'onom, ik'o k'ut jujun chir kina't pe kanme', re'chi' chir xkisach kikojb'al.
54001020	Ire' k'ut jujun chke ire' Himeneo ch'il Alejandro chir xyinjach puq'ab' tzel, rechwa' kit'maj chir utzt kb'ix wastzij chirij Qajwal Dios.
54002001	Kinta' jn nimlaj toq'ob' chaw, chir rajwixik b'anaq nab'e chwach nejel, chir kb'an jn ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios, kta' toq'ob' che, xoq'je' kb'an tz'onoj che, xoq'je' kb'an nimnek rech tyoxnem che, pikiwi' nejel wnaq.
54002002	Xoq'je' pikiwi' nimaqtaq ajtaqnel, xoq'je' pikiwi' kinejel q'atb'altzij chir kitaqen paqawi', rechwa' chir k'ot ch'oj puwi' qatilimit, xoq'je' kije' qak'aslemal chpam jn nimlaj uxunem, rechwa' qak'amb'ik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
54002003	Mpa' ri' utz, xoq'je' k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios chir ajsolel qech.
54002004	Re'k'ut kraj Qajwal Dios chir kinejel wnaq kisoltejek xoq'je' kit'maj nejel saqlaj tzij.
54002005	Mpa' xa' jun che Dios k'olek, xoq'je' xa' jun che ajch'a'wem chikij ajkojnel chwach Qajwal Dios k'olek, Re' k'ut Cristo Jesús.
54002006	Re'k'ut chir utikel xuya' rib' pe kamikal rimal tojb'al qech nimlaj qanejel, qas puq'ijal chir Dios xuya' ub'ixik chqe.
54002007	Rimal k'ut ri' chir xno'kes che Apóstol xoq'je' xno'kes che ajb'i'nel uyoloj Qajwal Dios (qatzij kimb'ij, xa't jo'sb'al tzij kimb'ij), xoq'je' ajtyojnel kech wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel chirij kojb'al xoq'je' chirij jn saqlaj tzij.
54002008	Re'chi' kwaj en chir nejel chijab' rech nejel tilimit, kib'ana' kich'awem che nejel luwar, kiwa'lsaj tyoxtaq kiq'ab' ruk' jn saqlaj anme', ruk't iywal, xoq'je' ruk't ch'ojb'al.
54002009	Jla' xoq'je' kwaj en, chir ixiqib' kikojo' kiq'u' chir qas taqal chke, chir kib'ant nimal ruk', xoq'je' utz uxa'ik kiwi' kib'ana', ruk't qan pwaq, xoq'je' ruk't b'aj chir kipoqnek chir ik'o pe mar, xoq'je' ruk't k'ul chir paqal rijil.
54002010	Xa'ne' kiweqa' kib' ruk' jn utzlaj chak, chpa' kumaj chke ixiqib' chir kijochom kib' chunimxik Qajwal Dios.
54002011	Ixiqib' xa' chkita' ruk' kixikin, xoq'je' ruk' nejel mejb'al ib'.
54002012	Mpa' kumajt chke ixiq'ib' kityojnek xoq'je' kumajt chke ixiqib' chir kitaqen pikiwi' kichijil, xa'ne' xa' kita' ruk' kixikin.
54002013	Mpa' re' Adán chir xwnaqerses nab'e, tere' xwnaqerses Eva.
54002014	Xoq'je' re't Adán chir sokex rimal tzel, xa'ne' re' Eva chir sokex rimal tzel xqaj chpam mak.
54002015	Pumul ixiqib' kisoltajna rimal alnem, chirwa kikije' chpam kojb'al xoq'je' chirwa kikije' chpam loq'b'al ib', xoq'je' chir wa kikije' chpam jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal ruk' mejb'al ib'.
54003001	Qatzij kimb'ij, chir naq kraj kok che ajk'amal kib'ej ajyuq' kech ajkojnel, utzlaj chak kurij.
54003002	Re'chi' chir sub'laj rajwixik chir jn ajsaqnel kech ajyuq'al ajkojnel k'ot kmolew tzij chirij, xa' jun rixiqil k'olek, ajq'ab'rel wnaqta; suk' uk'aslemal, k'o jek'b'al rib' putike'lam, xoq'je' kuya' kiwarb'al wnaq chir kipe naj luwar, xoq'je' kuraq tyojnem.
54003003	Xoq'je' ajq'ab'rel wnaqta, ajch'ojta, xa'ne' ch'u'l ranme' xoq'je' k'o nimlaj utzil pranme', ajriynelt chirij chpa'kux rech uwach lew.
54003004	Utz uq'atb'altzij pikiwi' naq chir ik'o prichoj, uyo'om rilk'wa'l pe q'ajb'al ib' ruk' nejel mejb'al ib'.
54003005	Pumul wa jnaq k'ot uq'atb'altzij pikiwi' naq ik'o prichoj, ¿kux ub'anik kowan chuchajxik jun ch'ob' che utilimit Qajwal Dios?
54003006	Xoq'je' k'ak' ajkojnelta, mpa' wene' kunimersaj rib' qaj jn nimlaj k'ax chirij chpa' jn nimlaj k'ax qaj chirij tzel.
54003007	Xoq'je' rajwixik chir utz uyolik uk'aslemal kb'an kimal wnaq chir ikojennaqta. Rechwa' chir qasest uq'ij, xoq'je' qaj tewa' chpam uklob' tzel.
54003008	Xoq'je' rajwixik chir Diáconos, k'o mejb'al kib', kyeb't (2) k'owa' kiyoloj, it ajtijel tzam, it aj riynel chirij pwaq chir k'axt kpewa'.
54003009	Rajwixik chir kikol jn rajwerem chir owtelek, rech kojb'al ruk' jn saqlaj anme'.
54003010	Rajwixik k'ut chir Diáconos kipajna nab'e wa utz kik'aslemal, tere' ke' ok che ajnimnel, chirwa k'ot kraqtaj chikij.
54003011	Xoq'je' rajwixik chir kixiqil Diáconos, k'o mejb'al kib', it aj juluw tzij, it ajq'ab'rel wnaq; suk' kikojb'al che nejel.
54003012	Xoq'je' Diáconos rajwixik chir xa' jun kixiqil, k'o kiq'atb'altzij pikiwi' kilk'wa'l xoq'je' pikiwi' naq chir ik'o chkichoj.
54003013	Mpa' naq chir kib'an jn utzlaj nimnik, sub'laj nim kiya'wa' pkijujnal, xoq'je' k'o jn nimlaj ukub'ul k'u'x kuk' rech kojb'al chirij Cristo Jesús.
54003014	Timoteo re' ri' kintz'ib'aj en chaw, tne' re' kwaj en chir kimb'e cha'nim awuk' rechwa' katb'e wula'.
54003015	Rechwa' chirwa ximb'oytejek, awet'am kux kab'an chikixo'l jun ch'ob' che utilimit Qajwal Dios, chir re'k'ut utilimit jn k'aslek Dios, ire' k'ut chir kitaqem xoq'je' kito' rij jn saqlaj tzij.
54003016	Qatzij chir sub'laj nim ub'anik jn rajwerem chir owtelek rech utzukxik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Dios; "Re'k'ut Dios chir xa'lex chqaxo'l oj wnaq, xb'an suk' che uk'aslemal rimal Loq'laj Usantil Dios, xi'il kimal utaqo'n kaj, xoq'je' xya' ub'ixik ub'i' chikixo'l wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel, xo'kes rech kimal wnaq rech uwach lew, Re'chir xelb'ik chwach lew xk'ulux pkaj."
54004001	Loq'laj Santil pasaqil kch'awek kub'ij chir ptaq uk'isb'al q'ij ik'o jujun chir kiya' knaq kikojb'al, re' kita'na kech santil chir kib'ij jo'sb'al tzij, xoq'je' re' kita'na kityojnik tzeltaq santil.
54004002	Xoq'je' re' kita'na kityojnik wnaq chir kyeb' (2) kiplaj, xoq'je' xa' sokb'al tzij kib'ij, ni'j wnaqe' b'ajernaq kanme' ire'.
54004003	Ni'j wnaqe' kib'ij ire' chir utzt kb'an k'le'b'al, xoq'je' kiq'atuj utijik chir kux ub'onom knaq Qajwal Dios rechwa' ktij ruk' tyoxnem kimal ajkojnel chir ket'am jn saqlaj tzij.
54004004	Mpa' nejel chir kux xukaneysaj knaq Qajwal Dios utz, k'ot jnaq chir ktzaq pnaq jla', chirwa kb'an jn tyoxnem che Qajwal Dios re'chir ktijek.
54004005	Mpa' rimal uyoloj Qajwal Dios xoq'je' rimal jn ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios ktewchi'xek.
54004006	Timoteo, wa re' ri' kak'ut chikiwach qaxlal, at utzlaj ajchak rech Jesucristo, xoq'je' anajsam awib' ruk' yoloj rech kojb'al, ch'il ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnik chir at taran chirij.
54004007	Xoq'je' mata' kech ni'j cho'lelim wastaq yoloj, kech wnaq chir sachnaq kino'oj, re' kojo' achoq'ab' chuk'amik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
54004008	Xoq'je' jn xik'penem, xoq'je' jn anim ruk' qaqan, xa'qe'n kchakanwa' che qakuerp, pumul uk'amik jn k'aslemal chir qaj chwach Qajwal Dios che nejel kchakanwa', mpa' k'o jn jitenem rech k'aslemal chpam, k'aslemal rech chinime' xoq'je' k'aslemal rech q'ij chir ipetnaq chqawach.
54004009	Ni'j yoloje' suk'laj kojb'al re', rajwixik k'ut chir k'am kimal nejel wnaq.
54004010	Mpa' rimal ri' chir qoj chaknek xoq'je' qakoj qachoq'ab' mpa' qakub'am qak'u'x chirij jn k'aslek Dios, re'k'ut ajsolel kech nejel wnaq, pumul naq chir kikojnek sub'lajna kiraq solb'al kib'.
54004011	Re'k'ut ri' chilb'ej xoq'je' k'utu' chke ajkojnel.
54004012	Mat' k'o jnaq kat ritzlaj xa' rimal chir at k'alaj, xa'ne' rajwixik kaya' jn k'utumb'al ruk' ak'aslemal chikiwach ajkojnel, chirij ayoloj chir kab'ij, xoq'je' chirij ano'jb'al pak'aslemal, xoq'je' chirij loq'b'al k'u'x, xoq'je' chirij asantil, xoq'je' chirij akojb'al, xoq'je' chirij jn saqlaj ak'aslemal.
54004013	Xetaq kno'pnek, nik'ij pnaq uyoloj Qajwal Dios chke ajkojnel, ya' kichoq'ab', xoq'je' tyojij qaxlal.
54004014	Maya' knaq jn nimlaj sip chir k'o awuk', chir xqaxex chaw rimal Loq'laj Santil re'chir xkiya' kiq'ab' ajwab' pawi'.
54004015	Rajwixik k'ut chir kajach awib' xoq'je' katkojo'q chpam, rechwa' chir k'uten jn ak'iyse'b'al chirij kojb'al chikiwach kinejel ajkojnel.
54004016	Chajij awib' pawechwa', xoq'je' chajij awib' chirij tyojnem chir tijen kayo'o, maya' knaq ub'anik, mpa' wa jla' ka'no, kasol awib' at xoq'je' kisoltaj naq chir kita' atyojnem.
54005001	Wa k'o naq tata' chir kmaknek, mayaj ruk' k'anlaj tzij, xa'ne' ya' uchoq'ab', chpa' uya'ik uchoq'ab' aqaw ka'no, ruk'ut chke ni'jchik elb'om ya' kichoq'ab' chpa' uya'ik kichoq'ab' achaq' ka'no.
54005002	Xoq'je' ya' kichoq'ab' chuchu'ib', chpa' uya'ik uchoq'ab' achuch ka'no. Xoq'je' chke eltom ya' kichoq'ab', chpa' uya'ik kichoq'ab' awinab' ka'no, ruk' jn saqlaj chomb'al.
54005003	Nimb'la' ya'wa' malka'ntaq ixiqib', naq chir qatzij imalka'ntaq ixiqib'.
54005004	Pumul malka'ntaq ixiq'ib' chir ik'o k'al, ik'o lewa' kiykimam, kit'maj ni'j k'la'b'e' chir rajwixik nim kiya'wa' kichuch, xoq'je' nim kiya'wa' kiti't, xoq'je' rajwixik kit'maj uya'ik rijil uk'ixel chke kichuch kiqaw jn utzil chir xb'an chke re'chir xik'iysisek, mpa' re' ri' qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
54005005	Pumul jnaq chir qatzij malka'n xaq xoq'je' chir xelknaq utikel, ukub'a'm uk'u'x chirij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' umojom utz'onxik, xoq'je' umojom ub'anik loq'laj uch'awem, chaq'ab' che paq'ij.
54005006	Pumul naq malka'n xaq chir ujochom rib' chpam uriyb'al uwach lew, jn xaqe' k'asal ukuerp pumul kamnaq che santil.
54005007	Chilb'ej ri' chke ajkojnel rechwa' k'ot kik'amwa' chpam tzij.
54005008	Pumul wa k'o jnaq chir kuya't nejel chir kux rajwixik chke rixlal chirij tyo'jil, xoq'je' k'e rilawchijt naq chir ik'o prichoj, june' uxutum knaq kojb'al, xoq'je' nimna umak chwach jnaq chir kojonaqta.
54005009	Chiya'b'la' prajlal, xo'w malka'ntaq ixiqib' chir qatanaq chik oxk'al (60) kijanab', ni'j chir xa' jun kichijil kijenaq.
54005010	Wa k'utnek chir utzlaj taqchak ub'onom, wa utz uk'iysesik ral ub'onom; wa kuya' kiwarb'al wnaq chir kipe naj, xoq'je' wa uch'ojom kiqan ajkojnel, xoq'je' wa ub'onom toq'ob' chke qaxlal chir k'o rajwixik chke. Xoq'je' wa ub'onom nejel uwach che utzlajtaq chak.
54005011	Pumul maya' prajlal malka'ntaq ixiqib' chir ik'ak'alna mpa' wene' xpe kiriyb'al chirij tyo'jil kiya' knaq Cristo, kik'le' jmulchik.
54005012	Rimal k'ut ri' kiqaj xe' jn nimlaj k'ax, rimal chir xkixo'lq'apij jn nab'e kikojb'al.
54005013	Xoq'je' kit'maj uqasesik q'ij, xa' kib'in chi'taq jaj, pumul xo'wt kiqasaj qij, xa'ne' xoq'je' kib'an ajmolel tzij, xoq'je' xa' nejel kiminwa' kib', kib'ij yoloj chir kumajt kb'i'xek.
54005014	Rechi' kwaj en chir malka'n ixiqib' chir ik'ak'alna kik'lo'q jumulchik, kojo'q kal, kib'ana' kiq'atb'altzij pkichoj, mkiya' utem kajch'oj rechwa' kiyoq'ek.
54005015	Mpa' ik'o jujun chke malka'ntaq ixiqib' chir ik'ak'alna xkiya' knaq jn utzlaj k'aslemal re' utzna xkil tarjem chirij tzel.
54005016	Wa k'o naq chij ajkojnel, naq xaq lewa' chir ik'o rixlal chir imalka'n taq ixiqib' iyutzuqu' muya' eqa'n chikij jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel, rechwa' chir ajkojnel kib'an utzil chke naq chir qatzij imalka'ntaq ixiqib'.
54005017	Ajwab' kech ajkojnel chir utz kiq'atb'altzij ki'no, kumaj chke ire' chir nim kiya'wa', pumul sub'lajna nim kiya'wa' ni'j chir kiya' ub'ixik xoq'je' kityojen chirij uyoloj Qajwal Dios.
54005018	Mpa' tyox wuj kub'ij: "Makoj chim chichi' jn kyej chir kuyaq' trig," xoq'je', "jn ajchak kumaj che chir ktoj rijil."
54005019	Mak'uluj uq'ab'xik tzij chirij naq ajwab', k'uluj uq'ab'xik tzij pumul kuk' ikyeb' (2) ixub' (3) lewa' testig.
54005020	Naqpla' chir kiya't knaq ub'anik mak, kow kiyajik b'ana' chikiwach kinejel, rechwa' kina' kib' ni'jchik.
54005021	Kinya' jn taqnik chaw chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' chwach Cristo Jesús, xoq'je' chikiwach utaqo'n kaj chir icha'telek, rechwa' kakol ni'j chpa'kux, xa' janam kilik awixlal b'ana', xoq'je' utzta chir xa' jujun k'e aloq'oj.
54005022	Xa' maya' aq'ab' pa'nim puwi' jnaqaq, rechwa' at ta jun ruk' kimak ni'jchik, chajij awib' rech ktz'ilib' tewa' ak'aslemal.
54005023	Matij chik ja', tija' qe'naq vino rimal uya'b'il apam, xoq'je' rimal kiy uwach che aya'b'il.
54005024	K'o kimak jujun wnaq chir sub'laj q'aljenek xe'taq q'at tzij pikiwi'. Pumul k'o mak kech ni'jchik chir te' q'aljenek re'chir q'ato'omchik tzij pikiwi'.
54005025	Xa'k'ut jla', utzlajtaq chak sub'laj iq'alaj, k'o xoq'je' ni'jchik utzlaj taq chak chir iq'alajta, pumul kyelnelaq che saqil.
54006001	Kinejel ajkojnel chir ik'o xe' jn yuke rech jaqlel nimnik, nimb'la' kiya'wa' kijaw rechwa' chir k'amb'ext chpam wastzij ub'i' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' utyojnik.
54006002	Ruk'ut ajkojnel chir ijaqlel ajnimnel chir ikojennaq kajaw, makib'an ch'iti'n chke, xa' rimal chir ire' i'alxek chirij kojb'al, xa'ne' sub'laj utz kinimxik kib'ana', mpa' naq chir kinimaj ire' ikojennaq xoq'je' iqaxlal chir iloq'; re'k'ut ri' k'utu' xoq'je' chilb'ej.
54006003	Wa k'o jnaq kuk'ut jnchik tyojnem, chir janamta chpa' jn ch'ajch'ojlaj utyojnem Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' janamta chpa' jn tyojnem chirij utzukxik chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios,
54006004	june' nim kuya'wa' rib', k'ot ret'am, xa'ne' lawach kub'an puwi' k'elaj tzij, puwi' k'ut ri' kpe kontrenik, xoq'je' kpe ch'ojb'al xoq'je' kpe ub'ixik wastzij, xoq'je' kpe ub'anik tzeltaq chomb'al chikij ni'jchik,
54006005	xoq'je' kpe ch'ojb'altaq tzij chir k'istechik kech chijab' chir tz'il nejel kichomb'al, xoq'je' ket'amt uwach jn saqlaj tzij, chir kikoj rech Qajwal Dios xa' rech ch'akb'al pwaq; toso' awib' chke ire'.
54006006	Pumul re' nimlaj ch'okoj jn utzukxik chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, chir ichb'lam ruk' ki'kte'mal.
54006007	Mpa' k'ot qak'omomlaq re'chir xoj k'un chwach lew, xoq'je' qatzij chir k'ot qak'amb'ik re'chir qojkamek.
54006008	Xa'k'ut jla', wa k'o qatzuqb'e qib' xoq'je' wa k'o qaq'u', qoj ki'kitaqb'la'.
54006009	Pumul nik'ij chir kaj kayen sub'laj kimib'i'l kiqaj putaqchi'b'al tzel xoq'je' kiqaj chpam ukolob' tzel, xoq'je' kiqaj chpam sub'laj che tzeltaq riyb'al chir kub'an sub'laj k'ax che kik'aslemal, xoq'je' kusach kiwach.
54006010	Mpa' jn uloq'xik pwaq re' la' ra' nejel uwach che k'ax, ik'ok'ut jujun chir loq' xkil pwaq, xkiya' knaq kojb'al, xoq'je' xkinajsaj kik'aslemal che sub'laj q'oxom.
54006011	Pumul at Timoteo, chir at rajchak Qajwal Dios, wanij awib' che nik'ij, re' kojo' achoq'ab' kat tarjaq chirij jn suk'laj k'aslemal, xoq'je' kojo' achoq'ab' chub'anik chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, chirij kojb'al, xoq'je' kat tarjaq chirij jn loq'b'al k'u'x, chirij jn kuyb'ul k'u'x, chirij jn chuch'ujlaj anme'.
54006012	Rajwixik kach'ojaj jn utzlaj ch'oj rech kojb'al, chapa' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, rimal k'ut ri' xatsik'ex rimal Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut jn kojb'al la' chir aq'aljansam chik ruk' ayoloj chikiwach sub'laj che wnaq.
54006013	Kinchilb'ej k'ut chaw Timoteo chwach Qajwal Dios, chir nejel uyo'om kik'aslemal, xoq'je' chwach Jesucristo chir xuq'aljansaj jn saqlaj tzij chwach Poncio Pilato,
54006014	chir rajwixik kakol jn taqnike' ruk't tz'il xoq'je' ruk't jn k'axlaj yaj, suk'te' k'utenna Qajwal Jesucristo.
54006015	Ko'pen k'utna uq'ijal chir q'aljenses rimal Qajwal Dios Jun chir te'wchi'm, xoq'je' Jun chir k'ot jnaq chik k'o puwi', jun Nimlaj Ajtaqnel kech Nimaqtaq Ajtaqnel, xoq'je' Tat kech Tata'ib'.
54006016	jun chir xo'w Re' k'ot kamikal chpam uk'aslemal, chir jaqal chpam jn saqil chir k'ot jnaq kowan che okem ruk', Re' k'ut chir k'ot naq wnaq ilew naq rech, xoq'je' k'ot naq wnaq kowan chirilik; che Re' k'ut jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' che Re' jn loq'laj kownem, chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
54006017	Chilb'ej chke naq chir k'o kimib'i'l rech ni'j q'ije' chir mat' kinimersaj kib', xoq'je' mat' kikub'a kik'u'x chirij kimib'i'l, mpa' mib'i'l poq'ij k'olek, ruk'ut chwaq' qet'amta, xa'ne' kikub'a' kik'u'x chirij jn k'aslek Dios, Re' k'ut kuya' nejel chir kux kchakan chqe.
54006018	Xoq'je' b'i'j chke chir kib'ana' utzil, xoq'je' kib'ana' sub'laj che mib'i'l chirij utzlaj taq chak, mat' kik'upij chuya'ik xoq'je' mat' kik'upij chujachik.
54006019	Wa jla' ki'no, kitijen chumolik jn nimlaj mib'i'l rech ni'j q'ij chir kipe chqawach, xoq'je' kichapa' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
54006020	At Timoteo, kolo' chir kux chilb'em chaw, mab'ij wastaq tzij chirij chpa'kux chir k'ot kichakanwa', xoq'je' mab'an k'elaj tzij chirij jn etamb'al, chir xa' ub'ixik chir etamb'al.
