54006021	Rimal k'ut ri' chir ik'o jujun xkiya' ub'ixik, rimal ri' chir xkiya' knaq jn b'ej rech kojb'al. Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kelknaq awuk'. B'antajaq b'la'.
55001001	En Pablo, Apóstol rech Cristo Jesús, chir encho'om rimal rajwerem Qajwal Dios chpa' jn jitenem rech k'aslemal chirij Cristo Jesús,
55001002	kintz'ib'aj chaw at Timoteo, enk'ijol chir loq' kwilo. Chaw at jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' ch'il jn k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, tne' kumajt chaw at, ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' rech Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
55001003	Kintyoxij che Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir kinnimaj chpa' unimxik xkib'an enchuch enqaw ruk' jn saqlaj anme', suk' kub'lek ketenna'taj chpam ench'awem chwach Qajwal Dios chaq'ab' che paq'ij.
55001004	Re'chir k'un uwa'l ab'aq'wach pink'u'x kwaj en kwul awach, rechwa' knaj wanme' che sub'laj ki'kte'mal.
55001005	Xoq'je' k'un pink'u'x akojb'al chir sub'laj qatzij, chir nab'e xjaqe' jn kojb'al la' ruk' awiti't Loida, xoq'je' ruk' achuch Eunice, sub'laj wet'am en, chir jn kojb'al la' k'o awuk' at xoq'je'.
55001006	Re'chi' chir kinchilb'ej chaw chir machupsaj jn urep q'a' rech jn nimlaj sip rech Qajwal Dios chir k'o awuk' chir xak'omo re'chir xinya' enq'ab' pawi'.
55001007	Mpa' Qajwal Dios xuya't chqe' oj jn santil rech nab'alib'. Xa'ne' re' xuya' jn santil rech loq'laj kownem chqe, xoq'je' jn usantil loq'b'alib', xoq'je' jn usantil jn jek'b'alib' pqechwa'.
55001008	Re'chi', chir mat'k'ix che ch'a'wem chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' mat'k'ix che ch'a'wem chuwij en, chir enk'o pche' rimal Cristo, xa'ne' chpa' jn loq'laj ukownem Qajwal Dios chir kuya' chaw, at jun ruk' jn q'oxom chir kpe rimal ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
55001009	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios xjusolo xoq'je' xoj usik'ij ruk' jn tyoxlaj sik'nem. Pumul rimalt qachak chir xoj usik'ij, xa'ne' xoj usik'ij rimal rajwerem Re', xoq'je' xoj usik'ij rimal jn loq'laj ritzil anme' chir xya' chqe chirij Cristo Jesús, jertaq tzij xe'taq kmajtajlaq uwach lew,
55001010	pumul chinime' xk'utek, rimal chir xk'uten Jesucristo ajsolel qech, Re'k'ut chir xresaj jn nimlaj uchoq'ab' kamikal, xoq'je' xresajlaq che saqil jn k'aslemal, jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik, rimal jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
55001011	Rimal k'ut chir xno'kes che ajb'inel jn k'ak' yoloj, xoq'je' xno'kes che Apóstol, xoq'je' xno'kes che ajtyojnel kech wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel.
55001012	Rimal k'ut ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloje' chir kintij ni'j q'oxmale', pumul kink'ixta, mpa' wet'am chir naq enkojennaq chirij, xoq'je' sub'laj wet'am chir Qajwal Dios sub'laj ukownem rech uchajxik suk'te' che jn q'ijla', chir kux uyo'om chwe.
55001013	At Timoteo, ruk' kojb'al xoq'je' ruk' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chirij Cristo Jesús, b'ana' ni'j utzlajtaq tyojnem chir xawet'maj wuk' en.
55001014	Ruk' loq'laj ukownem Loq'laj Santil chir jaqal quk', chajij jn utzlaj tyojnem chir xchilb'ex chaw.
55001015	Awet'am chir xinkixutuj knaq kinejel naq chir ik'o Asia. Rek'ut jujun chke ire' Figelo, ch'il Hermógenes.
55001016	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios kuya' jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chke, pikiwi' naq chir ik'o prichoj Onesíforo, mpa' k'iy rajlab'al xuya' enkowil xoq'je' xk'ixt chwilik, chir enximtel che ximb'al ch'ich'.
55001017	Xa'ne' re'chir xkije' Roma xel ch'u'j chintzukxik, suk'te' xnuraqna.
55001018	Yo'oqb'la' che Onesíforo rimal Qaqjaw chir kuraqna jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, tne' kumajt che, rech kije' chunaqaj Qaqjaw che jn q'ijla'. Timoteo at awet'am chir Onesíforo sub'laj xjuto'o pe tilimit Éfeso.
55002001	At enk'ijol Timoteo, kojo' achoq'ab' chpam jn ritzil anme' chir xaraq ruk' Cristo Jesús.
55002002	Xoq'je' chir kux ato'om chir emb'i'm chaw chikiwach sub'laj che wnaq, re'k'ut la' chilb'ej chke ajkojnel chir suk' kikojb'al chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, xoq'je' kumaj chke kityojij ni'jchik.
55002003	Re'chi' chir at Timoteo, chi'ja'b'la' jn k'ax chpa' jn k'ax chir kinch'ij en, chpa' naq utzlaj ajxolta't rech Jesucristo.
55002004	K'ot naq ajxolta't kumin rib' chub'anik chir kux kib'an wnaq chir it ajxolta't, wa qatzij kub'ono chir kux kraj rajwal chir ktaqan puwi'.
55002005	Xoq'je' naq ajtzaqal anim, k'ot kuch'oko chirwa kukojt uchoq'ab' ruk' saqlaj tzij.
55002006	Xoq'je' jn ajb'anal tiko'n, nab'ena kchaknek, tere' kutij uwach utiko'n.
55002007	Katchomnaq chirij chir kux kimb'ij chaw, re'k'ut Qajwal Dios kuya' ano'jb'al che nejel.
55002008	Na'tjaq Jesucristo chaw, chir uxe'na'al knaq David, chir xk'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib' jla' chpa' kub'ij jn k'ak' yoloj, chir yo'om chwe.
55002009	Rimal k'ut ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj chir kintij q'oxom, xoq'je' enximtel pche' kawulpa' en ajb'anal k'ax, pumul uyoloj Qajwal Dios ximtelt re'.
55002010	Rechi' chir kinch'ij nejel q'oxom xa' kimal naqpla' chir icha'tel rimal Qajwal Dios, rechwa' chir ire' xoq'je' kiraq jn solb'alib' chirij Cristo Jesús ruk' jn unimal q'ij chir k'istechik.
55002011	Saqlaj tzij kimb'ij chaw: "Mpa' wa qojkam ruk' Cristo, xoq'je' ruk' Re' qaraq k'aslemal.
55002012	Wa qatij k'ax, xoq'je' qoj taqenna ruk' Re' chpam jn nimlaj taqnik. Wa qab'ij chir qet'amt uwach, Re' xoq'je' kub'ijna chir Re' ret'amt qawach.
55002013	Wa oj suk't qakojb'al, Re' suk' ukojb'al; mpa' Re' kutzilijt uyoloj chirij."
55002014	Timoteo, maya' knaq una'texik ri' chke ajkojnel, xoq'je' chilb'ej chke chwach Qajwal Dios, chir mib'e ruk' k'elaj tzij puwi' ni'j tzij chir k'ot kichakanwa'; xa'ne' kuya' chpam jn tzaqel naq chir kitaw rech.
55002015	Kojo' achoq'ab' rechwa' kak'ut awib' chwach Qajwal Dios, chpa' naq ajchak chir k'ot kpewa' uk'ix mpa' utz roksik jn yoloj rech saqlaj tzij ku'no.
55002016	Pumul q'atuj awib' chub'ixik ni'j wastaq tzij, mpa' ni'j tzijla' xa' qoj kik'amb'ik chub'anik sub'laj mak.
55002017	Ni'j kityojnik ire' janam chpa' naq ya'b'il chir kulo'rib'. Ire'k'ut: Himeo ch'il Fileto.
55002018	Ire'k'ut chir xkiya' knaq jn saqlaj tzij, kib'ij ire' chir xq'aten k'astajb'al kech kamnaqib', xkiyoj kikojb'al jujun.
55002019	Pumul chpa' naq tz'aq' chir utz ukub'ixik b'onom, k'o jn retal chwach chir kub'ij: "Qajwal Dios ret'am kiwach naq irech Re'," xoq'je', "nejel naqpla' chir kuna'taj ub'i' Qajwal Dios utoso' rib' che nejel mak."
55002020	Pumul chpam jn nimlaj jaj, xo'wt k'o kolb'al chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq, xoq'je' xo'wt k'olek chir b'onom ruk' saq pwaq, xa'ne' xoq'je' k'o kolb'al chir b'onom ruk' che', xoq'je' b'onom ruk' lew, k'o kolb'al rech kolb'al chpa'kux chir ktijek, xoq'je' k'o kolb'al rech kolb'al tz'il.
55002021	Rechi' chir wa naq ajkojnel kuya' knaq ni'j tzeltaq chpa'kuxe', kub'anna chpa' kolb'al rech utzlaj chpa'kux, xoq'je' kub'anna tyox che uk'aslemal chir k'o kchakanwa' che rajaw, xoq'je' ujochom rib' chub'anik nejel utzlaj chak.
55002022	Wanij awib' che ni'j riyb'al kech elb'om, xa'ne' taqej jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' taqej jn kojb'al, xoq'je' taqej jn Loq'b'al k'u'x ch'il jn uxunem rech anme', kuk' ni'j chir saq kanme' kina'taj ub'i' Qajwal Dios.
55002023	Pumul q'atuj awib' che ni'j taklajtaq tzij xoq'je' ni'j taklajtaq nojb'al, mpa' t'amt'elek chir xa' ch'oj kik'amlaq.
55002024	Rajwixik k'ut chir jn jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, ajch'ojta, xa'ne' ch'uch'uj ranme' kuk' kinejel wnaq; kuraq tyojnem, xoq'je' ajch'ijel k'ax.
55002025	Xoq'je' ruk' nimlaj anme' kuya' kino'oj naq chir kik'amt tyojnem, pente'ne' kya' chke rimal Qajwal Dios chir kitzalq'amij kanme' rechwa' kit'maj uwach jn saqlaj tzij.
55002026	Xoq'je' rechwa' kik'astejek xoq'je' kitzqaptaj che ukolob' tzel, chir iximtel chub'anik chir kux kraj jn tzel.
55003001	Timoteo, xoq'je' rajwixik kawet'maj, chir che uk'isb'altaq q'ij, kipena q'ij chir sub'laj kiraq k'ax wnaq.
55003002	Mpa' kikije'na wnaq chir xo'w ire' qus kilkib', sub'laj kiriyij uwach mib'i'l, nim kiya'wa'kib', ajb'inel wastzij, kikojt rech kichuch kiqaw, k'ot utyoxil kichi', xoq'je' kib'anta chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
55003003	Kot loq'b'al k'u'x kuk', k'ot kok kuk', i'aj juluw tzij, k'ot jek'b'al ib' kuk', ch'u'j kiwach, kitzlaj uwach utzil.
55003004	Kik'ij kich'il puq'ab' rajch'oj, kichomajt nab'e kux kib'ij, re' kinna chir kux kaj ire', re' kiloq'ojna jn uriyb'al uwach lew puk'exwach uriyxik uwach Qajwal Dios.
55003005	Ni'j wnaqe', rilik chir re' kib'ono chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, pumul ire' kib'ij chir k'ot kub'iyaj jn utzukxik chir kux rech Qajwal Dios, kuk' ni'j wnaqla' mamin awib'.
55003006	Mpa' ire' ni'j wnaqe' chir k'e ok ptaq jaj, kipatz'ij taq ixiq'ib' chir k'axt kipatz'xik, chir keqam sub'laj mak, xoq'je' chir icharem rimal k'iy uwach che tzeltaq riyb'al.
55003007	Kib'ij ire' chir suk' kub'lek tijen kit'maj, pumul ikowenaqt ire' che rit'mixik jn saqlaj tzij.
55003008	Jla' k'ut ki'no chpa' Janes ch'il Jambres chir xkik'le'laj uwach Moisés, jla' k'ut ni'j chja'b'e' kik'le'laj uwach saqlaj tzij, ichija'b' chir tz'il kichomb'al, xoq'je' k'o jo'sb'al chpam kikojb'al.
55003009	Pumul najt kyo'penwa', mpa' q'aljen kitakil chikiwach nejel wnaq, janam chpa' xkik'iwsaj Janes ch'il Jambres.
55003010	Pumul at, Timoteo, at re' ataqem jn tyojnik chir xinya' chaw, xoq'je' ataqem ennojb'al, xoq'je' ataqem kux entaqem ub'anik en, xoq'je' ataqem enkojb'al, xoq'je' ataqem jn loq'b'al k'u'x, chpa' loq'b'al k'u'x k'o wuk' en, xoq'je' ataqem jn kuyb'ul enk'u'x.
55003011	Xoq'je' ataqem chir kintzukxik rechwa' kya' mak chuwij, xoq'je' ataqem ni'j k'axlajtaq enq'axom, chir janam chpa' xinraq Antioquía, ch'il Iconio, xoq'je' Listra, che nejel entzukxik rechwa' kya' mak chwij, entijom uk'axil che nejel ri' xnutzqapsajt Qajwal Dios.
55003012	Qatzij chir kinejel naqpla' kitzukuj jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal chirij Cristo Jesús, kitzukuxna rech kb'an k'ax chke.
55003013	Pumul ni'j tzeltaq wnaq, xoq'je' ni'j jo'slajtaq wnaq suk' kub'lek kib'ej prij, kisokaj wnaq xoq'je' ire' kisokex kimal wnaq.
55003014	Pumul at, Timoteo, kojo' achoq'ab' xa' jun kat kojoqwa' chpam chir kux awet'mam xoq'je' chir qatzij xa' kub'a' ak'u'x chirij rimal chir awet'am naq ruk' xawet'majwa'.
55003015	Mpa' che at ch'iti'n xawet'majlaq tyox wuj, re'k'ut chir xuya' loq'laj ano'jb'al rech solb'alib' rimal akojb'al chirij Cristo Jesús.
55003016	Nejel tyox wuj, ruk' Qajwal Dios petnaqwa', xoq'je' sub'laj kchakan che tyojnem, xoq'je' kupaxij qanme', xoq'je' kusukb'a' kik'aslemal ajkojnel, xoq'je' kchakan che tyojnik chirij jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij.
55003017	Rechwa' chir nejel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, itz'aq'at che nejel, rech ub'anik nejel utzlaj taq chak.
55004001	Timoteo chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' chwach Qajwal Jesucristo, chir kpena chpam jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij xoq'je' kuq'atna tzij pikiwi' wnaq chir ik'aslek xoq'je' pikiwi' kamnaqib', kinchilb'ej chaw.
55004002	Ya'b'la' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios, maya' knaq ub'anik, puq'ijal xoq'je' chir puq'ijalta, paxij anme', kow katyajnaq, xoq'je' ya' choq'ab' ruk' nejel kuyb'ul k'u'x, xoq'je' ruk' tyojnem.
55004003	Mpa' ko'penna jn q'ij chir wnaq kich'ij te'chik uta'ik jn utzlaj tyojnem. Xa'ne' kik'amb'ik rimal tzeltaq kiriyb'al, kitzukuj ajtyojnel, chir xo'w kik'ut chikiwach chir kux kaj ire' uta'ik.
55004004	Kaj te'chik ire' kiya' kixikin chuta'ik jn saqlaj tzij, re' kaj ire' kiya' kixikin chuta'ik tyojnem chir qatzijta.
55004005	Pumul at Timoteo, chajij awib' che nejel, chomajna nab'e chir kux ka'no, ch'ija' nejel k'ax, ya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Dios, b'ana' jn chak chir xchilb'ex chaw.
55004006	Mpa' en xa' qe'nchik kraj kinkamsesek, jn q'ij rech b'enem wech naqajchik k'owa' chwe.
55004007	Xb'antaj jn utzlaj ch'oj wumal, xoq'je' xk'is jn chak chir enmojomlaq, xa' jun k'owa' enkojb'al.
55004008	Rechi' chir koltelchik chwe en, jn corona rech jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, re'k'ut chir kuya' Qajwal Dios chwe, chir ajq'atal tzij chir suk' uq'atb'altzij, che jn q'ij, xo'wt chwe en; xa'ne' xoq'je' chke kinejel chir kiloq'oj upetb'al.
55004009	Timoteo, katpetaq chwilik cha'nim.
55004010	Mpa' Demas xnuxutuj knaq xa' rimal uloq'xik uwach lew, je' xye Tesalónica, Crescente je' xye Galacia, Tito je xye Dalmacia.
55004011	Lucas xa' utikel k'o wuk', k'ama'laq Markos awuk' mpa' sub'laj kchakan chwe chpam jn chak chir enk'omom.
55004012	Tiquico, je xintaqb'ik pe tilimit Éfeso.
55004013	Re'chir katpetek kak'amlaq jn chikete chir xinya' knaq Tróas chirchoj Carpo, xoq'je' kak'amlaq nik'ij wuj, pumul suk' rajwixik kak'amlaq, re' ni'j b'otom wuj.
55004014	Alejandro chir ajch'ayel ch'ich' sub'laj k'iy uwach k'ax ub'onom chwe, Re' Qajwal Dios kya'w rijil uk'ixel che rimal nik'ij k'ax chir xub'an chwe.
55004015	Chajij awib' at xoq'je' che Alejandro, mpa' sub'laj xuk'le'laj uwach qayoloj.
55004016	Re'chir xinsik'ix nab'e rajlab'al paq'atb'altzij rechwa' kinto' wib', k'ot jnaq xje' wuk', xa'ne' kinejel xinkixutuj knaq, kwaj k'ut chir Qajwal Dios mat' kuya' mak chikij.
55004017	Pumul Qajwal Dios xikije' wuk', Re' xuya' sub'laj enchoq'ab', chir xinkownek xinya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj, xoq'je' kita'wa' kinejel wnaq chir it Rilk'wa'l Israel, xa' k'ut jla' xintz'qaptaj puchi' koj.
55004018	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir knutzqapsaj tena che nejel tzeltaq chak, xoq'je' knukoloj rechwa' knok chpam nimlaj q'atb'altzij rech kaj, rech k'ut Re' jn unimal qij, chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
55004019	Ya'pnaq ritzil kiwach Prisca ch'il Aquila, xoq'je' kinejel chir ik'o prichoj Onesíforo.
55004020	Erasto je' xelknaq pe tilimit Corinto. Trófimo yab' xinya' knaq Mileto.
55004021	Kakuwijlaq Timoteo, xe'taq kmajtaj q'alaj. Kitaqb'ik ritzil awach Eubulo, ch'il Pudente, ch'il Lino, ch'il Claudia, ch'il kinejel qaxlal.
55004022	Re' Qajwal Jesucristo kije' ruk' asantil. Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk'. B'antajaq b'la'.
56001001	En Pablo, jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' en Apóstol rech Jesucristo, en cho'om rimal Re', rechwa' chir naq icha'tel rimal Qajwal Dios kiraq jn kojb'al xoq'je' kit'maj jn saqlaj tzij chir kraqtaj chirij ub'anik nejel chir kux k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.
56001002	Chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x rech jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. Re'k'ut jn k'aslemal la' chir xijit knaq xe'taq ktiktaj uwach lew rimal Qajwal Dios chir kjo'senta.
56001003	Pumul chinime' suk' puq'ijal xuk'ut uyoloj chqawach, rimal ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj chir xchilb'ex chwe rimal taqnik rech Qajwal Dios chir ajsolel qech.
56001004	Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chaw at Tito, at chir qas at enk'ijol xoq'je' chir qaroqom qib' chpam, loq'laj ritzil anme' ch'il k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, tne' kumajt chaw, ch'il uxunem rech anme', chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw xoq'je' chir uyo'om Qajwal Jesucristo chir ajsolel qech.
56001005	Rimal ri' chir xtinya' knaq Creta, rechwa' chir kab'an ukiji'k kuxpla' chir maja' kb'an ub'anik, xoq'je' k'e akub'a' ajwab' chikixo'l ajkojnel ptaq tilimit chpa' taqnik xinya' chaw.
56001006	Sub'laj rajwixik chir naq ajwab' k'otnaq tzij kb'ix chirij, xoq'je' xa' jun rixiqil, xoq'je' kinejel rilk'wa'l ikojennaq, chir ik'ot rilk'wa'l chpam takil ch'il chpam jn k'axlaj tzq'aptejem.
56001007	Mpa' rajwixik chir jn ajk'amal kib'ej ajyuq' chirij kojnem che Cristo, k'ot q'ab'exwa' tzij chirij, mpa' re' kril uxlaj uchak Qajwal Dios; nimt kuya'wa'rib', xa't ruk' qe'n keywarwe', ajtzamtaj, ajch'ojta, re't kutzukuj pwaq chir petnaq ruk' ub'anik k'ax.
56001008	Xa'ne' kuya' kiwarb'al wnaq chir kipe che jnchik tilimit, utz kril utzil, saq uchomb'al, suk' uk'aslemal, tyox uk'aslemal, kujek' rib' putike'lam.
56001009	Ajk'olel rech jn suk'laj tyojnem jla' chpa' utyojxik b'onom, rechwa' chir kownek kuya' kichoq'ab' xoq'je' kyuch'ak ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnem naq chir kik'lelnek.
56001010	Mpa' ik'iy chir sub'laj itak ruk' kino'jb'al, xa' nejel kib'ij, kib'ij yoloj chir k'ot ub'ej, kisoknek, pumul ni'j chir jri' kib'ij re' ni'j chir kaj ire' kb'an circuncisión.
56001011	Rek'ut ni'jla' chir rajwixik ktz'apix kichi', mpa' ire' chir kisach kik'u'x nejel wnaq rech naq jaj, kik'ut k'utumb'al chir uxlajt k'utek, xa' rimal uriyxik pwaq chir petnaq ruk' ub'anik k'ax.
56001012	Xub'ij k'ut jn ojq'axel uyoloj Dios kech aj Creta, chir kiwnaqil ire': "Wnaq aj Creta suk' kub'lek ijo's, ijanam chpa' tzeltaq awaj, i'aj wi'il, xoq'je' isaq'or."
56001013	Ni'j yoloje' chir kyolek qatzij, rimal k'ut ri' chir kow chayija' rechwa' ku'tzer kikojb'al.
56001014	Xoq'je' mat' kikoj rech kayensamtaq yoloj kech wnaq aj Israel, xoq'je' mikikoj rech kitaqnik chijab' chir k'ot saqlaj tzij chpam.
56001015	Naq chir saq kichomb'al, saq nejel chikiwach ire', pumul naqpla' chir tz'il kichomb'al xoq'je' naq k'ot kikojb'al, nejel tz'il chikiwach ire'; mpa' tz'ilib'naq kichomb'al ch'il kanme'.
56001016	Kib'ij ire' chir ket'am uwach Qajwal Dios, pumul ruk' tzeltaq kichak kik'utu' chir ket'amt uwach Qajwal Dios, itak ruk' kino'jb'al, kikont chub'anik jn utzlaj chak.
56002001	Pumul at b'i'j chir kux xa' janam uwach ruk' jn utzlaj tyojnem.
56002002	Tyojij ri'jlajtaq tata'ib' chir, saqb'aq kichomb'al, nim iyo'oqwa' kimal ni'jchik, kichomajna nab'e kux kib'ij, itz'aq'at chpam kojb'al, xoq'je' itz'aq'at chpam loq'b'al k'u'x, xoq'je' itz'aq'at chpam kuyb'ul k'u'x.
56002003	Xoq'je' k'e atyojij chuchu'ib', kimatz kataq, mkijuluj tzij, mkib'an jaqlel ajnimnel rech utijik tzam, i'ajtyojnel chirij utzil.
56002004	Kik'utu' chikiwach k'ak'altaq ixiqib' uloq'xik kichijil, xoq'je' uloq'xik kilk'wa'l.
56002005	Xoq'je' kilna nab'e chi' kiya'wa' kiqan chi', saq kanme', kijachom kib' che kitajkil ptaq kichoj, utzlajtaq ixiq'ib', kiya' kib' ptaqik kuk' kichijil, rechwa' chir kb'ixt wastzij chirij uyoloj Qajwal Dios.
56002006	Xoq'je' ya' kichoq'ab' elb'om rechwa' chir kichomenna nab'e tere' kich'awek.
56002007	Ruk'ut at rajwixik chir che nejel kak'ut ruk' ak'aslemal jn utzlaj chak chikiwach, re'chir kat tyojnik b'ana' ruk' jn saqlaj anme' xoq'je' ruk't jo'sb'al,
56002008	xoq'je' b'i'j utzlaj yoloj chir k'ot k'amwa' tzij chawij, rechwa' k'ix naqpla' chir kuk'le'laj awoch, jla' k'otnaq k'axlaj yoloj kib'ij chiwij ix.
56002009	Ya' kichoq'ab' jaqlel ajnimnel rechwa' kiya' kib' ptaqik che nejel che kajaw, xoq'je' k'amraq chir kux ki'no, xoq'je' mik'le'lnek.
56002010	Mi'elq'enek, xa'ne' rajwixik kik'utu' chir suk' kikojb'al che nejel, rechwa' chir nim kiya'wa' jn utyojnik Dios chir ajsolel qech.
56002011	Mpa' xk'uten jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios rechwa' kyusol nejel wnaq chir kikojen chirij Re',
56002012	koj utyojij k'ut, rechwa' qaya' knaq nejel kuxpla' chir rext Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' qaya' knaq tzeltaq riyb'al rech uwach lew, qojk'oso'q che ni'j jnab'e', ruk' jn saqlaj chomb'al, xoq'je' ruk' jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' qatzukuj ub'anik nejel chir kux qaj chwach Qajwal Dios.
56002013	Qayi'ej jn uk'ub'ulk'u'x, xoq'je' jn uk'utumb'al ruk' jn unimal q'ij rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ajto'l qech Jesucristo.
56002014	Re'k'ut Cristo chir xuya' rib' putike'lam pe kamikal xa' qamal oj rechwa' xojresaj che nejel mak, xoq'je' xuch'aj qak'aslemal chir oj utilimit Re', xoq'je' qab'an celosil chirij jn utzlaj chak.
56002015	Re' ri' tyojij chke ajkojnel, xoq'je' ya' kichoq'ab', xoq'je' kow katyajnaq ruk' nejel q'atb'altzij. Mat' k'o jnaqaq kuqasaj aq'ij.
56003001	Na'taj chke ajkojnel chir rajwixik kiya' kib' ptaqik chke chijab' chir k'o taqnik pe kiq'ab', xoq'je' kiya' kib' ptaqik chke q'atb'altzij, xoq'je' kib'onom chik kikiji'k chub'anik nejel utzlaj chak.
56003002	Xoq'je' mat' k'o jnaq kib'an tzij chirij, xoq'je' mich'ojen chikiwach, xa'ne' kik'utu' jn ch'uch'ujlaj anme', kik'utu' nejel uwach che unimal anme' kuk' nejel wnaq.
56003003	Mpa' oj jer xoq'je', oj tak ruk' qano'jb'al, qak'le'laj uwach Qajwal Dios, sachnaq qak'aslemal chpam qu'mal, oj jaqlel ajnimnel rech tzeltaq riyb'al, xoq'je' rech k'iy uwach che riyb'al, xoq'je' qab'an tzeltaq chomnik chikij ni'jchik xoq'je' qakontrij qib' chqawach, oj ritzlaltaq wnaq; qitzlaj qib' chqawach.
56003004	Pumul re'chir Qajwal Dios chir ajsolel qech, xuk'ut uq'osil ranme', xoq'je' xuk'ut loq'b'al uk'u'x chikiwach wnaq.
56003005	Xjusolo, xa't rimal naq utzlaj chak chir qab'onom, xa'ne' rimal uk'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' oj kumajt chqe, xoq'je' rimal chir xuch'aj qak'aslemal, xoq'je' rimal chir xub'an k'ak' che qak'aslemal rimal Loq'laj Usantil,
56003006	re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir xuya' nimlaj Loq'laj Santil pqawi' rimal Jesucristo chir ajsolel qech.
56003007	Rechwa' chir suk'chik qak'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios rimal jn loq'laj ritzil anme', kojok che rajaw jn echb'al jla' chpa' jn ukub'ul k'u'x rech jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
56003008	Jn yoloje', suk'laj kojb'al re', re'k'ut ni'j taqnike' kwaj en kakamluj ub'ixik, rechwa' chir naq ikojennaq chirij Qajwal Dios kichijij kib' chub'anik jn utzlaj chak; ni'j taqnike' utz, xoq'je' kchakan chqe oj qanejel.
56003009	Pumul ya'knaq ni'j k'elaj tzij chir k'ot utantab'al, xoq'je' ni'j k'elaj tzij chirij xe'na'al, xoq'je' ch'oj ch'il jn chapb'alib' chirij pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés, mpa' k'ot saqlaj tzij chpam xoq'je' k'ot kuya' knaq chqe.
56003010	Naq wnaq chir kujach kiwach ni'jchik, yaja' jumul che uka'mul wa kuta'ta wesajb'ik.
56003011	Q'alaj k'ut chir june', utikel kutzaq rib' chpam k'ax, xoq'je' kamna chpam umak.
56003012	Re'chir kintaqb'ik Artemas awuk', re' lewa' Tiquico, kakwijlaq kink'un ak'ulu' ptilimit Nicopolis, mpa' tla' xinchomaj uq'axexik q'alaj.
56003013	Zenas chir ajkirel pixab' rech uwach lew, ch'il Apolos ya' chke pa'nim chir kux kchakan chke rech kib'ej rechwa' chir kiq'axajt rajwixik.
56003014	Kit'majb'la' qaxlal ub'anik utzlajtaq chak, rechwa' chir pa'nim kito' naq qaxlal chir k'o rajwixik che, kiwachnaq chpa' naq che' chir kwachnek.
56003015	Kinejel chir ik'o wuk' wural, kitaqb'ik ritzil awach, xoq'je' ya' ritzil kiwach naq chir loq' qojkil chirij kojb'al. Re'k'ut jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk' iwenejel. B'antajaq b'la'.
57001001	En Pablo, chir enk'o pche' rimal ub'ixik ub'i' Cristo Jesús, ch'il qaxlal Timoteo, kintz'i'b'aj jn wuje' chaw at loq'laj qaxlal Filemón, xoq'je' at ajto'l qech,
57001002	xoq'je' kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' che loq'laj qaxlal Apia, ch'il Arquipo chir qach'il ajchak, xoq'je' che jun ch'ob' che qaxlal chir kiraq kib' chawuchoj chunimxik Qajwal Dios:
57001003	Jn loq'laj ritzil anme' xoq'je' jn loq'laj uxunem rech anme' chiw, chir uyo'om Qajwal Dios ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo.
57001004	Suk' kub'lek kintyoxij che Qajwal Dios chawij at, xoq'je' ktinna'taj chpam ench'awem chwach Qajwal Dios.
57001005	Mpa' kinta' ub'ixik jn loq'b'al ak'u'x ch'il akojb'al chirij Qajwal Jesús, xoq'je' loq'b'al ak'u'x ch'il akojb'al chke kinejel ajkojnel.
57001006	Kinta' k'ut che Qajwal Dios rechwa' chir akojb'al chir ayo'om chke ni'jchik ajkojnel, sub'laj kownel che ritmixik nejel utzil chir k'o iwuk' rimal Cristo Jesús.
57001007	Mpa' sub'laj qojki'ktek xoq'je' xjorob' qanme' chirij loq'b'al ak'u'x, mpa' awumal at loq'laj qaxlal chir xkub'e' kanme' ajkojnel.
57001008	Rimal ri' tne' k'o uq'atb'altzij Cristo wuk' rechwa' kinya' jn taqnik chaw chir suk' rajwixik kb'anek.
57001009	Pumul ruk' loq'b'al k'u'x kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw, en Pablo, en nimaj wnaq chik, xoq'je' chinime' enk'o pche' rimal ub'ixik ub'i' Jesucristo.
57001010	Kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw chirij Onésimo chir enk'ijol chirij kojb'al, re'k'ut xkojnek re'chir xinya' utzij Qajwal Dios che chpa' entzab'telwa' wural pche'.
57001011	Re'k'ut chir nab'e knaq k'ot xtuto'wa', pumul chinime' kchakan chaw at xoq'je' kchakan chwe en.
57001012	Re'k'ut chir kintzilij b'ik awuk', k'uluj kawulpa' janam chpa' en, chir ruk' re' b'enaqwa' wanme'.
57001013	Kwaj tne' en chir kije' Onésimo wuk' rechwa' kub'an ak'exwach, knunimaj chpa' entzab'telwa' pche', rimal ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
57001014	Pumul k'ot ximb'an en chemat' xawet'maj at, kwajt en ktinch'ik'mij chub'anik toq'ob' chwe, re' kwaj en chir pawanme' kpewa' ub'anik toq'ob' chwe.
57001015	Mpa' pente'ne' rimal ri' xutos rib' kyeb'xub' ik' Onesimo chaw, rechwa' chir chinime' kije' awuk' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq,
57001016	jla't chik chpa' jn jaqlel ajnimnel, xa'ne' nimchik ub'anik chwach jn jaqlel ajnimnel, mpa' re' loq'laj qaxlal chik, nim ub'antik chwe en; pumul chaw at sub'laj nimna ub'antejik xo'wta chir jaqlel aj nimnel awech, xoq'je' awixlal chik chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
57001017	Wa en, en akojom che awich'il, k'ulujb'la' Onésimo, chpa' enk'ulxik en ka'no.
57001018	Wa k'o naq k'ax ub'onom chaw k'o lewa' uk'as awuk' toq'wichij chwe en.
57001019	En Pablo, kintz'ib'aj b'ik jn wuje' chaw ruk' enq'ab', chir en kintojow rech; pumul kwajt en kimb'ij chaw chir at, ak'asna ak'aslemal chwe.
57001020	Jla'k'ut at wixlal, kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw, wa k'onaq kinch'ak chawij pub'i' Qaqjaw; ya'b'la' uchoq'ab' wanme', pub'i' Cristo.
57001021	Kub'e' enk'u'x chawij, mpa' at kaya' awib' ptaqik, re'chi' xintz'ib'ajb'ik jn wuje' chaw, wet'am en chir xo'wt ka'no chir kux xinta' chaw.
57001022	Xoq'je' kimb'ij chaw chir b'ana'pnaq ub'anik enwarb'al, mpa' wiyi'em chir rimal ich'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios; re' kuya' chwe chir kimb'e iwuk'.
57001023	Kutaqb'ik ritzil awach Epafras, wich'il chir enk'o pche' rimal ub'i' Cristo Jesús.
57001024	Xoq'je' kitaqb'ik ritzil awach Markos ch'il Aristarco ch'il Demas ch'il Lucas chir i'ajto'l wech chub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj.
57001025	Jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Jesucristo kelknaq ruk' isantil. B'antajaq b'la'.
58001001	Qajwal Dios, sub'laj rajlab'al xyuch'ab'ej qachuch qaqaw jertaq tzij xoq'je' k'iy uwach kich'ab'xik xu'no kimal ajq'axal uyoloj,
58001002	pumul ruk'ut che ni'j uk'isb'altaq q'ije' Qajwal Dios qoj uch'ab'ej rimal Uk'ijol, re'k'ut xub'an rajaw nejel echb'al Che, xoq'je' rimal Re', Qajwal Dios xub'an nejel uwach kaj lew;
58001003	re'k'ut Qajwal Jesucristo, kuk'ut jn unimal uq'ij Qajwal Dios, Re' k'ut kuk'utu chir kux ub'anik Qajwal Dios, Re' k'ut kuya' uk'u'x nejel chir k'olek ruk' uyoloj nimlaj ukownem, xuch'aj qanme' che nejel qamak xa' rimal Re' putike'lam, xoq'je' xkub'e' puse'b'al loq'laj ukub'ulb'al Qajwal Dios pkaj.
58001004	Qajwal Jesucristo nimna ub'anik chikiwach taqo'n rech kaj, mpa' Re' xrechb'e jn b'i' chir k'otchik k'owana chikiwach kib'i' utaqo'n kaj.
58001005	Mpa' Qajwal Dios ¿mijumul xub'ij chke utaqo'n kaj: At, At Enk'ijol poq'ij xtintiko? ¿Xoq'je' xub'ijt che naq utaqo'n kaj: En, knok che Aqaw, ruk'ut at, ktok che Enk'ijol?
58001006	Pumul chpam jnchik chqab' tyox wuj kub'ij, re'chir Qajwal Dios xutaqlaq jun che Uk'ijol kuk' wnaq rech uwach lew xub'ij: Iwenejel utaqo'n kaj chinimersaj uq'ij Enk'ijol.
58001007	Qajwal Dios xch'a'w chikij utaqo'n kaj, kub'ij: Chir re' kub'an chpa' kiq'i' chke taqo'n rech kaj, ruk'ut chke ajnimnel rech kub'an chpa' urep q'a' chke.
58001008	Pumul chirij Uk'ijol kub'ij: Jn loq'laj akub'ulb'al at nimlaj Dios rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq; cetro rech chir xa' janam ub'anik nejel, jla' ucetro jn nimlaj aq'atb'altzij.
58001009	Sub'laj xaloq'oj jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, Re' xawitzlaj uwach tzeltaq mak, rimal ri' Qajwal Dios chir aDios xujam aceite pawi', aceite rech ki'kte'mal chir xtunimersaj chikiwach awich'il.
58001010	Xoq'je' Qajwal Dios xub'ij chirij Uk'ijol: At, nimlaj Dios, re'chir xmajtajlaq xajaqb'a' uwach lew, xoq'je' kaj aq'ab' xb'anew rech.
58001011	Nejel ire' ksachna kiwach, pumul At, ksacht awoch, nejel ire' kiq'eleb'na chpa' naq t'zaq' q'ub'al,
58001012	xoq'je' kab'usu chpa' ub'usik naq t'zaq' k'ul, kajalo chpa' jnaq chir kujal uq'u', pumul At, katk'extajta, k'ist ak'aslemal.
58001013	Pumul, ¿Qajwal Dios mijumul xub'ij che jnaqaq chke utaqo'n kaj: Katkub'oq pinse'b'al, suk'te' k'e Enya'na awajch'oj xe' awuqan?
58001014	Mpa' ¿kinejel utaqo'n kaj isantil chir i'ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios, chir itoqomlaq chikinimxik naq chir kik'am che echb'al jn solb'alib'?
58002001	Rechi' chir rajwixik chir ruk' rok'b'alil qojchomen chirij ni'j chpa'k'ux chir qato'om chir kux kub'ij Qajwal Dios, rechwa' qaya't knaq qakojb'al.
58002002	Mpa' wa uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xkiya' ub'ixik utaqo'n kaj xel che qatzij, xoq'je' nejel mak ch'il nejel takil chir xb'anek, xya' rijil uk'ixel,
58002003	¿kux ub'anik chir qoj tz'aqptaj knaq oj che jn k'ajse'b'al wach, chirwa qalawchijt jn nimlaj solb'alib'? Re'k'ut Qajwal Jesús chir nab'e xuya' ub'ixik jn solb'alib'e', xkub'a'x k'ut ub'ixik kimal naq chir xitaw rech,
58002004	xoq'je' Qajwal Dios xuq'aljansaj chir kux kib'ij ire', ruk' nimaqtaq k'utumb'al xoq'je' ruk' mayjab'al xoq'je' ruk' k'iy uwach che uk'utumb'al ukownem Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ruk' Loq'laj Usantil chir uyo'om chqe chpa' rajwerem Re'.
58002005	Mpa' Qajwal Dios xuya't chixe' kiq'atb'altzij utaqo'n kaj jn k'ak' uwach lew chir petnaq chqawach chir qoj tijen che yoloj chirij chinime'.
58002006	Pumul chpam jnchik praj rech tyox wuj kub'ij: "¿Kux ub'anik jn chij chir kub'lek kna'taj chaw?, xoq'je' ¿kux ub'anik jn rilk'wa'l chij, chir kasaqij?
58002007	Xoq'je' chir xab'an qe'n ch'iti'n che, chikiwach utaqo'n kaj, xoq'je' xaya' ucorona rech unimal uq'ij xoq'je' xaya' che chir kmej ib' chwach xoq'je' xaya' puwi' jn chak chir ab'onom ruk' aq'ab',
58002008	nejel xaya' xe' raqan." Mpa' re'chir Qajwal Dios xuya' nejel xe' uq'atb'altzij, k'ot naq chpa'kux chemat' k'o chixe' uq'atb'altzij, pumul qe'oj maja'na qilo chir kya' nejel xe' uq'atb'altzij.
58002009	Pumul qilk'ut chir Jesús xe'ses qe'n che unimal uq'ij chikiwach utaqo'n kaj, pumul xb'an coronar che unimal q'ij xoq'je' che mejb'al ib', rimal jn uq'oxmal kamikal, rech chir xa' rimal ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios, Jesús xuk'am kamikal rimal qanejel oj.
58002010	Mpa' kumaj che jun chir rech re' nejel chpa'kux, xoq'je' xa' rimal re' ik'o' nejel chpa'kux, chir re' kyuk'amb'ik sub'laj ilk'wa'lxel chpam jn unimal q'ij, kb'an suk' che kik'aslemal rimal uq'oxom jn rajaw jn solb'alib' kech ire'.
58002011	Mpa' Re' Jesús kyutos kik'aslemal ajkojnel, xoq'je' naq chir ktos kik'aslemal, kinejel ire' xa' jun kiqaw Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios, rimal k'ut ri' chir Jesús k'ixt re' chub'ixik rixlal chke,
58002012	xub'ij Jesús che Qajwal Dios: Kinya' ub'ixik Ab'i' chikixo'l wixlal, chikixo'l ajkojnel chuwij En, kimb'ixaj b'ixnik chaw At.
58002013	Xub'ij k'ut jumulchik: En, kinkub'a'na Enk'u'x chirij. Xub'ij xoq'je': Wral Enk'owa', En ch'il alk'wa'lxel chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chwe.
58002014	Rimal k'ut ri', chir chpa' alk'wa'lxel chir ityo'jil xoq'je' ikik', Re' xoq'je' xa' janam chpa' oj, rechwa' kusach uwach rimal ukamikal jun chir k'o nimlaj choq'ab' rech kamikal ruk', june', re' jn tzel.
58002015	Xoq'je' xyutzqapsaj kinejel naq chir xa' rimal uxib'alkib' che kamikal, nejel kik'aslemal k'o chpam jn jaqlel nimnek.
58002016	Mpa' qatzij chir Cristo re't xyusol utaqo'n kaj, xa'ne' xyusol uxe'na'al knaq Abraham.
58002017	Rimal k'ut ri' rajwixik chir Cristo xa' janam ub'anik che nejel chpa' rixlal, rech kub'an Re' jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, chir xa' jun k'owa' ukojb'al xoq'je' chir k'axk'ab' uk'u'x chpa' kraj Qajwal Dios rechwa' kub'an jn tz'aqatlaj tojnem rech kimak kinejel wnaq rech uwach lew.
58002018	Mpa' xoq'je' Re' xutij k'ax, xoq'je' xtaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel, rechi' Re' kowan chkito'ik naq chir kitaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel.
58003001	Rechi', ix wixlal chir tostal ik'aslemal rimal Qajwal Dios, chir ix jun che jn sik'nem rech kaj, kixchomnaq chirij jn Apóstol xoq'je' ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, re'k'ut Cristo Jesús.
58003002	Mpa' Jesús Re' ukolom ranme' che jun chir xkub'an rech, jla' xoq'je' Moisés Re' xukol ranme' che nejel richoj Qajwal Dios.
58003003	Qatzij k'ut chir Jesús kumajna che Re' jn nimlaj mejb'al ib' chwach Moisés, chpa' jnaq chir kub'an naq jaj, june' nimna mejb'al ib' che re' chwach jn jaj chir xu'no.
58003004	Mpa' jn jaj k'o jn ajb'anal rech, pumul Re' Qajwal Dios xub'an nejel chpa'kux.
58003005	Qatzij k'ut chir Moisés chpa' naq ajnimnel xukol ranme' che nejel rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios, rech uq'aljensesik chir kux kub'ijna Qajwal Dios,
58003006	pumul Cristo chir alk'wa'lxel Re' xukol ranme' puwi' richoj Qajwal Dios, ojk'ut jn richoj Qajwal Dios, chirwa qaya't knaq jn ki'kte'mal chirij jn ukub'ulk'u'x chir k'o quk' suk'te' che uk'isb'al.
58003007	Rimal k'ut ri', chpa' kub'ij Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios chir tz'ib'tal chpam tyox wuj: Wa kita' uch'ab'al poq'ij,
58003008	mikowersaj iwanme' chpa' xkib'an jertaq qachuch qaqaw re'chir xkik'le'laj utaqnik Qajwal Dios che jn q'ij rech pajb'al pe chiqi'j jib'.
58003009	Tla'k'ut xinkipajwa' ichuch iqaw, xoq'je' tla' xkilwa' Enchak che ka'wnaq (40) janab'.
58003010	Rimal k'ut ri' xub'an kyeb' (2) Enk'u'x chirij jn xe'na'al la' ximb'i'j k'ut: 'Ni'j wnaqe' sachnaq kanme', xoq'je' ket'mamt Emb'ej.'
58003011	Ximb'ank'ut jun juramento ximb'i'j: 'Ni'j wnaqe' kyok'tena chpam jn uxunem wech.'
58003012	Chiwula' k'ut wixlal mat' k'o jnaq chixo'l ix chir k'o mak pranme' xoq'je' k'ot ukojb'al chir kutos rib' che jn k'aslek Dios.
58003013	Xa'ne' chiyija' iwib' chiwach che nejeltaq q'ij, chpa' kb'ixek "poq'ij," rechwa' k'ot jnaq kowar ranme' rimal jn jo'sb'al rech mak.
58003014	Mpa' oj, k'o qech ruk' Cristo rechwa' chir suk'te' che uk'isb'al xa' jun qaya'wa' jn ukub'ul qak'u'x jla' chpa' xqamajlaq.
58003015	Rechi' chir kb'ixek: "Wa xita' uch'ab'al Qajwal Dios poq'ij mikowersaj iwanme', chpa' xkib'an qachuch qaqaw re'chir xkik'le'laj uwach Qajwal Dios."
58003016	¿Naqk'ut ni'j chir xkita' uch'ab'al Qajwal Dios xoq'je' xkik'le'laj uwach Qajwal Dios? ¿Ire't k'ut kinejel jnik'pla' chir xyel laq Egipto rimal Moisés?
58003017	Xoq'je' ¿naq chikij xpe uk'anal Qajwal Dios, che ka'wnaq (40) janab'? ¿Kuk' tuk'ut nik'ij chir ximaknek xoq'je' xikamek, ruk'ut kityo'jil xelknaq pch'qij jib'?
58003018	Xoq'je' ¿naq chke ni'j xub'ij saqlaj tzij chir kyo'kt chpam jn uxumb'al rech Qajwal Dios, xa'ne' chke ni'j chir xkiya't kib' ptaqek che Qajwal Dios?
58003019	Qilk'ut chir ire' xikowent che okem chpam jn uxumb'al rech Qajwal Dios rimal chir xikojent che Re'.
58004001	Rechi' tne' k'ona jn jitenem rech jn okem chpam jn uxumb'al rech Qajwal Dios, qachijij qib' mpa' wene' k'o jnaq chiw ix chir kowent churaqik.
58004002	Mpa' xoq'je' chqe oj xya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj janam chpa' xya' ub'ixik chke ire', pumul uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xkito'o k'ot xchakanwa' chke ire', mpa' naq chir xkito'o k'ot kikojb'al chirij uyoloj Re'.
58004003	Pumul naq chir xojkojnek xojok chpam jn uxumb'ale'. Xa' k'ut jla' xub'ij: Rechi' chir ximb'an jurar chpam Enk'anal chir kyo'ktena chpam jn uxumb'al wech, tne' Qajwal Dios xuk'is knaq uchak re', re'chir xtiktajlaq uwach lew.
58004004	Mpa' tz'ib'tal knaq chpam jn chqab' rech tyox wuj chirij jn uwuq (7) q'ij: Xu'xun Qajwal Dios che nejel uchak che uwuq (7) q'ij.
58004005	Jmulchik kub'ij tyox wuj: Kyo'kt chpam jn uxumb'al wech.
58004006	Rechi', mpa' ik'ona jujun chir i'oknaqt chpam jn uxumb'al la' ruk'ut chke ni'j chir nab'e xya' ub'ixik chke xyokt chpam jn uxumb'al rimal chir ire' xkiya't kib' ptaqek.
58004007	Jumulchik Qajwal Dios xucha' jn q'ij, re'k'ut "poq'ij," kub'ij: Xq'aten k'ut sub'laj q'ij, xub'ij k'ut che uchi' David, chpa' b'im: "Wa xita' uch'ab'al poq'ij mib'an kow che iwanme'."
58004008	Mpa' wa Josué ch'at xuya' ki uxunem Rilk'wa'l Israel, kch'a'wtre' Qajwal Dios chirij jnchik q'ij rech uxumb'al.
58004009	Rechi' chir k'ona jn loq'laj uxumb'al kech utilimit Qajwal Dios.
58004010	Mpa' naq xok chpam jn uxumb'al rech Re' xoq'je' ku'xen che uchak, jla' chpa' Qajwal Dios xu'xnek re'chir xk'is uchak.
58004011	Rimal k'ut ri' qakojo'b'la' qachoq'ab' rech kojok chpam jn uxnemla', rechwa' chir k'ot jnaq qaj chpam jn k'axlaj k'amb'al nojb'al rech takil.
58004012	Mpa' uyoloj Qajwal Dios k'aslek xoq'je' sub'laj ukownem, sub'laj k'urenna chwach jn michit chir ka' praj rey, k'urnek xoq'je' kokek kub'an kyeb' (2) che qanme' ch'il qasantil, xoq'je' chpa' iweqtelwa' qab'aqil xoq'je' kowan chuq'atik tzij chirij qachomb'al xoq'je' chir kux k'o chpam qanme'.
58004013	K'otnaq chpa'kux chir kaneysam chemat' k'uten chwach Qajwal Dios, xa'ne' nejel ich'anlek xoq'je' iteb'el chwach b'aq'wach jun chir chwach Re' qajachna chir kux qab'onom.
58004014	Rechi', k'o k'ut jn nimlaj ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj qech oj chir xo'pen chwach Qajwal Dios suk'te' pkaj, Re'k'ut Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, rechi' rajwixik xa' jun qoj wab'aqwa' chpam jn kojb'al chir k'o quk'.
58004015	Mpa' jn Ajwab' kech Ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir qech oj, Re' k'axk'ab' uk'u'x che qatuqa'ril mpa' xoq'je' Re' xtaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel, jla' chpa' oj chir qoj taqchi'x chub'anik mak, xo'w mpa' Re' xmakenta.
58004016	Rechi' chir qojqetaq b'la' ruk' jn loq'laj kub'ulb'al rech jn ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios, ruk' jn ukub'ul k'u'x, rech qak'amwa' jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chqe, xoq'je' qak'amwa' jn ritzil anme' rech kojuto'wa' re'chir k'o rajwixik chqe.
58005001	Mpa' kinejel ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj xa' cho'om chikixo'l chijab', xjaqb'a'xek rech kib'anwa' kik'exwach wnaq chwach Qajwal Dios xoq'je' rechwa' kijach kisip xoq'je' rech kiparij taq awaj chwach Qajwal Dios rimal mak,
58005002	rechwa' chir re' k'o kuyb'ul uk'u'x kuk' ni'j chir k'ot ket'am xoq'je' kuk' ni'j chir kisochom kib'ej mpa' re' xoq'je' sutennaq rij che tuqa'ril,
58005003	rimal k'ut utuqa'ril re' mpa' xa' wnaq nab'e kujit chwach Qajwal Dios rech sachb'al umak re' xoq'je' rech sachb'al kimak wnaq.
58005004	K'ot k'ut jnaq xa' che jla' kuk'am jn chak rech mejb'al ib', xa'ne' jnaq chir sik'im rimal Qajwal Dios chpa' Aarón.
58005005	Jla' xoq'je' Cristo, Re' xuya't unimal uq'ij putike'lam chir kukoj rib' che ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, xa'ne' Re' Qajwal Dios xub'ij che: At, At Nk'ijol, En xtintik poq'ij.
58005006	Jla' xoq'je' kub'ij chpam jnchik praj rech tyox wuj: At, At ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq jla' chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.
58005007	Ruk'ut Cristo re'chir k'olaq putyo'jil xuta' toq'ob' ruk' ka'melal, ruk' sik'nem ch'il q'ej che Qajwal Dios, chir xo'w Re' kowan chusolik che jn kamikal, xta'taj uyoloj rimal Qajwal Dios rimal chir Re' uyo'om rib' ptaqek.
58005008	Cristo tne' Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios, rimal jn k'axk'olil xrit'maj uya'ik rib' ptaqek;
58005009	re'chir xtzaq'at puk'aslemal nejel chir kux kraj Qajwal Dios, xub'an jn solnem che kamikal chir k'istechik kech nejel naq chir kikojnek;
58005010	xjaqb'a'x k'ut rimal Qajwal Dios chpa' jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj jla' chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.
58005011	Chirij ri' k'ona sub'laj yoloj, chir k'ax ukirik uwach, xa' rimal chir ix kib'anta chir kux kito'o.
58005012	Mpa' qatzij chir sub'laj janab'chik q'atannaq, kumojo cha't ix chik ajtyojnel pumul k'ona rajwixik chiw chir jnaqaq kuk'utna chiwach nab'etaq saqlaj tzij rech uyoloj Qajwal Dios, ix k'ona rajwixik chiw utijik tu' chwach utijik kowlaj tib'lil.
58005013	Mpa' nejel wnaq chir kutijna tu' maja' ret'am uch'ob'ik jn yoloj rech jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij rech Qajwal Dios, mpa' june' janam chpa' naq k'al,
58005014	pumul jn kowlaj tib'lil kech naq chir irijab' chik, kech ni'j chir ket'amchik uq'atik tzij, mpa' ket'am chik ucha'ik uwach naq che utz, naq che utzta.
58006001	Xa' k'ut jla', qaya' knaq ni'j nab'etaq tyojnem chirij uyoloj Cristo, rech qataqej jn k'iyse'b'al rech ktz'aq'at qachomb'al. Mix tyojen jumulchik chirij ni'j rajwixiktaq tyojnem chpa', jn utzalq'amixik anme' chirij uya'ik knaq ni'j chak chir k'oj uk'amb'ik pe kamikal, xoq'je' chirij jn kojb'al che Qajwal Dios,
58006002	ch'il tyojnik puwi' qasnik ja', ch'il jn uya'ik qaq'ab' pikiwi' ajkojnel ch'il puwi' jn k'astajb'al kech kamnaqib' ch'il puwi' jn q'ataj tzij rech uk'isb'al q'ij.
58006003	Rek'ut ri' qa'no wa jla' k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.
58006004	Mpa' kumajt chke naq chir xa' jumul xkik'am jn saqil, xoq'je' utz xkina' jn loq'laj sip rech Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' ijun xkichb'ej Loqlaj Usantil Qajwal Dios,
58006005	xoq'je' utz xkina' jn utzlaj uyoloj Qajwal Dios xoq'je' utz xkina' jn nimlaj ukownem jn k'aslemal chir petnaq chqawach,
58006006	wa xitzaq jumulchik che kikojb'al, kb'an k'ak' chke jumulchik rech kitzalq'amij kanme', kirip k'ut jumulchik chwach cruz Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' kiya' payoq'b'al tzij.
58006007	Mpa' naq jib' chir kub'eq' ja' rech jab' chir k'iy rajlab'al qaj puwi', kuya' k'ut utzlajtaq chaj chke naq chir kichakij uwach, jn jib'e' Qajwal Dios kuya' uq'ab' puwi',
58006008	pumul naq jib' chir k'ix uwach xoq'je' k'o tzel chaj chwach, xa' qe'nchik kraj kya' mixq'ab' puwi', k'isb'enik kparex paq'a'.
58006009	Ix loq'laj taq qaxlal, tne' jri' qoj ch'awek, qe'oj sub'laj qet'am chir ix, iwiyi'em kux qas uq'osil rech jn solb'alib'.
58006010	Mpa' Qajwal Dios suk' uq'atb'altzij, ksacht che Re' jn ichak chir ib'onom xoq'je' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir ik'utum che ub'i' Re', xinimaj k'ut tyox ajkojnel, xoq'je' tijenna kinimaj chinime'.
58006011	Pumul uriyb'al qanme' oj chir ix ptaq ijujnal kitaqej ub'anik jn nimnek ruk' nejel iwanme' suk'te' ktz'aqatna jn qatzijlaj ukub'ul ik'u'x,
58006012	rech kib'antewa' saq'or xa'ne' chib'ana' chpa' kib'an ni'j chir rimal kikojb'al xoq'je' rimal jn kuyb'ul kik'u'x kecheb'ej jn jitenem rech Qajwal Dios.
58006013	Mpa' re'chir Qajwal Dios xub'an jn jitenem che Abraham, mpa' kumaj tuk'ut kub'an juramento chirij jnaq chik chir nimna chwach Re', Qajwal Dios chirij Re' putike'lam xub'anwa' jurar,
58006014	xub'ij Qajwal Dios che Abraham: Qatzij chir sub'laj kinya'na Enq'ab' pawi' xoq'je' sub'laj kimpoq'sajna uwach axe'na'al.
58006015	Ruk'ut Abraham xriyi'ej ruk' kuyb'ul k'u'x, xuk'am k'ut jn jitenem.
58006016	Mpa' qatzij chir wnaq re'chir kib'an jurar kik'am pnaq ub'i' jnaq chir nimna ub'anik chikiwach ire', re'k'ut jn juramento chir kukub'a' ub'ixik chir kux b'im, chri' k'ut k'iswa' nejel k'elaj tzij.
58006017	Rechi' chir Qajwal Dios xoq'je' xub'an jn juramento rechwa' kuk'ut chikiwach naqpla' chir kechb'ejna jn jitenem, chir Re' kuk'ext jn jitenem chir xub'an che Abraham.
58006018	Rechi' k'o quk' oj, jn jitenem ch'il jn juramento rech Qajwal Dios, ni'j kyeb' (2) kik'extajtaj, chirij k'ut ri' Qajwal Dios loq't ksoknek, xoq'je' kuya' qachoq'ab', re'chir qaya' knaq nejel, rechwa' qachap qib' che jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir Qajwal Dios xuya' chqawach.
58006019	Jn ukub'ul k'uxe' xa' janam chpa' jn ch'ich' chir sub'laj al chir kb'ix ancla che' chir kchike' chpam mar chir kow kuyuqej ch'ich' chir kib'in puwi' ja', jn ukub'ul k'uxla' re'k'ut qa ancla oj chir uyuqem qanme' xoq'je' oknaq suk'te' chirij jn nimlaj k'ul chpam loq'laj jaj chir k'o pkaj,
58006020	chpa' xokwa' Jesús xa' qamal oj, chir xna'b'aj chqawach chub'anik ukiji'k qab'ej, xb'an jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj che, rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.
58007001	Melquisedec re' nimlaj ajtaqnel rech Salem, xoq'je' ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, rech nimlaj Dios, chir xelb'ik chuk'ulik Abraham re'chir xtzalajlaq pe ch'oj che kich'akik nimaqtaq ajtaqnel, ruk'ut Melquisedec xuya' uq'ab' puwi' Abraham.
58007002	Ruk'ut Abraham xujach ulajujil (10) puq'ab' Melquisedec rech nejel chpa'kux chir xuch'aklaq pe ch'oj. Jn b'i' Melquisedec nab'e kukiro "nimlaj ajtaqnel rech suk'laj q'atb'altzij," xoq'je' "nimlaj ajtaqnel rech tilimit Salem," re'k'ut ri' "nimlaj ajtaqnel rech jn uxunem rech anme'."
58007003	Melquisedec k'ot uqaw xoq'je' k'ot uchuch xoq'je' k'ot uxe'na'al, k'ot majb'al rech uq'ijal xoq'je' k'ot k'isb'al uk'aslemal, xa'ne' janam xb'an che chpa' Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios, re' ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58007004	Kixchomnaq chirij june' chir sub'laj nim uq'ij, chir re' jun Abraham chir qaqaw jertaq tzij, xuya' ulajujil (10) re' chirij nejel chpa'kux chir xuraqlaq pe ch'oj.
58007005	Utaqnik Qajwal Dios kub'ij chir ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj uxe'na'al knaq Leví, yo'om chke ire' chir kik'am lajujil (10) puwi' tilimit che nejel, tne' nik'ije' ire' ikixlal xoq'je' i'uxe'na'al knaq Abraham.
58007006	Pumul Melquisedec, chir uxe'na'alt Leví, xuk'am ulajujil (10) Abraham xoq'je' xuya' uq'ab' puwi' Abraham chir b'onom knaq jitenem che rimal Qajwal Dios.
58007007	K'ot k'ut k'elaj tzij chirij, jun chir nim ub'anik xutewchi'j jun chir ch'iti'n ub'anik.
58007008	Qatzij chir chinime' naq chir kik'am lajujil (10) xa' ichijab' chir xa' irech kamikal, pumul tyox wuj kch'a'w chirij chir Abraham chir xuya' ulajujil (10) che Melquisedec, jun chir k'asalna.
58007009	Kumojo qab'ij chir, Leví jun chir kuk'am ulajujil (10) chinime' pikiwi' tilimit, re' xtoj knaq ulajujil (10) rimal Abraham.
58007010	Mpa' Leví k'onelaq putyo'jil Abraham chir uqaw jertaq tzij re'chir Melquisedec xuk'ul Abraham.
58007011	Jn nimnek chpam loq'laj jaj aj levítico cha't kraqtaj jn suk'laj k'aslemal chirij, mpa' xe' re' xya'wa' pixab' rech Qajwal Dios chke Rilk'wa'l Israel, ¿rajwixiktre' kaneyses junchik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chpa' ub'antejik Melquisedec chir jla't ub'anik chpa' Aarón?
58007012	Mpa' wa k'exta ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rajwixik k'exta pixab' xoq'je'.
58007013	Mpa' chirij Jesús jri' kb'ixek, Re' che junchik ch'ob' ktanwa', jn ch'ob' la' k'ot jnaq chke ire' xnimen chu' altar rech loqlaj jaj jertaq tzij.
58007014	Mpa' sub'laj q'alaj chir Qajwal Jesús je' xpe ruk' jn ch'ob' rech Judá, k'ot k'ut xub'ij knaq Moisés chirij jn nimnik rech loq'laj jaj.
58007015	Xoq'je' sub'laj q'aljenna chirwa kwa'laj naq ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir janam chpa' Melquisedec,
58007016	chir xjaqb'a'xta chpa' kub'ij pixab' chirij xe'na'al xa'ne' rimal jn loq'laj ukownem jn k'aslemal chir rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58007017	Mpa' Qajwal Dios xch'a'w chirij Jesús chpam tyox wuj, xub'ij: At, At, ajnimnel pwichoj rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq chpa' ub'anik Melquisedec.
58007018	Mpa ksach k'ut uwach jn nab'e taqnik rimal utuqa'ril xoq'je' rimal chir k'otchik kb'antaj rimal.
58007019	Mpa' jn pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés nab'e k'ot xkowan chusuk'b'axik, pumul puk'exwach re' xoklaq jn utzlaj ukub'ul k'u'x, rimal k'ut Re' qojqet ruk' Qajwal Dios.
58007020	Qajwal Dios xujaqb'a' ub'ixik ruk' juramento, mpa' ni'jchik ploq'laj jaj xkik'am jn uk'amik b'ej ruk't juramento,
58007021	pumul chirij Qajwal Jesús, Qajwal Dios xub'an jurar, mpa' tyox wuj kub'ij: Qajwal Dios xub'an jurar, Re' kutzalq'amijt ranme' chirij chir kux xub'ij: "At, At ajnimnel pwichoj rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq."
58007022	Rimal jn juramento, Jesús xuya' jn chapb'al q'ab' rech jn pacto, chir utzna chwach jun nab'e.
58007023	Ruk'ut ni'jchik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj ire' sub'laj ik'iy, mpa' rimal kamikal chir kresaj kik'aslemal kikon techik kib'an ajk'amal b'ej rech unimxik Qajwal Dios,
58007024	pumul mpa' Jesús uk'aslemal Re' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, rechi' jn nimnik chpam loq'laj jaj chir xya' che rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58007025	Rechi' chir Re' k'asal chb'e q'ij chb'e saq rechwa' kch'a'w pikiwi' ire' xoq'je' kowan chkisolik chb'e q'ij chb'e saq naq chir rimal Re' kiqet ruk' Qajwal Dios.
58007026	Mpa' jla' kumaj chqe oj jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj: Tyox, k'ot umak, k'ot tz'il chirij, utosom rib' chke ajmakib', chir nimna b'onom che chwach kaj,
58007027	Jesús k'ot rajwixik che Re' nejeltaq q'ij chpa' ni'jchik ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, chir nab'e kiparij awaj chwach Qajwal Dios rimal kimak ire', tere' kiparij awaj rimal kimak wnaq, mpa' Jesús xa' jumul ub'anik xu'no rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, mpa' Re' xujit uk'aslemal putike'lam rech tojb'al qamak.
58007028	Mpa' pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés xyukoj che ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chijab' chir tuqa'r kanme'. Pumul rimal jn juramento rech Qajwal Dios chir xtarajlaq chirij pixab', Jesús chir Uk'ijol xb'an tzaq'at che uk'aslemal chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58008001	Xa' k'ut jla', re'k'ut ri' qas rajwixik chir qoj tijen chub'ixik chinime', chir k'o jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, qech oj, re'k'ut chir xkub'e' puse'b'al loq'laj kub'ulb'al rech unimal uq'ij Qajwal Dios pkaj,
58008002	Re'k'ut june' chir knimen chpam jn loq'laj luwar rech jn loq'laj wokom jaj, xoq'je' knimen chpam qas richoj Qajwal Dios, chir Re' Dios b'anawnaq rech, naq chijt b'anawnaq rech.
58008003	Mpa' nejel ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj xjaqb'a'xek rech kujach che Qajwal Dios sipnek xoq'je' kuparij awaj chwach Qajwal Dios, rechi' rajwixik jn k'ak' ajk'amal b'ej chir Jesucristo, k'o, k'o ruk' rech kujitwa' che Qajwal Dios.
58008004	Rechi' cha't Cristo k'o wural chwach lew kuk'amb'alo Re' jn eqle'n che ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, mpa' wural ik'ochik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir kijit sip che Qajwal Dios chpa' kub'ij pixab'.
58008005	Ire' k'ut ni'je' kinimen chpam jn loq'laj luwar chir xa' esb'al uwach xoq'je' xa' umuj chir kux k'o pkaj, jla' chpa' xb'i'x che Moisés rimal Qajwal Dios, re'chir xa' qe'nchik kraj kub'an jn wokom jaj rech Qajwal Dios. Wla' chi'ntere chir jla' kab'an che chpa' jn uwachb'al chir xk'ut chawach chu' jib'.
58008006	Pumul chinime' Jesús xuk'am jn chak chir sub'laj utzna chikiwach ni'jchik ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, mpa' Re' aj ok'sel tzij rech jn k'ak' pacto chir tiktel puwi' utzlajtaq jitenem.
58008007	Mpa' mat' k'ona jech' chpam jn nab'e pacto chir xb'anek, rajwixiktre' kb'an jn ukab' (2) pacto.
58008008	Mpa' Qajwal Dios kow xyuyaj Rilk'wa'l Israel, xub'ij: chiwula'much chir petnaq jn q'ij chir kinjaqb'a'na jn k'ak' pacto ruk' richoj Israel xoq'je' ruk' richoj Judá.
58008009	Mpa' janamta chpa' jn pacto chir ximb'an kuk' ichuch iqaw, chpam jn q'ij re'chir xinchap chkiq'ab' xiwesajlaq pujuyb'al Egipto, mpa' ire' xijeqe't chpam jn pacto wech En, ruk'ut En, xe' enya' knaq, xcha' Qajwal Dios.
58008010	Rechi' chir re' ri' jn pacto chir kimb'anna ruk' Israel xo'w q'atan ni'j q'ijla', xcha' Qajwal Dios, kinya'na Enpixab' pikiwi' ire' xoq'je' kintz'ib'ajna pe kanme', En, knokna che kiDios, ruk'ut ire' kyok'na che Entilimit.
58008011	Xoq'je' k'ot jnaq kuk'ut chwach rijil utzaq'at, k'ot jnaq kuk'ut chwach rixlal, kub'ij k'ut che: "Wit'maj uwach Qajwal Dios," mpa' kinejel ket'majna Enwach, kmajtaj b'ik ruk' naq ch'iti'n k'al suk'te' ruk' naq nimaj wnaq.
58008012	Mpa' En kinsach tzeltaq kimak xoq'je' k'un te'chik kimak pink'u'x.
58008013	Rechi', re'chir Qajwal Dios kch'a'w chirij jn "k'ak' pacto," Re' xresaj uchoq'ab' jn jer pacto, kuxpla' chir kokes che q'el kchakan te'chik xa' qe'nchik kraj ksach uwach.
58009001	Rechi' chir chpam jn nab'e pacto k'o taqnik rech unimersesik uq'ij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' k'o jn wokom loq'laj jaj rech Qajwal Dios chir xa' rech uwach lew.
58009002	Mpa' jn wokom jaj rech Dios chir xb'an nab'e chpam jn nab'e tanaj chir kb'ix loq'laj luwar che, k'o k'ut tla' jn candelero, jn mexe ruk' kixlinwaj chir cho'om rimal Qajwal Dios.
58009003	Chirij k'ut jn uk'ab' (2) jn nimlaj k'ul k'owa' jn praj rech Loq'laj wokom jaj chir kb'ix qas loq'laj luwar che.
58009004	K'o tla' xoq'je' jn altar chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq rech kparexwa' pom, xoq'je' k'o tla' jn kaxe rech pacto chir nejel rij kojom q'an pwaq che, chpam k'ut re' k'o jn kolb'al chir b'onom ruk' qan pwaq chir k'o maná chpam, xoq'je' k'o uvara Aarón chir xtuxnek xoq'je' ik'o tla' tz'alam b'aj rech pacto.
58009005	Puwi' jn kaxe' ik'o uwachb'al kyeb' (2) utaqo'n kaj rech unimal q'ij chir querubines kib'i' chir kitz'apij ruk' umujal kixik' jn luwar chpa' kitzkixwa' kik' rech sachb'al kimak wnaq rimal Qajwal Dios. Pumul chirij ri' kumajt chinime' sub'laj qojyolwek.
58009006	Jri' k'ut ub'anik ukiji'k ri' xb'an knaq, k'e ok k'ut ajnimnel chpam wokom jaj rech Dios tla' che nab'e tanaj rech richoj Qajwal Dios rech kib'an tla' jn nimnik che Qajwal Dios.
58009007	Pumul che jnchik ukab' (2) tanaj xo'w jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj kok tla', xa' jumul che jun janab', re'chir kokek rajwixik kuk'amb'ik kikik'el awaj rech kujit chwach Qajwal Dios, nab'e chirij re' putike'lam rimal umak, xoq'je' chikij wnaq chir kimaknek rimal chir k'ot ket'am.
58009008	Ruk' ri' jn Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios xuk'ut chqawach chirwa jn nab'e wokom richoj Dios tijenna kchaknek, maja'na b'are' kuk'ut jn b'ej chir koj uk'amnab'ik chpam jn loq'laj luwar.
58009009	Nejel ri' kawulpa' jn k'amb'al nojb'al che ni'j q'ije', mpa' nejel sip ch'il taq awaj kijit chwach Qajwal Dios, kikowenta kisuk'b'a' kanme' naq chir jri' unimxik Qajwal Dios ki'no.
58009010	Mpa' xa' waj xoq'je' xa' ja' ch'il k'iy uwach che noq'b'al rech ch'ajb'al, taqnik nuk'ut pumul xa' rech chajb'al qatyo'jil, xchaknek suk'te' re'chir Qajwal Dios kuk'ex ri'.
58009011	Pumul chinime' chir k'ochik Cristo chir ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rech utzil chir kipena chqawach. Re'k'ut chir knimen chpam jn wokom loq'laj jaj chir sub'laj nim xoq'je' k'ot jech' che, chir ruk't kiq'ab' chijab' b'onomwa', qab'ij chir rext uwach lew.
58009012	Xa' jumul k'ut xok Cristo pe jn loq'laj luwar rech richoj Qajwal Dios rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, ruk' te'chik kikik'el mamtaq k'isik' ch'il mamtaq wakix xa'ne' ruk' ukik'el Re', rechwa' xuch'ak jn tzqab'tejem che mak rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58009013	Mpa' wa kikik'el mamtaq k'isik' xoq'je' kikik'el mamtaq wakix xoq'je' uchajil taq ti't wakix kju'b'ex chikij naq chir sub'laj tz'il kij, kikownek kib'an tyox chke chir ksaqab' knaq kij.
58009014	¡Pa'tlo jn ukownem ukik'el Cristo, chir rimal jn Loq'laj Santil rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq xujit rib' putike'lam che Qajwal Dios chir k'ot tz'il che rechwa' kuch'ajna iwanme' che kamnaq lajtaq chak rechwa' kinimaj jn k'aslek Dios!
58009015	Rechi' chir Cristo Re' aj ok'sel ch'a'wem rech jn k'ak' pacto mpa' ruk' ukamikal kusach kimak wnaq chir ximaken knaq chixe' nab'e pacto, rech naq chir isik'im kik'am jn jitenem chir k'ixtechik.
58009016	Mpa' jn wuj chir tz'ib'tal echb'al chpam, te' kchaknek, chirwa ki'ilna nab'e wa xkam jn wnaq chir xb'anew rech.
58009017	Mpa' jn wuj chir tz'ib'tal echb'al chpam k'ot ub'anik chirwa k'asalna ajya'l echb'al, te' k'o ub'anik pumul wa xkom ajya'l echb'al.
58009018	Rechi' jn nab'e pacto chir xuya' Qajwal Dios xjaqb'a'x knaq ruk' kik'.
58009019	Mpa' Moisés xuya' ub'ixik nejel taqnik rech upixab' Qajwal Dios chke nejel wnaq, xuk'am kyaq lana ch'il jn uq'ab' jn che' chir hisopo ub'i' xuchq'alsaj chpam kikik'el raltaq wakix ch'il kirnere ch'il ja' tere' xukitzkij chirij jn b'otom wuj rech pixab' xoq'je' xukitzkij chikij wnaq.
58009020	Ruk'ut Moisés xub'ij chke wnaq: "Re'ri' jn kik' rech jn pacto chir xub'an Qajwal Dios iwuk'."
58009021	Xoq'je' xukitzkij kik' chirij jn wokom loq'laj jaj xoq'je' xukitzkij chikij kolb'al chir ko'ksek re'chir knimex Qajwal Dios.
58009022	Chpa' kub'ij pixab', xa' qe'nchik kraj mat' nejel xb'an ch'aj che ruk' kik', loq' tuk'ut kchup naq mak chemat' ktix kik'.
58009023	Rechi' rajwixik kiparex awaj rechwa' kb'an ch'aj chke ni'j chpa'kux chir xa' wochb'al kech chpa'kux chir ik'o pkaj, pumul chpa'kux chir qas ik'o pkaj rajwixik chke ire' jn sip chir k'otchik k'owa' chwach ni'j la'.
58009024	Mpa' Cristo je't xok chpam jn loq'laj luwar chir k'o chpam loq'laj jaj chir b'onom kimal chijab' chir xa' uwachb'al jn qatzijlaj tyox luwar, xa'ne' Cristo je' xok suk'te' pkaj rechwa' kuk'ut rib' chwach Qajwal Dios xa' qamal oj.
58009025	Mpa' xokt Cristo pkaj rech kujit rib' k'iy rajlab'al, chpa' kub'an jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir kok chpam jn loq'laj luwar chir k'o chpam loq'laj jaj chetaq janab' ruk' kik' chir rext re'.
58009026	Mpa' wa cha't jla', sub'laj b'are' k'iy rajlab'al kam Jesucristo suk'te' che xmajtajlaq uwach lew. Pumul chinime' jla'ta, Qajwal Jesucristo xk'uten che uk'isb'al taq q'ij, xa' jumul xk'utnek rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq rechwa' kresaj chikixo'l wnaq jn mak rimal ukamikal.
58009027	Xa' k'ut jla' xjaqb'a'x knaq, chir wnaq xa' jumul kikamek, xo'w q'atan ri' kpe jn q'atajtzij,
58009028	xoq'je' Cristo xa' jumul xjitek (chpa' awaj chir kiparxik), rechwa' kuchup kimak sub'laj che wnaq, k'utenna che uka'mul (2) rajlab'al pumul k'otchik rech che mak, xa'ne' kpetek rechwa' kyusolwa' naq chir kiyi'em upetb'al.
58010001	Mpa' pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj knaq Moisés, re' xa' janam chpa' muj rech utzil chir kipena chqawach, qatzij k'ut chir re't qas ukayb'al, rechi' loq't ksuk'e' kik'aslemal naq chir kiqet ruk' Qajwal Dios rimal ujitik awaj nejel taq janab'.
58010002	Mpa' cha't awaj chir kik'amlaq wnaq rech kiparxik kikowan chub'anik suk' che kik'aslemal ire', k'ot nuk'ut chike' kimak xoq'je' rajwixik te'chik kiparex awaj chwach Qajwal Dios nejel taq janab'.
58010003	Pumul re'chir kiparex awaj chwach Qajwal Dios nejeltaq janab' kna'tex mak chir b'onom che jn janab',
58010004	mpa' kikik'el k'ijoltaq wakix xoq'je' kikik'el mamtaq k'isik' loq't kikowan chusachik mak.
58010005	Rechi' re'chir Cristo xk'un chwach lew xub'ij che Qajwal Dios: At Kawajta chir kiparex awaj chawach xoq'je' kawajt At sip chir kijit chaw, pumul xa'b'an ukiji'k Entyo'jil rech krip chawach cruz.
58010006	Xiqajt chawach At chir xiparex awaj chawach xoq'je' xiqajt chawach sip chir xijit chaw rech chupseb'al mak.
58010007	Tere' ximb'i'j chaw, "Wula'much At Dios wech chir kimpetek chub'anik ajwerem awech jla' chpa' tz'ib'tal knaq chuwij En chpam loq'laj b'otom wuj."
58010008	Nab'e xub'ij Cristo: Qajt chawach At awaj ch'il sip chir kijit chawach, xoq'je' qajt chawach awaj chir kiparxik xoq'je' sip rech kuyb'ul mak chir kijit chawach. Rek'ut la' kijitek jla' chpa' kub'ij pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés.
58010009	Xoq'je' ub'im: Wla' much, En, En petnaq chub'anik ajwerem awech. Wesaj k'ut chir k'o nab'e re'k'ut jn kiparxik awaj rechwa' kajaqb'a' jn ukab' (2), re'k'ut ukamikal Cristo.
58010010	Rimal k'ut rajwerem Qajwal Dios chir xtos qak'aslemal rimal jn sip chir re'k'ut utyo'jil Cristo chir xa' jumul xijitek rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58010011	Qatzij k'ut chir nejel ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj nejeltaq q'ij knimen chpam loq'laj jaj chir k'iy rajlab'al xa' jun uwach che parim awaj kujito chir mijunuj kikowent chusachik mak.
58010012	Pumul jn ajk'amal b'ej rech unimxik Qajwal Dios re'k'ut Jesucristo chir xa' jumul xujach utyo'jil rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq rimal qamak, tere' xkub'e' puse'b'al Qajwal Dios.
58010013	Jri' k'ut k'e chqawach Re' riyi'em suk'te' re'chir Qajwal Dios kuya'na rajch'oj xe' raqan.
58010014	Mpa' xa' ruk' jun che sip xub'an suk' che kik'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq naq chir tostal kik'aslemal.
58010015	Xa' janam k'ut kub'ij Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios chqe, nab'e kub'ij:
58010016	Rek'ut ri' jn pacto chir kimb'anna kuk' ire' xo'w q'aten ni'j q'ije' xcha' Qaqjaw, kinya' Enpixab' ptaq kanme' xoq'je' kintz'ib'ajna ptaq kiwi'.
58010017	Xoq'je' xub'ij: "Mijumul k'unchik kimak pink'u'x xoq'je' k'un te'chik pink'u'x tzeltaq kichak chir kib'onom."
58010018	Rechi' chir chpa' k'owa' sachb'al mak rajwixik te'chik kb'an sip chirij mak.
58010019	Rechi' ix qaxlal xa' rimal ukik'el Jesús k'o jn ukub'ul k'u'x quk' rechwa' kojo'pen chpam jn loq'laj luwar rech loq'laj jaj,
58010020	rimal jn k'ak' xoq'je' jn k'aslek b'ej chir xute'b'a' Cristo chqawach rimal jn nimlaj k'ul, qojcho'q chir Re' utyo'jil Re'.
58010021	Re'k'ut Jesús jn Ajwab' Kech Ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj, chir qech oj, chir k'o pikiwi' rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios.
58010022	Qoqetaq b'la' ruk' Qajwal Dios ruk' jn anme' chir k'o saqlaj tzij ruk', xoq'je' pe jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir kuya' kojb'al, chisaqab'saj iwanme' chir k'o tzeltaq chomb'al chpam, ruk' kik' chir xtix piwanme' xoq'je' chich'ija' ityo'jil ruk' saqlaj ja'.
58010023	Xa' jun qaya'wa' qakojb'al chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x mpa' suk' ranme' jun chir xujit knaq chqe.
58010024	Xoq'je' nimb'la' qaya'wa' qib' chqawach rechwa' nim qaya'wa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x xoq'je' nim qaya'wa' ni'j utzlajtaq chak.
58010025	Mqaya' knaq umulxik qib' rech unimersesik ub'i' Qajwal Dios chpa' kib'an jujun chir k'amannaq chke, xa'ne' qaya' anme' chqawach, pa'tlo chinime' chir tijen qetlaq jn q'ij rech upetb'al Qajwal Jesucristo.
58010026	Mpa' wa nab'e qak'omom chik jn etamb'al rech jn saqlaj tzij tere' qoj makan ruk' nejel uk'uxlal, k'otchik naq sip kumojo chir qaya' chwach Qajwal Dios rimal qamak.
58010027	Xa'ne' xo'w chik kelknaq reyb'exik jn xub'ilib' laj q'ataj tzij rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' reyb'exik jn nimlaj q'a' chir kusachna kiwach rajch'oj Qajwal Dios.
58010028	Naq chir kuq'ab' pixab' chir xutz'ib'aj Moisés, wa ik'o kyeb' (2) xub' (3) lewa' chir kiq'aljansaj umak, k'otchik k'axk'ab'al k'u'x ktaq ukamsesik.
58010029	¿Chichomaj k'ut chir sub'lajna nimna k'ajse'b'al wach kya' che jnaq chir kuyaq' cha'qan Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kukoj che tz'il ukik'el jn pacto, chir re' jn kik'la' xub'an tyox che uk'aslemal, xoq'je' kuyoq' jn Loq'laj Santil rech jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios?
58010030	Pumul qet'am uwach jun chir xub'ij: Wech En uya'ik rijil uk'ixel, En kinya'na tojb'al xcha' Qaqjaw, xub'ij jumulchik: Re' Qaqjaw kuq'at tzij pikiwi' utilimit.
58010031	Nimlaj k'axlaj b'onoj qajem puq'ab' jn k'aslek Dios.
58010032	Pumul k'unaq pik'u'x ni'j q'ij chir xq'atenek re'chir te' qas xik'am ix jn saqil rech utzij Qajwal Dios, ix xich'ij ruk' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x ni'j k'axk'olil chir xpe chiwij.
58010033	K'o jumul chir qatzij, ix ruk' yoq'nem xoq'je' ruk' nimaqtaq q'oxom xya' ik'ix chikiwach wnaq, jumulchik xijunuj iwib' kuk' naq chir jla' tijen kb'an chke.
58010034	Xoq'je' ix xk'axk'ab' ik'u'x chke naq ik'o pche', xoq'je' re'chir xmaj chpa'kux iwech ruk' ki'kte'mal xiya' knaq, mpa' ix iwet'am chir ix, k'o jn imib'i'l pkaj chir sub'laj k'otchik k'owa' xoq'je' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58010035	Mitzaq pnaq jla' jn ukub'ul ik'u'x mpa' nimna tojb'al rech re' kya' chiw.
58010036	Mpa' rajwixik jn kuyb'ul k'u'x rech chirwa xb'an rajwerem Qajwal Dios, ix kik'omo chir kux jitom chiw.
58010037	Qajwal Dios kub'ij: Mpa' xa' qe'nchik kraj, jun chir kpetek, kpena, kb'oytajtena.
58010038	Pumul jun chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios k'ise'na xa' rimal kojb'al, pumul wa ktzalaj chirij k'amart uk'aslemal chwach Dios.
58010039	Pumul qe'oj ojt ni'j chir kitzalaj chikij rech kib'e chpam jn tzaqel xa'ne' oj, oj ni'j chir k'o qakojb'al rechwa' qakol qanme'.
58011001	Rek'ut kojb'al jn ujaqb'axik chpam qanme', chir qatzij kya'na chqe chir kux qayi'em, tne' qilt uwach chir kux qayi'em, qakoj ruk' qanme' chir qatzij k'olek.
58011002	Rimal kojb'al jertaq wnaq xk'amer kik'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios.
58011003	Rimal kojb'al qach'ob'o chir kux ub'anik xwnaqerses uwach kaj lew, chir xa' rimal uyoloj Qajwal Dios xb'antajwa', rechi' chir kux qil chinime' je' xb'an ruk' chir kux iq'alajta.
58011004	Rimal kojb'al Abel xujit jn k'otchik k'owelaj sip che Qajwal Dios chwach usip Caín, rimal k'ut ukojb'al Abel xb'an suk' che uk'aslemal, Abel tne' kamnaqchik pumul kch'awna chir kux xu'no.
58011005	Rimal kojb'al Enoc chirij Qajwal Dios chir k'aslek xk'amb'ik rechwa' krilt kamikal, xraqta te'chik re' mpa' Qajwal Dios xk'amawb'ik rech, kub'ij k'ut tyox wuj Dios chir Enoc xe'taq k'amb'ik xk'amer uk'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios.
58011006	Pumul wa k'ot kojb'al loq't qoj k'amer chwach Qajwal Dios, mpa' rajwixik naq chir qet ruk' Re', ukojo' chir k'olek, ruk'ut Qajwal Dios kuya' nimaqtaq sip che naq chir ktzuken rech.
58011007	Rimal kojb'al Noé, re'chir Qajwal Dios xuna'b'ajsaj ub'ixik chpa'kux che chir iq'alajtena, ruk' mejb'el ib' xub'an jn arca, rech kisoltajwa' uk'ijol, ch'il kixiqil uk'ijol ch'il rixiqil re' rimal k'ut jn kojb'ale' Noé xye uya' xe' mak wnaq rech uwach lew, xoq'je' xb'an aj echb'al rech kaj che rimal chir suk' xukojo chir kux xb'i'x che rimal Dios.
58011008	Abraham rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios, re'chir sik'ex rimal Qajwal Dios xuya' rib' ptaqek, xelb'ik che jn luwar chpa' k'owa', je xye che jn chqab' jib' chir xya' che, che echb'al, xel k'utb'ik ret'amta jalchi' k'owa' jn chqab' jib'la' chi'.
58011009	Abraham rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xjaqe' chpam jn luwarla' chir xijit che rimal Qajwal Dios, chpa' naq wnaq chir kpe che jn najlaj tilimit, xkije' k'ut chpam wokom jaj ch'il Isaac, ch'il Jacob chir ijun che jn echb'al la'.
58011010	Mpa' Abraham xriyi'ejna re' jn nimlaj tilimit chir kub'ul puwi' jn kowlaj tz'aq', chir re' Qajwal Dios xtzaqaw rech xoq'je' re' xwa'lsen rech.
58011011	Xoq'je' Sara rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios chir tne' suk' uk'omom laq chir ka'lanta, xya' uchoq'ab' rech alnem, xuya' k'ut chwach q'ij saq jn ral chir rimal ujanab' rech te'chik re' alnem, mpa' xukojo chir suk' ranme' jun chir xjitew rech.
58011012	Rechi' Abraham chir xa' jun che chij, tne' xa' xe'taq ukamikal chik xkije'na sub'laj uxe'na'al chpa' ch'imil chir ik'o pkaj xoq'je' chpa' seneb' chir k'o chichi' ja' rech mar chir k'ot ka'jlan rech.
58011013	Kinejel ire' xijaqe' xa' rimal kojb'al xoq'je' xikamek, xkiraq tuk'ut chir kux xijit chke, che naj k'ut xkilwa' pnaq xoq'je' xkit'maj uwach xoq'je' xkiya' ritzil uwach, xoq'je' xkiq'aljansaj ub'ixik chir ire' iwnaq chir je' kipe che naj tilimit xoq'je' chir xa' i'aj q'axeltaq wnaq chwach lew.
58011014	Mpa' naq chir jri' kib'ij, sub'laj q'alaj chir tijenna kitzukuj qas kitilimit.
58011015	Cha't kichomajna chirij jn jib' chpa' xyelwa'laq qatzij chir k'onare' luwar chke kitzalaj b'ik jumulchik tla'.
58011016	Pumul ire' sub'laj xkiriyijna jn k'otchik k'owelaj tilimit, re'k'ut jn tilimit rech kaj, rechi' Qajwal Dios k'ixt re' chir kb'ix Dios che kimal ire', mpa' ub'onom jn nimlaj tilimit chke ire' pkaj.
58011017	Abraham rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios, re'chir Qajwal Dios xupaj ukojb'al, xujit k'ut uparxik Isaac chu' altar chwach Qajwal Dios, tne' Abraham uk'omom chik jn jitenem, xujit k'ut Isaac chir xa' jun che uk'ijol rech kuparij chwach Qajwal Dios.
58011018	Mpa' Qajwal Dios ub'im chik che Abraham chir rimal Isaac kikije'na uxe'na'al.
58011019	Xuchomaj k'ut Abraham: Wa re' ku'no chpa' utaqnik Qajwal Dios ret'am chir Qajwal Dios k'o loq'laj ukownem chir kowan chuya'ik uk'aslemal naq kamnaq, chwach re' kawulpa' xkomna uk'ijol, tere' xk'astaj jumulchik chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
58011020	Isaac rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xuya' uq'ab' pikiwi' Jacob ch'il Esaú chirij chir kux petnaq chqawach.
58011021	Jacob rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios xe'taq ukamikal xuya' knaq uq'ab' pikiwi' rilk'wa'l José ptaq kijujnal, xunimersaj k'ut uq'ij Qajwal Dios xa' utaxim chik rib' tza'm uch'imi'y.
58011022	José rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios re'chir xkamek xch'a'w knaq chirij kelb'al Rilk'wa'l Israel pe tilimit Egipto xoq'je' xuya' knaq taqnik chirij chir kux kb'an che ub'aqil re'.
58011023	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios re'chir xa'lex Moisés xo'wax kimal uchuch uqaw xub' (3) ik', mpa' xkilo chir sub'laj qus ka'yek, xoq'je' xkixijt kib' che taqnik chir xutz'ib'aj nimlaj ajtaqnel rech Egipto chir kikamses taq ne' laj riyumam Israel.
58011024	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Moisés re'chir xub'an chij xuk'am te'chik chir kb'ix ral umya'l Faraón che.
58011025	Moisés re' xucha' utijik k'axk'olil kuk' utilimit Qajwal Dios chwach jn ki'kte'mal rech ub'anik mak chir xa' rech kyeb'xub' q'ij.
58011026	Mpa' sub'laj utzna xril re' jn k'ixb'al rech Cristo chwach jn mib'i'l rech Egipto, mpa' re' je' xuya' uwach chirij jn nimlaj sip chir jitom che rimal Qajwal Dios.
58011027	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Moisés xelb'ik xuya' knaq Egipto, xuxijt rib' che uk'anal nimlaj ajtaqnel rech Egipto, xa' jun xuya'wa' uchomb'al kawulpa' chir tijen kril uwach Qajwal Dios chir q'alajta.
58011028	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Moisés xuk'ul nimq'ij rech Pasc xoq'je' xutaq roksik kik' che uchi'taq jaj rechwa' chir taqo'n ajkamsel kech nab'etaq kilk'wa'l wnaq aj Egipto, kub'ant k'ax chke ire'.
58011029	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Rilk'wa'l Israel xkiram kyaq mar chpa' q'atnem pe chq'ij lew, ruk'ut ajxolta't rech Egipto kaj ire' jla' ki'no kiq'axek chpa' xkib'an aj israelita, pumul ire' xijeq' knaq paja'.
58011030	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Rilk'wa'l Israel xisuten wuqub' (7) q'ij chirij tz'aq' rech tilimit Jericó, ruk'ut ni'j tz'aqe' xitzaqek.
58011031	Rimal kojb'al chirij Qajwal Dios Rahab jn xaq chir kwar kuk' nejel chijab', xkamt re' kuk' nejel wnaq chir kiya't kib' ptaqek che Qajwal Dios, mpa' re' ruk' jn uxunem rech anme' xyuk'uluj chirchoj ajya'l wach kech Rilk'wa'l Israel.
58011032	¿Kux chik kimb'ij chiw? Sub'laj q'ij kraj chir kimb'ij chiw chir kux xub'an Gedeón ch'il kux xub'an Barac xoq'je' kux xub'an Sansón ch'il kux xub'an Jefté xoq'je' kux xub'an David ch'il kux xub'an Samuel ch'il ub'ixik chir kux xkib'an ajq'axal uyoloj Qajwal Dios,
58011033	chir xa' rimal kojb'al xikon chkich'akik nimaqtaq taqnik, xkib'an jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, xikon churaqik jn ujitnem Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' xkitz'apij kichi' koj,
58011034	xkichupsaj uchoq'ab' nimaqtaq q'a', xikon xkesaj kib' puchi' michit, xkesajlaq sub'laj choq'ab' che kituqa'ril, xkixijt kib' che ch'oj, xkaqtaj ajxolta't chir kipe che naj tilimit.
58011035	Ik'o ixiqib' chir xkilna uwach kikamnaq rimal chir xik'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib'. Pumul ni'jchik chir xiya' pe q'oxom xkaj tuk'ut chir kitzqapses rechwa' kiraq jn utzlaj k'astajb'al chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
58011036	Ik'o ni'jchik chir xya' kik'ix xoq'je' xkitij ch'ay xoq'je' xixim che ximb'al ch'ich', xyo'kses pche'.
58011037	Xib'an cha'b'aj xoq'je' xik'ur che cierre xb'an pnik'aj chke, xoq'je' xpaj kikojb'al, xikamses che michit, xipeqe'k xixule'k kikojom utz'umil kirnere ch'il kapri't chikij, imub'a', xya' q'oxmal ruk' kanme', sub'laj xb'an k'ax chke.
58011038	Kumaj tuk'ut chke wnaq rech uwach lew chir ni'je' kikije' chikixo'l, mpa' xipeqe'k xixule'k ptaq chiqi'j jib' xoq'je' chu'taq jib' xoq'je' ptaq pak ch'il ptaq jul xe'taq lew.
58011039	Ni'j wnaqe' xk'amer kik'aslemal chwach Qajwal Dios rimal kikojb'al, pumul k'ot jnaq chke ire' xuk'omo chir kux ujitom Qajwal Dios,
58011040	jri' xraqtejek rechwa' kyo'penta chirwa oj k'ot kuk', mpa' Qajwal Dios xub'an jn chomnik pqawi' oj chir sub'laj utzn a.
58012001	Rechi', oj chir isutennaq chiqi'j sub'laj che testig kawulpa' rilik sutz' chir kiq'aljamsam kikojb'al, qesajb'la' pnaq jla' nejel eqa'n xoq'je' nejel mak chir kuq'atuj qab'ej, tere' qatzaqa' qanim ruk' kuyb'ul k'u'x chpam jn b'ej rech qak'aslemal chir k'o chqawach,
58012002	qatuyuj xo'w Qajwal Jesús mpa' Re' ajmajb'al rech xoq'je' ajsuk'b'al rech qakojb'al, re'k'ut chir rimal jn ki'kte'mal chir kya'na che Re', xutij k'ax ruk' ukamikal xoq'je' xk'ixta xrip chwach cruz, pumul chinime' kub'ul puse'b'al loq'laj kub'ulb'al rech Qajwal Dios.
58012003	Rechi' chir kixchomnaq chirij Jesús, re'k'ut chir xutij sub'laj k'ax pkiq'ab' ajmakib', rechwa' chir mkosek xoq'je' mub'an kyeb' (2) iwanme',
58012004	mpa' ix, tixnaqta ikik'el rimal uk'le'lxik uwach mak.
58012005	Cha'nim sach chiw jn utzlaj yaj rech Qajwal Dios chir chpa' elk'wa'lxel kub'ij chiw: "Wilk'wa'l mawitzlaj uwach jn suk'b'enik rech Qaqjaw. Xoq'je' mub'an tuqa'r awanme' re'chir kow ktujek'o.
58012006	Mpa' Qajwal Dios kusuk'b'a' naq chir loq' krilo, xoq'je' kuya' uxk'ayil nejel naqpla' chir kuk'am che rilk'wa'l."
58012007	Wa jn suk'b'enik rech Qajwal Dios, re' kub'an chiw chpa' alk'wa'lxel, mpa' ¿naq, naq alk'wa'lxel chemat' ksuk'b'a'x rimal uqaw?
58012008	Pumul wa kixsuk'b'axta, chir kinejel k'ut xiq'atan chpam, ixb'are' mub'a' k'elaq, ixt qas elk'wa'lxel.
58012009	Xoq'je' oj xikije' qachuch qaqaw rech uwach lew, chir xoj kisuk'b'a', ruk'ut oj xqamej qib' chikiwach. Rajwixik k'ut chir qanimaj Qajwal Dios chir kiqaw qasantil rech qoj k'se'wa'.
58012010	Mpa' qachuch qaqaw xa' rech kyeb'xub' q'ij xoj kisuk'b'a' jla' chpa' xqaj chikiwach ire', pumul Qajwal Dios koj usuk'b'a' rech utzil chqe oj, rechwa' chir oj, oj jun ruk' jn tyoxlaj uk'aslemal.
58012011	Qatzij k'ut chir nejel suk'b'enik re'chir tijen k'amek kuya't ki'kte'mal xa'ne' kuya' q'oxmal anme', pumul re'chir q'atnek, kuya' jn loq'laj uxumb'al rechwa' kijaqe' chpam jn suk'laj k'aslemal naq chir xisuk'b'a'xek.
58012012	Rechi' chir, chiwa'lsaj iq'ab' chir ituqa'r xoq'je' chiwa'lsaj uwi'taq ich'ek chir ituyub'naq.
58012013	Xoq'je' chib'ana' suk' che ib'ej rechwa' chir naq ko'x raqan kelteb'ik che b'ej xa'ne' ku'tzer knaq.
58012014	Kixtarjaq chirij jn uxunem rech anme' kuk' kinejel xoq'je' kixtarjaq chirij jn k'aslemal chir tastel che mak, mpa' wa k'ot ri' iwuk', k'ot jnaq kril uwach Qaqjaw.
58012015	Utz rilik chib'ana', rechwa' chir mat' k'o jnaq kuya' knaq jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' rech chir keltewelaq naq k'ayil pranme' chir kutzukuj ch'ojb'al, rimal k'ut jn k'ayil la' sub'laj ik'iy kitzij knaq kib'.
58012016	Wne' k'o jnaq chiw ix kmaken ruk' utyo'jil xe'taq k'le'b'al xoq'je' kub'an wastaq chak chpa' Esaú chir xa' rimal jn laq che tib'lil chir xa' rech jumul wi'im, xuk'ij jn tewchi'nik chir kya' chke nab'etaq laj, mpa' re' nab'e laj k'se'naq.
58012017	Iwet'am k'ut ix, re'chir q'atannaq chik ri' Esaú xraj re' krechb'ejna jn tewchi'nik chir kya' chke nab'e taq k'la'b' chir kik'ise'k, pumul xtzaq pnaq jla' rimal uqaw, xya'tchik luwar che chir kutzalq'amij ranme', tne' xutzukuj ruk' q'ej.
58012018	Mpa' ix je't xixqeb' chu' jn jib' chir kumojo kteqe'xek chir kujuluw paq'a', xoq'je' pe qu'mal, pe rchaq qu'm, xoq'je' pkyaqlajaw, chpa' xkib'an Rilk'wa'l Israel,
58012019	xoq'je' xita't uch'ab'al su' xoq'je' xita't uch'ab'al Qajwal Dios, naq chir xkita' jn ch'ab'ale' xkita' toq'ob' rech chir mat' kyuch'ab'ej chik.
58012020	Mpa' kich'ijt taqnik chir kub'ij: Wa k'o naq wnaq, naq awaj lewa' chir kuteqe'j uwi' jib' kamsesaq cha'b'aj ruk' lewa' naq ch'ich' jutz'utz' uwi'.
58012021	Sub'laj k'ut xib'ilib' chir kux tijen ki'ilek chir Moisés xub'ij: "Tijin kimb'irb'i'ten rimal uxib'il wib'."
58012022	Xa'ne' ix je' xixqet chu' jib' rech Sión, xixqet ruk' Jerusalén rech kaj, tilimit rech jn k'aslek Dios, chpa' ik'owa' sub'laj che mil utaqo'n kaj,
58012023	xoq'je' xixqet chpa' kimulumwa' kib' nab'etaq al chir tz'ib'tal kib'i' pkaj, xixqet ruk' Qajwal Dios chir ajq'atal tzij pikiwi' kinejel, xoq'je' xixqet ruk' kisantil utzlajtaq wnaq chir saqapsam chik kanme' rimal Qajwal Dios,
58012024	xixqet ruk' Jesús, chir aj ok'sel yoloj rech jn k'ak' pacto, xoq'je' xixqet ruk' kik' chir tixom rech Cristo chir sub'lajna kch'awna chwach ukik'el Abel.
58012025	Chiwula' chir miwitzlaj uwach Qajwal Dios chir kxuch'ab'ej, mpa' wa xikonta xkanij kib' ni'j chir xkixutuj uwach jun chir xe' uyaj chwach lew, pa'tlo qe'oj qojkomb'a'lo qanij qib' chirwa qitzlaj uwach jun chir kyajenlaq suk'te' pkaj.
58012026	Uch'ab'al k'ut Re' chir nab'e xuyikij uwach lew, pumul chinime' xujito, kub'ij: Kinyikijna jumulchik xo'wt uwach lew xa'ne' xoq'je' kaj.
58012027	Ni'j yoloje' "jumulchik" kch'a'w chirij chir ke'sna ni'j chir kux b'onom, chir kumojo ksilb'exik rech kijaqe' knaq ni'j chir kisilib'taj.
58012028	Rechi' jn nimlaj q'atb'altzij chir kuya' Qajwal Dios chqe, ksilib't re'. Rimal k'ut ri' qatyoxij xoq'je' qanimersaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios ruk' mejb'al ib' ch'il nimseb'al q'ij.
58012029	Mpa' Qajwal Dios jla' chpa' q'a' chir nejel kusach uwach.
58013001	Ix wixlal joqo'qb'la' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chixo'l.
58013002	Msach chiw uya'ik kiwarb'al iwijil itz'aq'at, mpa' jujun chir ket'amta xkiya' kiwarb'al utaqo'n kaj.
58013003	Natjaq chiw naq itzab'tel pche' kawulpa' chir ix jun kuk', ix tz'ab'tel pche', xoq'je' na'tjaq chiw naq chir kiroqom q'oxmal kawulpa' chir ix jun kuk' ire'.
58013004	Nim chiya'wa' iwenejel jn k'le'b'al xoq'je' nim chiya'wa jn mejb'al ib' chikixo'l k'le'naqtaq wnaq, mpa' Qajwal Dios kuq'at tzij pikiwi' naq chir kib'an mak rech tyo'jil, xoq'je' nik'ij chir kimaken chirij k'le'b'al.
58013005	Miloq'oj pwaq, kixki'ktaq ruk' chir kux k'o iwuk' chinime', mpa' Qajwal Dios xub'ij: Ktinya't knaq xoq'je' ktinxutujt knaq.
58013006	Xa'k'ut jla' chir qojkon chub'ixik ruk' ukub'ul k'u'x: "Re' Qajwal Dios ajto'l wech, kinxijtena wib'. ¿Kux kut kowan chub'anik naq wnaq chir xa' rech kamik?"
58013007	Natajaq chiw ajyuq'al iwech chirij kojb'al chir ik'o chixo'l, ire' k'ut chir xkiya' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios chiw, kixchomnaq chirij chir kux kino'jb'al ire' xoq'je' chiwesaj uwach kikojb'al ire'.
58013008	Qajwal Jesucristo Re' misme rech wir xoq'je' Re' misme rech poq'ij xoq'je' Re' misme rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
58013009	Miya' iwib' chir kixk'amb'ik kimal k'iy uwach xoq'je' t'amt'elta kiwach che tyojnik mpa' rajwixik qakub'a' qanme' chirij jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios ruk't ni'j tib'lil chir k'ot xuya' chke naq chir xkitijo.
58013010	Oj k'o jn qa altar chpam loq'laj wokom jaj rech Qajwal Dios, chir ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj k'ot kech che utijik chir kux k'o puwi'.
58013011	Mpa' jn ajwab' kech ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj rech jn jer pacto, kukoj b'ik kiki'k'el awaj chpam tyox luwar rech wokom richoj Qajwal Dios rech tojb'al mak, pumul kityo'jil ni'j awaje' je kiparex chirij wokom taq kichoj Rilk'wa'l Israel.
58013012	Jla' xoq'je' Jesús rechwa' kub'an tyox che kik'aslemal tilimit rimal ukik'el, re' je xkam chirij tilimit Jerusalén.
58013013	Rechi' jelaq b'ik oj chuk'ulik Qajwal Jesucristo chirij tilimit rechwa' qak'am b'ik uk'ix.
58013014	Mpa' wural chwach lew, oj k'ot qatilimit chir jaqlel tilimit, xa'ne' re' qatzukuj jun tilimit chir kpena chqawach.
58013015	Rechi' chir suk' kub'lek qajita' che Qajwal Dios rimal Jesucristo jn sipnek rech b'ixnik chir janam chpa' jn wachnem rech qachi' chir kiq'aljansaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios,
58013016	xoq'je' msach chiw ub'anik utzil xoq'je' chikib'ej kuk' ni'jchik kux k'o iwuk', re'k'ut la' jn sipnek chir k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.
58013017	Chiya' iwib' ptaqek chke iwajyuq' chirij kojb'al xoq'je' xokaq xe' kitaqnik mpa' ire' kichijij iwanme' chpa' ni'j chir kijachna rixmal che Qajwal Dios, rechwa' kib'an kichak ruk' ki'kte'mal ruk'ta chir k'ax kina' pe kanme', mpa' ri' k'ot kch'ak chirij.
58013018	Kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios pqawi' oj, mpa' kub'ul chik qak'u'x oj chir k'ochik jn ch'ajlaj anme' quk', qarij k'ut oj utz' qojb'in che nejel.
58013019	Kinta' k'ut sub'laj toq'ob' chiw chir kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios rechwa' kintzalaj iwuk' jumulchik cha'nim.
58013020	Ruk'ut jn Dios rech jn uxunem rech anme' chir xuk'asb'a' Qajwal Jesucristo chikixo'l kamnaqib' chir Re'k'ut jn nimlaj ajyuq' kech taq kirnere rimal kik' rech jn pacto chir kistechik,
58013021	re'k'ut Qajwal Dios kub'an chiw chir kixkon chub'anik utzlajtaq chak rechwa' kib'an rajwerem Re', xoq'je' kub'an chiw ix chir kib'ono chir kux k'amar chwach Re' rimal Jesucristo, che Re' k'ut jn unimal q'ij rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
58013022	Kinta' jn toq'ob' chiw qaxlal chir chich'ija' jn yoloj rech jn utzlaj yaj chir xintz'ib'aj chiw.
58013023	Kwaj en kiwet'maj chir qaxlal Timoteo re' xel laq pche', wa kpe cha'nim, ruk' re' kimb'e chiwilik.
58013024	Chiya' ritzil kiwach kinejel iwajyuq', naq chir ik'o chixo'l xoq'je' chiya' ritzil kiwach kinejel ajkojnel. Qaxlal chir ik'o Italia kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach.
58013025	Re'tb'la' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios kije' iwuk' iwenejel. B'antajaq b'la'.
59001001	En Santiago, jaqlel ajnimnel rech Dios xoq'je' rech Qajwal Jesucristo. Kinya' ritzil kiwach kab'lajuj (12) puq che wnaq rech Rilk'wa'l Israel, chir kijub'um kib' chwach lew.
59001002	Ix wixlal, sub'laj kixki'ktaq re'chir kpe k'iy uwach che pajb'al chiwij.
59001003	Ix iwet'am chir jn pajb'al rech ikojb'al, re' kuya' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x pik'aslemal.
59001004	Ruk'ut jn kuyb'ul k'u'x wa ktz'aq'at uchak pik'aslemal, rech chir kub'anwa' suk' ik'aslemal xoq'je' ix tzaq'at chir k'ot kraj chiw.
59001005	Wa k'o jnaq chiw krajna jn nimlaj nojb'al che, chuta' che Qajwal Dios, Re' kuya' chke kinejel sub'laj nim, Re' kujub'ujt pikiwi' kuya' k'utna chke.
59001006	Pumul chita' ruk' kojb'al, mib'an kyeb' (2) che ikojb'al, mpa' naqpla' chir kub'an kyeb' (2) che ukojb'al, june' xa' janam ub'anik chpa' urep ja' rech mar chir kcharxek k'amb'ik che jnchik praj mar, kt'oq che jnchik praj.
59001007	Naqpla' jri' ku'no muchomaj chir k'o kya' che rimal Qaqjaw.
59001008	Mpa' naq wnaq chir kyeb' (2) ub'onom che ranme', jalan kub'ij poq'ij, jalan kub'ij chuwaq, xa't jun wa'lwa' uyoloj.
59001009	Pumul jn qaxlal chir nimt kuya'wa' rib', ki'ktaqb'la' mpa' nim ub'anik chwach Qajwal Dios.
59001010	Ruk'ut naq k'o umib'i'l, pumul nimt kuya'wa' rib', ki'ktaq mpa' nim kya'wa' rimal Qajwal Dios. Mpa' naq wnaq k'o umib'i'l janam chpa' ukotz'e'jal chaj chir kpuqlaq.
59001011	Ruk'ut kel laq q'ij, rimal umaq'nal kuchiqersaj jun chaj, ruk'ut usi'j kpuqlaq, sach uwach uq'osil, jla'k'ut ub'anik jun chir k'o umib'i'l, kelknaq umib'i'l re'chir kamek.
59001012	Sub'laj utz rech naq wnaq chir kuch'ijo re'chir ktaqchi'x rimal tzel chub'anik mak, mpa' wa xuch'ij jn pajb'al kuk'amna jun ucorona rech k'aslemal, chir ujitom knaq Qajwal Dios chke naqpla' chir kiloq'oj Re'.
59001013	Naqpla' chir ktaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzel, mub'ij chir Re' Dios ktaqchi'n rech, mpa' Dios k'ot jnaq kutaqchi'j chub'anik mak, xoq'je' Re' ktaqchi'xt chub'anik mak.
59001014	Xa'ne' putike'lam naq wnaq ktaqchi'x chub'anik mak rimal tzeltaq uriyb'al chir kucharej xoq'je' kumin chub'anik mak.
59001015	Ruk'ut chirwa xa'lex jn tzel riyb'ale', kresajlaq che saq jn mak, ruk'ut jn mak chirwa xb'anek kresajlaq che saq kamikal.
59001016	Wixlal chir loq' kixwilo, ¡mix sub'tejek!
