59001017	Nejel utzlaj sip xoq'je' nejel loq'laj sip je qajlaq ruk' Qajwal Dios, re'k'ut chir xub'an saqil xoq'je' Re' kuk'ext uno'jb'al.
59001018	Mpa' jla' rajwerem Qajwal Dios, xuya' qak'aslemal chirij uyoloj chir saqlaj tzij, xub'an chqe chir oj nab'etaq rilk'wa'l rech jnik'pla' utiko'n.
59001019	Loq'laj taq wixlal, chiwet'maj, chir nejel wnaq kita' b'la' ruk' kixikin pa'nim, mrajb'la' kich'awaq, xoq'je' mrajb'la' petaq kiywal.
59001020	Mpa' wa xpe uk'anal naq chij kub'an te'chik chir kux suk'laj q'atb'eltzij chwach Dios.
59001021	Rechi' chiya' knaq nejel tz'il lajtaq mak, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ni'j kax lajtaq chomnik chirij jnchik alxik, chik'ama' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir jaqb'a'm chixo'l ruk' jn nimlaj anme' re'k'ut chir kowan chusolik ik'aslemal che mak.
59001022	Chib'ana' chir kux kub'ij uyoloj Qajwal Dios chiw, xa't kita' che jla', mpa' wa kinta chpa' kub'ij re', xa' kisokaj iwib'.
59001023	Mpa' naqpla' chir xa' kuta' che jla' uyoloj Qajwal Dios, pumul kub'anta chir kux kub'ij jn yoloje', june' xa' janam ub'anik chpa' naq wnaq chir kutuyuj uplaj pe jn espejo.
59001024	Mpa' xa' utikel kutuyuj rib', tere' k'ek, pa'nimk'ut ksach che kux ka'yek.
59001025	Pumul naq chir kuya' uxikin chuta'ik jn saqlaj pixab', chir k'o tzqaptejem chpam, xoq'je' kajaqe' chpam, xa't che jla' kuto'o, june' sub'laj k'otchik kowe' rech chirij chir kux ku'no.
59001026	Wa k'o jnaq kuchomaj chir utzlaj ajkojnel, pumul wa kujek't raq, xa'ne' xa' utikel kusokaj rib'. Ukojb'al june' k'ot kchakanwa'.
59001027	Jn kojb'al chir ch'ajch'oj chir k'ot tz'il chpam chwach Dios Qajawxel: Re' kisaqxik mub'a' ch'il kito'ik malka'n taq ixiqib' che kirajwixik xoq'je' mkisoq' kib' che mak rech uwach lew.
59002001	Ix wixlal, chir k'o ikojb'al chirij Jesucristo chir nim uq'ij. Rajwixik chir xa jnam rilik nejel wnaq chib'ana.
59002002	Mpa' wa kokb'ik tla' chpa' kiraqwa' iwib' chunimersik uq'ij Qajwal Dios naq chij chir ukojom umat'q'ab' chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq, xoq'je' utzlajtaq k'ul uk'ojom, xoq'je' kokb'ik tla' naq mub'a', chir k'ojb'al uq'u'.
59002003	Ruk'ut ix re' k'e iwach chirij jun chir utz lajtaq k'ul uk'ojom, kib'ij k'ut che: "At utz katkub'e' wural," ruk'ut che jn mub'a' kib'ij: "At katwab'aq tla', katkub'e' lewa' pu'lew."
59002004	¿Tijen tuk'ut kiwichij uq'ij jun, ruk'ut jnchik kiqasaj uq'ij, xoq'je', tijen kiq'at tzij ruk' tzeltaq chomb'al?
59002005	Ix wixlal chir sub'laj ix loq' kixwilo, chita'much. ¿Re' tuk'ut Qajwal Dios cha'wnaq kech mub'a' rech jn uwach lewa', rechwa' kuya' jn mib'i'l rech kojb'al chke, xoq'je' kub'an chke chir kechb'ej jn echb'al rech jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij chir ujitom chke naq chir kiloq'oj Dios?
59002006	Pumul ix xiya' pe k'ixb'al jn mub'a'. Mpa', ¿ire't k'ut wnaq chir k'o kimib'i'l kitij ikik'el xoq'je' ire't k'ut chir kix kik'amb'ik ptaq q'atb'altzij chirwa kitojt ik'as?
59002007	Xoq'je' ire' kib'ij wastzij chirij jn utzlaj ub'i' Cristo, chir iwajaw ix chinime'.
59002008	Wa qatzij ki'no chpa' kub'ij pixab' chir tz'ib'tal chpam tyox wuj: Loq'oj awijil atz'aq'at chpa' uloq'xik awib' at ka'no, utz jla' ki'no.
59002009	Pumul wa jnamt kilik iwixlal ki'no, kixmaknek xoq'je' pixab' kub'ij chiw chir ix qatzij, ix xixolq'apij pixab'.
59002010	Mpa' naqpla' chir kub'ono chir kux kub'ij nejel pixab' rech Qajwal Dios, pumul wa k'onaq praj chir kub'anta, june' kmaken chirij nejel pixab'.
59002011	Mpa' Re' misme Qajwal Dios xub'ij: Mat makan chirij k'le'b'al, xoq'je' xub'ij: Mab'an kamek. Xa' k'ut jla', kat makent chirij k'le'b'al, pumul wa kakamsaj naq wnaq, xaxo'lq'opij pixab'.
59002012	Jla' chib'ij xoq'je' jla' chib'ana', chpa' ni'j chir q'at tzij pikiwi' rimal jn pixab' chir kuya' jn tzq'aptejem chke.
59002013	Mpa' ruk't k'axk'ab'al k'u'x q'at tzij puwi' jun chir k'ot k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, pumul jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, tne' kumajt chqe, kch'akanna puwi' jn q'ataj tzij.
59002014	Ix wixlal, ¿kux kchakanwa' che naq wnaq kub'ij chir k'o ukojb'al, pumul k'otnaq uchak ub'onom chpa' k'utenwa' ukojb'al? ¿June' ksoltajta xo'w ruk' ukojb'al?
59002015	Wa k'o naq qaxlal chij, naq xaq lewa' chir sub'laj q'el kiq'u' xoq'je' k'ot kiwaj.
59002016	Wa k'o jnaq chiw kub'ij chke: "Jix pe jn uxunem rech anme', chikojo' iq'u xoq'je' kixwo'oq," pumul k'ot xuya' chke chir kux kchakan chke, june' k'ot kchakanwa' ukojb'al.
59002017	Jla'k'ut kojb'al, wa k'otnaq chak chpa' k'utenwa', jn kojb'ale' kamnaq prechwa'.
59002018	Pumul wa jnaq kub'ijna: "At' k'o akojb'al, en k'o enchak," k'utu' b'alaq akojb'al chinwach chir k'ot achak chpam. Ruk'ut en kink'ut enkojb'al chawach chir k'uten rimal enchak.
59002019	At kakojo chir Qajwal Dios xa' jun, utz ka'no, xoq'je' tzeltaq santil kikojo chir Qajwal Dios xa' jun, xoq'je' kib'irb'i'ten chwach.
59002020	¿Pumul kawaj kawet'maj at wnaq chir k'ot ano'oj, chir jn kojb'al chir k'ot chak chpam, jun kojb'ale' kamnaq?
59002021	¿Wa suk'b'a'x tuk'ut rimal Qajwal Dios uk'aslemal Abraham chir qaqaw jertaq tzij, rimal uchak, re'chir xujit uparxik uk'ijol Isaac chu' altar chwach Qajwal Dios?
59002022	Wla' k'ut chir ukojb'al Abraham xa' janam xkik'lajij kib' ruk' uchak, xoq'je' ukojb'al xtz'aqat ruk' uchak.
59002023	Xb'antaj k'ut chpa' kub'ij tyox wuj: "Xkojen Abraham che Qaqjaw, rimal ukojb'al xb'an suk' che uk'aslemal," xoq'je' xok che jn k'isik' rech Dios.
59002024	Chiwula' k'ut naq wnaq xoq'je' rimal uchak ksuk'b'a'x uk'aslemal rimal Dios, xo'wt rimal ukojb'al.
59002025	Jla' xoq'je' Rahab jn xaq chir kmaken chirij tyo'jil kuk' sub'laj chijab', ¿wa suk'b'a'x tuk'ut uk'aslemal rimal Qajwal Dios rimal uchak re'chir xyuk'uluj ajya'l wach, xoq'je' xyutaqb'ik che jnchik b'ej?
59002026	Mpa' jla' chpa' tyo'jil chirwa k'ot santil ruk', jun tyo'jil la' kamnaq, jla' xoq'je' kojb'al wa k'ot chak chpam, jn kojb'al la' kamnaq.
59003001	Ix wixlal, mikije' sub'laj ajtyojnel chixo'l, mpa' qet'am chir naq kityojnek nimna q'atajtzij kb'an pikiwi' ire'.
59003002	Mpa' qanejel che k'iy qojmakenwa', wa k'o jnaq chir kmakent chirij uyoloj jn wnaqe' suk' uk'aslemal xoq'je' kownel chuje'k'ik nejel utyo'jil.
59003003	Chiwlamuch oj qakoj jek'b'al ch'ich' pkichi' kyej rech qoj kinimajwa' rech qajek' nejel kikuerp.
59003004	Xoq'je' chiwula' ch'ich' chir kib'in puwi' mar, tne' sub'laj inimaq, xoq'je' kich'ikmix rimal nimaqtaq kiq'i', pumul kijek' rimal jn ch'iti'n tumun, kib'ek'ut tla' chpa' krajwa' ajsutel rech.
59003005	Jla' xoq'je' qaq', k'al ch'iti'n uk'laj qakuerp pumul kuq'aq'b'ej rib' ruk' nimaqtaq chpa'kux, xoq'je' chiwula' jn k'al uxu'm q'a' chir kowan chuparxik jn nimlaj k'eche'laj.
59003006	Xoq'je' qaq' janam chpa' q'a sub'laj mak k'o chpam. Re'k'ut chir k'o chikixo'l nejel chaqap rech qakuerp. Re'k'ut chir kub'an k'ax che nejel qakuerp. Xoq'je' kuk'at nejel chpa'kux rech uwach lew xoq'je' re' kparex rimal uq'a' k'ixk'ol.
59003007	Mpa' nejel kiwach che tzeltaq awaj, xoq'je' chokop chir k'o kixik' xoq'je' tzeltaq kmatz xoq'je' awaj chir ik'o pe mar, kinejel ire' ik'o xe' kiq'atb'altzij chijab', ire' kijekew kech.
59003008	Pumul k'otnaq wnaq kowen chuje'k'ik raq', jn k'axla' kot jnaq kejek'ew rech, chir najnaq che tzel kumb'al chir kamsenek.
59003009	Ruk qaq' qanimersajwa' ub'i' Qajwal Dios chir Qajawxel, xoq'je' ruk' qaq' qaya' mixq'ab' pikiwi' wnaq chir ib'onom chpa' uk'ayb'al Qajwal Dios.
59003010	Ruk' xa' jun che qachi' qoj tewchi'nek xoq'je' ruk' qachi' prechwa' qaya' mixq'ab'. Ix wixlal, kumajta chir jla' qa'no.
59003011	¿Wa k'ok'ut naq alxel ja' kuya' ki'laj ja' xoq'je' kuya' k'aylaj ja'?
59003012	Ix wixlal, ¿wa kowen k'ut jn uche'al wikix kuya' q'anum, re' lewa' jn uche'al uva kuya' wikix? Xoq'je' k'otnaq ajxel ja' kuya' tzaylaj ja' xoq'je' kuya' ki'laj ja'.
59003013	¿Naq k'o chixo'l chir k'o nimaqtaq nojb'al ruk' xoq'je' sak'al uwi'? Chuk'utu'b'la' uchak ruk' jn utzlaj k'aslemal pe jn nimlaj nojb'al rech jn nimlaj anme'.
59003014	Pumul wa k'o k'aylaj celosil xoq'je' k'o ch'ojb'al piwanme', minimersaj iwib' xoq'je' mixjo'sen chirij jn saqlaj tzij.
59003015	Mpa' jn nimlaj no'jb'ale' je't penaq ruk' Dios pkaj, xa'ne' xa' rech uwach lew, xa'ne' je petnaq pkichomb'al wnaq xoq'je' rech tzel.
59003016	Mpa' chpa' k'owa' celosil ch'il ch'ojb'al, tla' k'o sachb'al k'u'x, xoq'je' tla' k'o tzeltaq chak.
59003017	Pumul naq chir k'o jn nimlaj chomb'al kuk' chir kpe pkaj, nab'e ch'ajch'oj, ajtzukel rech jn loq'laj uxumb'al, ch'uch'uj, ch'ul ranme', najnaq che k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, jla' chpa' naq che' chir kwachnek xoq'je' re' najnaq che utzlajtaq uwach, k'o saqlaj tzij ruk' kyeb't (2) uplaj.
59003018	Ruk'ut uwach jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij je ktik pe jn uxunem rech anme' chke ni'j chir kib'an jn uxunem rech anme'.
59004001	¿Jalchi' kipewa' ni'j nimaqtaq ch'oj ch'il ni'j ch'ojb'al chir k'o chixo'l ix? ¿Je't k'ut kipe ruk' tzeltaq iriyb'al chir kich'ojen pityo'jil?
59004002	Sub'laj kirij chpa'kux pumul kixkont churaqik, kib'an kamek xoq'je' kixjuluw rimal kontrenik pumul kixkont churaqik chir kux kiwaj, kixch'ojnek xoq'je' kikoj ichoq'ab', pumul k'ot iwuk' chir kux kiwaj, mpa' kita't che Qajwal Dios.
59004003	Kito'o pumul ko'pent iwuk' mpa' utzt uta'ik ki'no, mpa' kito'o xa' rech kisech che iriyb'al.
59004004	Ix wnaq chir ix makennaq chirij k'le'b'al. ¿Iwet'am tuk'ut ix chir jn k'isik' ruk' uwach lew qab'an ajch'oj ruk' Dios? Rechi' naqpla' kub'an jn k'isik' ruk' uwach lew kukoj rib' che ajch'oj rech Qajwal Dios.
59004005	¿Kichomaj lewa' ix chir tyox wuj xa' jo'sb'al kub'ij: "Jn Loq'laj Santil chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chpam qak'aslemal sub'laj qojraj ruk' celosil?"
59004006	Pumul Qajwal Dios kuya' sub'laj ritzil ranme', rechi' kub'ij chpam tyox wuj: "Dios kuk'le'laj kiwach naq chir itak ruk' kino'jb'al, pumul kuya' ritzil ranme' chke naq chir kib'an ch'iti'n che kib'."
59004007	Chijacha' iwib' puq'ab' Qajwal Dios, chikojo' ichoq'ab'. Chiq'atuj uwach jn tzel, ruk'ut jn tzel kranij rib' chiwach.
59004008	Kix qetaq ruk' Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' Qajwal Dios qetna iwuk', ajmakib' chiya' knaq ub'anik jn tzel ichak chpa' jnaq chir kuch'aj uq'ab' xoq'je' ix chir kyeb' (2) ub'onom iwanme', chib'ana' ch'ajch'oj che iwanme'.
59004009	Kix oq'aq xoq'je' q'axwaq iwanme' xoq'je' chik'ama' uq'ab'il ipowril, xoq'je' itze'j uk'exa' rib' che q'ej, xoq'je' iki'ktemal uk'exa' rib' che b'is.
59004010	Chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib' chwach Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut re' nim kxuya'wana.
59004011	Ix wixlal, xa' mixjek'chi'n chiwach. Naqpla' chir kjek'chi'n chirij rixlal xoq'je' kuq'at tzij puwi' rixlal, chirij pixab' kjekchi'nwa', xoq'je' chirij pixab' kuq'atwa' tzij, pumul wa at kaq'at tzij chirij pixab', at te'chik ajb'anal rech chir kux kub'ij pixab' xa'ne' atchik ajq'atal tzij chirij pixab'.
59004012	Xa' Jun xyaw pixab', Re'k'ut xoq'je' ajq'atal tzij chir kuya' soltejem xoq'je' Re' kresaj k'aslemal, pumul at, ¿naq at rechwa' kaq'at tzij puwi' jnchik unaq?
59004013	Jo' b'la' chinime', ix, chir kib'ij: "Poq'ij, ch'il chwaq' qojb'e che jn tilimit, jn janab' k'ut qoj kije' tla', qoj k'ayen tla' rechwa' qach'ak qapwaq."
59004014	Chir iwet'amta kux ub'onom ik'aslemal chwaq', mpa' qatzij chir ik'aslemal xa' janam chpa' jn sutz' chir xa'qe'n k'utnek, pa'nimk'ut ksachek.
59004015	Puk'exwach ri', jri' chib'ij: "Wa Qajwal Dios, kraj kuya' qak'aslemal, qab'anna june' re' lewa' qab'an jnchik la'."
59004016	Pumul ix chinime' nim kiya'wa' iwib' rimal jn nimal, nejel nimal mak re'.
59004017	Naq chir ret'am ub'anik utzil pumul kub'anta, kmak nek.
59005001	Chinime' chita' ix naq chir k'o imib'i'l, kixoq'aq, kix sik'naq chirij ni'j chq'ij mlaya chir petnaq piwi'.
59005002	Xq'ay imib'i'l, xoq'je' iq'u' k'uxumchik rimal yo'x.
59005003	Xixaqeb' iq'an pwaq ch'il isaq pwaq, ruk'ut jn uxaqil la' kch'anna chiwij xoq'je' re' kutijna iti'jal chpa' kub'an q'a'. Chir ximuluj mib'i'l che ni'j uk'isb'al taq qije'.
59005004	Chita'much sub'laj ksik'en rijil kiq'ij mokom chir kichakim itikomb'al chir ix xa' ruk' sokb'al itojomta, ruk'ut kisik' naq chir kimolom uwach itiko'n xo'pen puxikin Qajwal Dios chir k'o pkaj.
59005005	Wral chwach lew ix xiya' che ityo'jil kuxpla' xraj xoq'je' xitzqapsaj iwib' chub'anik kuxpla' xiwaj. Xoq'je' xichomersaj iwanme' chpa' naq wakix chir ko'pen uq'ijal ukamsesik.
59005006	Xitzaq xe' mak, xoq'je' xikamsaj jun chir suk' uk'aslemal. Ruk'ut Re' xukojt uch'oq'ab'.
59005007	Rechi' chir, ix wixlal, k'olaq kuyb'ul ik'u'x suk'te' che upetb'al Qajwal Jesús. Chiwula' jn ajb'anal tiko'n chir kriyi'ej uwach utiko'n rech uwach lew chir k'otchik k'owa', ruk' kuyb'ul k'u'x kriyi'ej jan ko'pen q'alaj.
59005008	Jla' xoq'je' ix k'olaqb'la' kuyb'ul ik'u'x, xoq'je' chikub'a' iwanme', mpa' upetb'al Qajwal Jesús tijen qetlaq.
59005009	Ix wixlal, xa' miq'aq'b'e tzij chiwij rechwa' kixya't xe' mak chiwula' ajq'atal tzij k'ochik chwach uchi' ja'.
59005010	Ix wixlal, chiwesaj ino'jb'al chirij jn q'oxmal anme' xoq'je' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x kech ajq'axal uyoloj Dios chir xich'a'w pub'i' Qajwal Dios.
59005011	Qatzij qab'ij oj, chir sub'laj utz kech naqpla' chir kitij k'ax. Ito'om uyolik ix jn kuyb'ul uk'u'x Job, xoq'je' xiwil ix re'chir xk'isb'enek kux xya' che rimal Qaqjaw. Mpa' Qaqjaw nim k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x xoq'je' kowt ranme'.
59005012	Pumul chita'much ix wixlal mik'am pnaq kaj xoq'je' mik'am pnaq uwach lew xoq'je' mik'am pnaq jnaq chik. Xa'ne' chirwa jla', jla', wa jla'ta, jla'ta, rechwa' kixqajt xe' mak.
59005013	¿Wa k'o jnaq chixo'l ix chir q'axaw ranme'? Ub'ana' uch'awem ruk' Qajwal Dios. ¿Wa k'o jnaq ki'ktem uk'u'x? Chub'ixaj ub'i' Qaqjaw.
59005014	¿Wa k'o jnaq yab' chixo'l? Chusik'ij ajwab' kech jun puq che ajkojnel, rechwa' kich'a'w ruk' Qajwal Dios puwi', xoq'je' kimaj knaq ruk' aceite pub'i' Qajwal Jesús.
59005015	Ruk'ut jn ch'a'wem ruk' Qajwal Dios chir kb'ix ruk' kojb'al kusol jn yab', kwa'lses k'ut rimal Qajwal Dios, wa k'o mak ub'onom kuytaj knaq rimal Qaqjaw.
59005016	Chikira' imak chiwach, xoq'je' kixch'awaq ruk' Qajwal Dios piwi' ix rechwa' kixkuntajwa'. Jn uch'awem ruk' Dios jun chir suk' uk'aslemal sub'laj k'o ukownem.
59005017	Elías, re' xa' wnaq janam ub'anik chpa' oj, ruk'ut chir xch'a'w ruk' Qajwal Dios ruk' nejel ranme' rech kpetwa' jab', xqaj te'chik jab' che xub' (3) janab' ruk' waqib' (6) ik'.
59005018	Xch'a'w k'ut jumulchik Elías ruk' Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut kaj xutaqlaq jab', ruk'ut uwach lew xuya' uwach.
59005019	Ix wixlal wa k'o jnaq chixo'l chir xuya' knaq jn saqlaj tzij, pumul k'o jnaq chir kub'an che ktzalajlaq.
59005020	Chiwet'maj ix, jnaq chir kub'an che naq ajmak uya'ik knaq jn k'axlaj b'ej, kusol ranme' naq wnaq che kamikal, xoq'je' kub'ono chir sub'laj che umak kuytaj knaq.
60001001	En Pedro, Apóstol rech Jesucristo, kintz'ib'aj b'ik jn wuje' chiw, ix chir xixe'sb'i'k ptaq ijuyb'al, chir ix jub'urnaq pujuyb'al Ponto, pujuyb'al Galacia, pujuyb'al Capadocia, pujuyb'al Asia, pujuyb'al Bitinia.
60001002	Ix, chir ix cho'om knaq rimal Dios Qajawxel, xraj Re' xub'an utzil chiw rimal Loq'laj Usantil, rechwa' kiya' iwib' ptaqik xoq'je' kch'aj iwanme' ruk' ukik'el Jesucristo. Kiyaqb'la' jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' pik'aslemal.
60001003	Qanimersaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios chir Uqaw Qajwal Jesucristo, mpa' rimal k'axb'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chqe oj, xub'an chqe chir xojk'ise' jumulchik rimal uk'astajb'al Jesucristo chikixo'l kamnaqib', re' ri' chir kuya' jn k'aslek ukub'ul k'u'x chqe.
60001004	Rech jn echb'al chir ksacht uwach, xoq'je' ktz'ilib'ta, xoq'je' kmayerta uwach chir Qajwal Dios ukolom chiw pkaj.
60001005	Chir ix kolom rimal nimlaj ukownem Qajwal Dios rimal ikojb'al, rechwa' kiraq jn solb'alib', chir b'onomchik ukiji'k rechwa' k'uten ptaq janab' chqawach.
60001006	Rmalk'ut ri', sub'laj kixki'ket ix chinime', tne' xa' rech kyeb'xub' q'ij, wa rajwixik kiq'axajna sub'laj che pajb'al.
60001007	Rech chirwa xok ikojb'al chpam pajb'al sub'laj utzna rilik chwach q'an pwaq, re'k'ut chir xa' q'axel, pumul ruk' q'a' kpajwa'. Jla'k'ut k'utenwa' ik'ojb'al, kraqtaj chpam b'ixnik, xoq'je' chpam jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' chpam jn mejb'elib' re'chir k'uten Jesucristo.
60001008	Re'k'ut Jesucristo, chir loq' kiwulo tne' iwulomt uwach, xoq'je' chirij Re' ixkojennaq, tne' kiwilt uwach chinime', kixki'ket ruk' jn nimlaj ki'kte'mal rech jn unimal q'ij, chir kraqtajt ub'ixik.
60001009	Chik'ama' chir kux kutaqej ikojb'al, re'k'ut jn solb'alib' rech iwanme'. Mpa' ix tijen kik'omo chir kux utaqem ikojb'al, re'k'ut solb'alib' iwib'.
60001010	Ajq'axal uyoloj Qajwal Dios, chir xkiq'axaj jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' chir toqomlaq ub'ixik chiw, xkib'ank'ut jn utzlaj utzukxik, xoq'je' jn utzlaj uta'tb'exik chirij jn solb'alib'la'.
60001011	Xkib'an k'ut jn utzlaj rilik, chirij naq che wnaq, xoq'je' naq che q'ij, xoq'je' naq che janab', chir kub'ij usantil Cristo chir k'o kuk' ire', re'k'ut jn santil la' chir k'o kuk', xunab'ajsaj ub'ixik chke chir kux che q'oxmal kuq'axajna Cristo, xoq'je' xuna'b'ajsaj ub'ixik chke, chirij ni'j unimal q'ij chir kipena chirij ni'j q'oxomla'.
60001012	Xq'aljenses k'ut chikiwach ire', chir kext ire', xa'ne' qech oj, chir kux xichakan ire' chirij, re'k'ut chir kiq'aljansaj naq chir tijen kiya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo chiw ix, rimal Loq'laj Santil chir toqomlaq pkaj. Re'k'ut ri' chir utaqo'n kaj sub'laj kaj rilik.
60001013	Rechi' chir, chikojo' jn utzlaj nojb'al, chijek'a' iwib' piwechwa', chiya' nejel ukub'ul ik'u'x chirij jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chir k'amlaq chiw, re'chir Jesucristo k'uten jumulchik.
60001014	Chpa' alk'wa'lxel chir kiya' kib' ptaq'ek, mib'an chik ni'j mak chir xib'an jer, re'chir maja' kich'ob' uwach Qajwal Dios.
60001015	Xa'ne' jun chir xix'usik'ij, Re' tyox uk'aslemal, ix xoq'je' chib'ana' tyox che nejel kux kib'an pik'aslemal xoq'je' kixkojo'q chpam jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal.
60001016	Mpa tyox wuj kub'ij: Chib'ana' tyox che ik'aslemal mpa' En tyox Enk'aslemal.
60001017	Wa ix kib'ij, At Qaqaw, kixcha' che jun chir xa' janam kuq'at tzij pikiwi' wnaq ptaq kijujnal, chpa' kichak kib'onom, kixb'inaqb'la' ruk' nab'alib' chwach Qajwal Dios nejeltaq q'ij rech ik'aslemal.
60001018	Iwet'am ix, re'chir xixtortaj che jn k'axlaj k'aslemal, chir ik'omomlaq kuk' ichuch iqaw, xixtorek, ruk't chpa'kux chir xa' iq'axel chpa' saq pwaq ch'il q'an pwaq.
60001019	Xa'ne' xixtor ruk' loq'laj ukik'el Cristo chpa' naq k'ijol kirnere chir k'ot tz'il chirij, xoq'je' k'ot mak ub'onom.
60001020	Cristo Re'k'ut chir xcha'laq xe'taq ktiktaj uwach lew, pumul xoq'je' xq'aljenses che uk'isb'altaq q'ij xa' rimal iloq'xik.
60001021	Rimal k'ut Cristo chir ix kikoj rech Dios, Re'k'ut Dios chir xuwa'lsaj Cristo chikixo'l kamnaq'ib', xoq'je' xuya' unimal uq'ij, xoq'je' rechwa' chir ikojb'al, ch'il ukub'ul ik'u'x kiya' chirij Qajwal Dios.
60001022	Isaqapsam chik iwanme' ix chinime', rimal chir xiya' iwib' ptaqik che jn saqlaj tzij, rimal Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios, rech jn loq'b'al k'u'x kech alxik, chir k'ot jo'sb'al chpam, chiloq'oj b'la' iwib' chiwach ruk' jn ch'ajlaj anme'.
60001023	Mpa' ix xixk'ise' jumulchik, pumul re't jn k'ise'b'al chir petnaq kuk' ichuch iqaw chir k'o kamikal chpam, xa'ne' xixk'ise' chirij utzij Qajwal Dios chir k'aslek mijumul ksach uwach.
60001024	Mpa, "Nejel wnaq xa' janam kib'anik chpa' chaj, xoq'je' nejel unimal uq'ij naq chij xa' janam chpa' ukotz'e'jal chaj. Kcheqej jn chaj, xoq'je' kpuqlaq ukotz'e'jal.
60001025	Pumul uyoloj Qajwal Dios, re' xa' jun k'owa' mijumul ksach uwach." Re'k'ut ri' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xya' ub'ixik chiw jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
60002001	Rechi', chiya' knaq ub'anik nejel tzeltaq chomnik, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ub'ixik nejel jo'sb'al tzij, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ub'anik kyeb' (2) che iplaj, xoq'je' chiya' knaq nejel kontrenik, xoq'je' chiya' knaq ub'anik tzij chikij iwijil itz'aq'at.
60002002	Chpa' kib'an taq ne' chir te' kik'ise'k, re' kitzukuj kitu', jla' xoq'je' chib'ana' ix, re' chiriyij jn tu' chir yujtelt uwach, re'k'ut uyoloj Qajwal Dios, rimalk'ut re' kixk'iyek rech jn soltejem,
60002003	chirwa' utz xina' jn nimlaj oq'osil ranme' Qajwal Jesús.
60002004	Kixqetaq ruk' Qajwal Jesucristo, jn k'aslek b'aj chir xtoq' pnaq jla' kimal chijab', pumul chwach Qajwal Dios, Re' cho'omlaj b'aj, xoq'je' k'otchik k'owalaj b'aj chir paqal rijil.
60002005	Xoq'je' ix, ix chpa' k'aslek b'aj, jn loq'laj richoj Santil, rech jn tyoxlaj nimnek rech loq'laj jaj, rechwa' kijit nimnek chwach Qajwal Dios rimal Jesucristo.
60002006	Mpa' kub'ij tyox wuj: "¡Chiwula'much! Kinya' pe tilimit Sión, jn b'aj chir nim ub'anik rech utz'u'k tz'aq', chir cha'telek xoq'je' k'otchik k'owa'. Naq kukoj rech, mijumul kya'na chpam k'ixb'al."
60002007	Rechi' chiw ix chir kikojo, jn b'ajla' k'otchik k'owa'. Pumul naq chir kikojenta, kb'antejek chpa' kub'ij tyox wuj: "Jn b'aj chir xtzaq pnaq jla' kimal ajb'anal tz'aq', Re'k'ut Jesucristo, Re'k'ut chir nim ub'anik, rech jn utz'u'k tz'aq'."
60002008	Xoq'je', "B'aj chir kb'an tzaqem chirij, xoq'je' nimlaj b'aj chir ktzaqnek," mpa' kitzaq chirij uyoloj Qajwal Dios, mpa' kiya't kib' ptaqik, mpa' re' kichak ipetnaq.
60002009	Pumul ix, ix wnaq chir ix cha'telek, xoq'je' ix ajnimnel rech loq'laj jaj chir kinimaj nimlaj ajtaqnel, xoq'je' ix jn tyoxlaj tilimit amaq', tilimit chir loq'om rimal Qajwal Dios, rechwa' kiya' ub'ixik ritzil uk'u'x ranme' jun, chir xixresajlaq chpam qu'mal, xixk'un uya' chpa' k'owa' usaqil chir mayjab'al.
60002010	Ix chir jer, ixt utilimit Dios, pumul chinime' ixchik utilimit Qajwal Dios. Xoq'je' ix nab'e knaq iroqomt jn k'axk'ab'al uk'u'x, tne' kumajt chiw. Pumul chinime' k'ochik iwuk'.
60002011	Ix wixlal, chir loq' kixwilo, kinta' jn toq'ob' chiw, chpa' wnaq chir kipe che naj tilimit, xoq'je' chpa' wnaq chir i'aj q'atnel, chiq'atuj ni'j uriyb'al ityo'jil, re'k'ut ni'j riyb'al la' chir kich'ojon ruk' isantil.
60002012	Chib'ana' utzil chikixo'l wnaq chir it ajtilimit Israel. Rechwa' chir nij wnaq chir kib'ij chir ix, ix ritzlal taq wnaq, kilk'ut ichak chir sub'laj utz, kinimersaj ub'i' Qajwal Dios re'chir Re' kpe chuq'atik tzij.
60002013	Xa' rimal Qajwal Dios, Chiya' iwib' ptaqik chke q'atb'altzij rech uwach lew, che nimlaj ajtaqnel, mpa' re' nim reqle'n.
60002014	Xoq'je' chiya' iwib' ptaqik chke ukab'taq q'atb'altzij chir itoqomlaq rimal nimlaj ajtaqnel rechwa' kib'an kiq'atb'altzij pikiwi' ajb'analtaq k'ax, xoq'je' kinimersaj kiq'ij naq chir kib'an utzil.
60002015	Mpa' re' ri' kraj Qajwal Dios chir kb'anek, chir kb'an utzil rechwa' kitz'apij kichi' wnaq chir itak ruk' kichomb'al, chir k'ot ket'am.
60002016	Chik'utu' chir ix, ix tzqaptelchik, pumul rexta chir ixtzqaptelchik kib'an mak, xa'ne' chpa' kumaj che naq jaqlel ajnimnel rech Qajwal Dios.
60002017	Nimb'la' chiya'wa kinejel, xoq'je' chiloq'oj iwib' iwenejel chiwach china'nb'e iwib' chwach Qajwal Dios. Nim chiya'wa jn nimlaj ajtaqnel.
60002018	Ix jaqlel ajnimnel, chiya' iwib' ptaqik kuk' iwajaw, ruk' nejel mejb'alib' xo'wt kuk' ni'j chir utz kino'oj xoq'je' ch'uch'uj kanme', xoq'je' kuk' ni'j chir sub'laj ik'a'n.
60002019	Mpa' re' ri' qaj chwach Qajwal Dios, chir qach'ij naq k'ax chir ojt qatzukum.
60002020	¿Mpa' kux che unimal q'ij kik'omo chirwa ix, kixch'ayek xa' rimal chir ix ajb'anal k'ax? Xoq'je' kich'ijo. Pumul wa rimal ub'anik utzil kitij k'ax, xoq'je' kich'ijo, re' ri', chir k'amer chwach Dios.
60002021	Mpa' rimal ri' chir xixsik'ix rimal Dios mpa' xoq'je' Qajwal Jesucristo xutij k'ax qamal oj, xuya' knaq jn k'amb'al no'oj chqe rechwa' qataqej retal raqan.
60002022	Cristo k'ot naq mak xu'no, xoq'je' k'otnaq sokb'al tzij xel laq chuchi'.
60002023	Cristo xya' mixq'ab' puwi', pumul Re' ruk't mixq'ab' xuk'ulb'a' kiwach, re'chir tijen kuq'axaj q'oxom, k'ot Re' xuyaj wnaq ruk' xib'nek, xa'ne' kujach kimak puq'ab' Jun chir kuq'at tzij ruk' suk'laj q'atb'altzij.
60002024	Re'k'ut Cristo chir xreqaj qamak ruk' utyo'jil, chwach cruz, rechwa' chir oj, oj kamnaqchik chwach mak, pumul ojk'asel chub'anik chir kux suk' chwach Dios. Rimalk'ut usoktajnaq Cristo chir xixkunexwa' ix.
60002025	Mpa' ix nab'e knaq, kixb'inek chpa' kirnere chir k'ot ajyuq'el kech, isachnaq. Pumul chinime' xixtzalajlaq ruk' Cristo Re'k'ut ajyuq' xoq'je' ajsaqel iwanme'.
60003001	Jla' xoq'je' ix k'le'naq taq ixiqib', chiya' iwib' ptaqik che iwichijil. Rechwa' chir naq kikojomt uyoloj Qajwal Dios, rajwixikta k'o kb'ix chke, kich'ak k'ut xa' rimal jn utzlaj kino'jb'al kixiqil.
60003002	Kilk'ut ire' ino'jb'al chir saqlo'loj, xoq'je' k'o mejb'elib' chpam.
60003003	Jn uweqik iwib' ix, re't jn weqb'al chir q'aljenek, chpa' jn pich'nik wi' chir xujalchik kb'anche, xoq'je' jn weqb'al ruk' q'an pwaq, ruk' lewa' k'ul chir paqal rijil.
60003004	Xa'ne' qas weqb'al iwib' ix, je' k'o piwanme', jn weqb'al la' kub'ant k'ax. Rech jn santil chir chu'lek xoq'je' k'o loq'laj uxumb'al chpam. Re' jn weqb'al la' chir sub'laj nim ub'anik chwach Qajwal Dios.
60003005	Mpa' xoq'je' jla' kiweqik kib' xkib'an tyoxtaq ixiqib' jertaq tzij, ire' xkikub'a' kik'u'x chirij Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' xkiya' kib' ptaqik chke kichijil.
60003006	Chpa' Sara chir xuya' rib' ptaqik che Abraham, re'chir kuch'ab'ej, tat cha'che, ruk'ut ix, ix ral knaq Sara chirwa kib'an utzil, xoq'je' k'ot nab'alib' kije' pik'aslemal.
60003007	Ix k'le'naq taq chijab', chib'ana' utzil kuk' iwixiqil, nim chiya'wa iwixiqil, mpa' ire' janam kib'anik chpa' naq k'olb'al chir kowta, nimb'la' chiya'wa', mpa' xoq'je' ire' ijun chrechb'exik jn loq'laj ritzil anme' rech jn k'aslemal, rechwa' k'ot q'aten ich'awem chwach Qajwal Dios.
60003008	Uk'isb'al tzij, xa' jun chib'ana' che uriyb'al iwanme' iwenejel, chiloq'oj iwib' chiwach ruk' jn loq'b'al k'u'x kech alxik, k'axk'ab'aq ik'u'x chiwach, xoq'je' chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib'.
60003009	Mitzilij uwach naq k'ax chir kb'an chiw, xoq'je' mitzaq mixq'ab' puwi' jnaq chir kutzaq mixq'ab' piwi'. Xa'ne' kixtewchi'naq, mpa' iwet'am chir Qajwal Dios xixusik'ij rechwa' kiwechb'ej tewchi'nik.
60003010	Mpa', "naq kraj kuloq'oj uk'aslemal xoq'je' kraj kuq'axaj utzlaj taq q'ij, ujek'a' raq', mub'ij, k'axlajtaq yoloj, xoq'je' ujek'a' uchi' chub'ixik, jo'sb'al tzij.
60003011	Chutoso' rib' che k'ax, re' chub'ana' utzil. Chutzukuj jn uxunem rech anme', xoq'je' tarjaq chirij.
60003012	Mpa' Qajwal Dios, re' k'utuyuj naq suk' kik'aslemal, xoq'je', kuta' kich'awem, pumul k'o uk'anal, pikiwi' ni'j chir kib'an k'ax."
60003013	¿Naq kowan chub'anik k'ax chiw ix, chirwa ix re' kitzukuj ub'anik utzil?
60003014	Pumul wa rimal ub'anik jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij kitij k'ax, k'otchik k'owa' iwech. Mub'an k'ax iwanme', xoq'je' mixij iwib' chikiwach ire'.
60003015	Xa'ne' chinimersaj ub'i' Jesucristo chir Qaqjaw ptaq iwanme', xoq'je' kub'lek chib'ana' ikiji'k rechwa' k'o iyoloj re'chir kib'ij to'b'al iwib', ruk' nimlaj anme', xoq'je' mejb'alib' che naq chir kuta' chiw chirij jn ukub'ul k'u'x chir k'o iwuk'.
60003016	Xoq'je' ruk' jn ch'ajlaj anme' rechwa' chir naq kijuluj tzij chiwij, kpe kik'ix rimal kiyoloj, naq chir kiyoq' jn utzlaj ino'jb'al chpa' ajkojnel chirij Cristo.
60003017	Mpa' utzna chir kitij k'ax rimal ub'anik utzil, chirwa jla' kraj rajwerem Qajwal Dios, chwach chir qatij k'ax rimal ub'anik k'ax.
60003018	Mpa' Cristo, xa' jumul xkam rimal qamak, jun chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios xkam pe kik'exwach naq chir suk't kik'aslemal, rechwa' qoj uk'amb'ik ruk' Qajwal Dios, qatzijk'ut chir xkam che utyo'jil, pumul k'asal pe santil.
60003019	Re'k'ut chir xye chub'ixik upixab' chke santil chir itz'aptel pche'.
60003020	Ire'k'ut ni'j chir xkiya't kib' ptaqik jertaq tzij ptaq uq'ij Noé, re'chir Qajwal Dios xye riyi'ej ruk' nejel kuyb'ul uk'u'x, re'chir Noé tijen kuweq jn arca, tla'k'ut chir xito'tajwa' waxqib' (8) che wnaq chu' ja' rimal Qajwal Dios.
60003021	Jn ja'la' xub'an ukexwach jn qasnik ja' chir rimal re' chinime' oj soltelchik rimal Qajwal Dios. Jn qasnik ja'la' rext jn ch'ajb'al ij, xa'ne' rech chir qojqeb' ruk' Qajwal Dios, ruk' jn saqlaj anme' rimal uk'astajb'al Qajwal Jesús chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
60003022	Re'k'ut chir xpeqe' pkaj, je k'ochik puse'b'al Qajwal Dios, xe' uq'atb'altzij Re', ik'owa' nejel utaqo'n Qajwal Dios chir ik'o pkaj, ch'il ni'jchik santil chir k'o q'atb'altzij ch'il choq'ab' kuk'.
60004001	Jla' chpa' Cristo chir xutij k'ax ruk' utyo'jil, ix xoq'je' chib'ana' jun che ichomb'al ruk' Re', chib'ana' ikiji'k rechwa' kich'ij k'ax, mpa' jun chir xutij k'ax ruk' utyo'jil, xusach uwach mak.
60004002	Rechwa' chir che nejel ik'aslemal kib'an te'chik chpa' kraj ityo'jil, re' ki'no chir kux k'amar chwach Qajwal Dios.
60004003	Chiya' knaq ni'j makla' tla', sub'laj jerchik chir jri' kib'an ix, chub'anik chir kux qaj chikiwach wnaq chir it ajtilimit Israel, jn b'inem chpam tzeltaq mak rech tyo'jil, xoq'je' chpam tzeltaq riyb'al, xoq'je' chpam q'ab'rek, xoq'je' chpam nimaqtaq wi'im, nejel chir kux kik'is iwib' chpam, xoq'je' chpam tzeltaq kinimxik wochb'al.
60004004	Ktzaq kik'u'x ire' chinime' chir kixb'in te'chik ix kuk' ire' chub'anik k'axlajtaq b'onoj, xoq'je' sub'laj k'ax kina' chiw.
60004005	Pumul ire' kijachna rixmal kichak chwach jun chir ub'onom ukiji'k rech kuq'at tzij pikiwi' wnaq chir ik'aslek xoq'je' kuq'at tzij pikiwi' wnaq chir ikamnaqchik.
60004006	Mpa' rimal ri' chir xoq'je' chke kamnaqib' xya' ub'ixik jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Jesucristo rechwa' q'atna tzij chikij chpam tyo'jil chpa' kichomb'al chijab', pumul kik'ise' chpam santil chpa' uno'jb'al Qajwal Dios.
60004007	Pumul tijen qetlaq k'isb'al rech nejel, rechi' chikojo' jn saqlaj chomb'al, xoq'je' kixchajnaq chpam jn ich'awem chwach Dios.
60004008	Suk' re' nab'e chiloq'oj iwib' chiwach, mpa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x kukuy sub'laj mak.
60004009	Chiya' iwarb'al chiwach, ruk't jikchi'nem.
60004010	Ptaq ijujnal chib'ana' ichak chikixo'l ni'jchik, chpa' jn tyoxlaj sip chir xya' chiw rimal Qajwal Dios, kixchaknaq chirij chpa' utzlajtaq ajchakib' rech jn nimlaj loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios.
60004011	Wa k'o jnaq kuya' ub'ixik uyoloj Qajwal Dios, chuk'utu' chpa' uyoloj Qajwal Dios, wa k'o jnaq kchakan chirij kinimxik ni'jchik nimnaqb'la chpa' loq'laj kownem chir yo'om che rimal Qajwal Dios, rechwa' chir che nejel knimerses ub'i' Qajwal Dios pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo, re'k'ut Re' rajaw jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' rech Re' jn loq'laj taqnik chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
60004012	Ix wixlal chir loq' kixwilo, mat' ktzaq ik'u'x chirij jn q'a' rech pajb'al iwech chir tijen ko'pen iwuk', kawulpa' naq mayjab'al.
60004013	Xa'ne' kixki'ktaq mpa' ix, ixchik jun, ruk' uq'oxmal Cristo, rechwa' chir xoq'je' kixnaj che ki'kte'mal re'chir k'utun unimal uq'ij.
60004014	K'otchik k'owa' iwech chirwa xa' rimal ub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo kixyoq' kimal wnaq, mpa' jn santil rech unimal q'ij rech Qajwal Dios k'o piwi' ix, qatzijk'ut chir ire' kib'ij wastaq tzij che Jesús, pumul ix kiya' unimal uq'ij Jesús.
60004015	Xa'k'ut jla' chir mat' k'o jnaq chiw ix kutij k'ax xa' rimal chir aj kamsenel, elq'om lewa', aj b'anal k'ax lewa', rimal lewa' chir nejel kuminwa' rib' kuk' ni'jchik wnaq.
60004016	Pumul wa k'o jnaq kutij k'ax xa' rimal chir kojennaq chirij Cristo mik'ixek, xa'ne' chunimirsaj uq'ij Qajwal Dios, pub'i' Cristo.
60004017	Mpa' xo'pen uq'ijal chir jn q'atajtzij rech Qajwal Dios je' kmajtaj kuk' naq chir ik'o prichoj Dios. Wa jn q'ataj tzij je' kmajtaj quk' oj, ¿jalchilo kib'e kisaqwa' ni'j chir kiya't kib' ptaqik che jn k'ak' yoloj rech Qajwal Dios?
60004018	"Wa jun chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios kutij k'ax churaqik jn solb'alib', ¿ruk'ut jun chir ritzlal wnaq, jalchi'lo k'utenwa' chi', xoq'je' jun chir ajmak jalchilo k'e wab'aqwa' chi'?"
60004019	Xa'k'ut jla' naq kitij k'ax chpa' rajwerem Qajwal Dios, kib'ana' utzil, xoq'je' kiya' kanme' puq'ab' Qajwal Dios, chir tikiwnaq qech, mpa' Re' suk' ranme'.
60005001	Kinta' jn toq'ob' chke tata'ib' chir ik'o chixo'l. Xoq'je' en, enchik tata' chpa' ire' xoq'je' k'o chinwach kux che k'ax xuq'axaj Cristo, xoq'je' en, en jun kuk' ire' che jn unimal q'ij chir k'utenna.
60005002	Chiyuq'uj utilimit Qajwal Dios chir k'o chixo'l, chichijij, xata' chir xa' ix ch'ikmim chub'anik, xa'ne' chib'ana' ruk' nejel uk'uxlal, xoq'je' chib'ana' xa'ta chir kirij uch'akik pwaq chikij, xa'ne' chib'ana' ruk' nejel iwanme', pa'nim.
60005003	Xata' chir kib'anwa' iq'atb'altzij pikiwi' naq chir tijen kiyuq'uj, xa'ne' chiya' utzlajtaq k'utumb'al chikiwach.
60005004	Re'chir k'uten kajwal ajyuq', ix kik'amna jn corona chir ksaxt uwach rech jn unimal q'ij.
60005005	Xoq'je' ix elb'om, ix eltom, chiya' iwib' ptaqik chke tata'ib', xoq'je' chinimaj iwib' chiwach iwenejel, xoq'je' chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib', Mpa' "Qajwal Dios kuk'le'laj kiwach naq chir nim kiya'wa' kib', pumul kuya' loq'laj ritzil ranme' chke naq chir kib'an ch'iti'n che kib'."
60005006	Chib'ana' ch'iti'n che iwib' chixe' uq'ab' Qajwal Dios chir k'o nimlaj ukownem, rechwa' chir Re' nim kxuya'wa re'chir ko'pen uq'ijal.
60005007	Chiya' chirij Qajwal Dios nejel uq'oxmal iwanme', mpa' re' kok il iwuk'.
60005008	Saqb'aq ichomb'al, xoq'je' kixchajnaq, mpa' iwajch'oj ix, jn tzel, jla' ku'no chpa' jn koj chir koq'ek, kb'inek kusutuj iwij tijen kutzukuj naq kutijo.
60005009	¡Re'k'ut jn tzel la' chik'lelaj uwach! Xa' jun kixwab'wa' ruk' ikojb'al t'amt'el k'ut chir nejel iwixlal chir ik'o chwach lew, kiq'axaj ni'j nimaqtaq q'oxome'.
60005010	Pumul Qajwal Dios chir rajaw nejel loq'laj ritzil anme', xoj usik'ij chpam jn unimal q'ij chir k'istechik pub'i' Jesucristo, kitijna k'ax kyeb'xub' q'ij, pumul xo'w q'atan ri', re'k'ut Re' kub'an tzaq'at che ik'aslemal, xoq'je' kukub'a' ik'aslemal, xoq'je' kuya' ichoq'ab', xoq'je' kxujaqb'a' ruk' Jesucristo.
60005011	Rechk'ut Re' jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' jn nimlaj taqnem chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
60005012	Re'k'ut Silvano chir k'o chqaxo'l kuk'amb'ik jn wuje' iwuk', jn qaxlale' chinwach en, suk' ukojb'al, xintz'ib'ajb'ik chiw kyeb'xub' yoloj, rechwa' kxinyajb'ik, xoq'je' kinq'aljansaj chiwach chir Re' ri' qasqatzij jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chir ixk'o chpam.
60005013	Xoq'je' jn ch'ob' che qaxlal chir ik'o pe tilimit Babilonia, chir icho'om rimal Qajwal Dios, janam chpa' ix, ch'il enk'ijol Markos, kitaqb'ik ritzil iwach.
60005014	Chiya' ritzil iwach chiwach ruk' jn tz'ub'nik plaj rech loq'b'al k'u'x. Jn uxunem rech anme' iwuk' iwenejel naq chir ixk'o ruk' Jesucristo. B'antajaq b'la'.
61001001	En Simón Pedro, jaqlel ajnimnel xoq'je' Apóstol rech Jesucristo, kintz'i'b'aj jn wuje' chke naq chir xixkon churaqik rimal jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij rech Dios ch'il Qajwal Jesucristo, jn kojb'al chir k'otchik k'owa' chpa' qe'oj.
61001002	Nimraq chixo'l ix jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Dios ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' chirij kux iwet'am chirij Qajwal Dios xoq'je' chirij Qajwal Jesús.
61001003	Rimal loq'laj uchoq'ab' Qajwal Dios, uyo'om nejel chqe chir kchakan chqe chpam qak'aslemal, xa' rimal rit'maxik uwach jun chir xoj usik'ij rimal loq'laj unimal uq'ij ch'il nimaqtaq uchak.
61001004	Rmalk'ut ri' xuya' ni'j k'otchik k'owa' xoq'je' nimaqtaq jitenem chqe, rimal k'ut ri' chir ix jun che jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal, xoq'je' chir xiwanijlaq iwib' chikixo'l wnaq, chir ik'o chpam tzeltaq riyb'al.
61001005	Ix xoq'je' chikojo' nejel ichoq'ab', chiya'b'la' puwi' ikojb'al, jn loq'laj chak rech anme', puwi' jn loq'laj chak rech anme' chiya' jn etamb'al.
61001006	Puwi' jn etamb'al chiya' jn jek'b'al ib', puwi' jn jek'b'al ib' chiya' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x, puwi' jn kuyb'ul k'u'x chiya' jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal.
61001007	Puwi' jn tyoxlaj k'aslemal, chiya' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o chikixo'l alxik, puwi' jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o chikixo'l alxik, chiya' jn loq'b'al k'u'x.
61001008	Mpa' wa ni'j ri' k'o iwuk' xoq'je' nimernaq chpam ik'aslemal, kuya't luwar chiw chir xa' kiqasaj q'ij, xoq'je' mat' kixwachnek chirij jn etamb'al chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
61001009	Pumul naq chir k'ot ni'j ri' ruk', june' xa' naqaj ka'ywa', xoq'je' moy. Ksach che chir xch'aj uk'aslemal che jertaq umak.
61001010	Rimalk'ut ri' ix wixlal, Re' Qajwal Dios xuxusik'ij xoq'je' Re' xixucho'o, chijaqb'a' chpam ik'aslemal jn sik'nem ch'il jn cha'nek, mpa' wa jri' ki'no mijumul kixtzaqek.
61001011	Mpa wa jla' ki'no, sub'laj jamal ib'ej rech kxokwa' chpam jn nimlaj q'atb'altzij chir kistechik rech Qaqjaw, xoq'je' Ajsolel qech Jesucristo.
61001012	Rimal k'ut ri' kub'lek kinya't knaq una'texik chiw ni'j tyojnike', tne' ix iwet'amchik, xoq'je' chikub'a' iwib' chirij jn saqlaj tzij chir k'ut'um chiwach.
61001013	Mpa' qas suk' chinwach en, chir kxink'usuj ruk' yaj rimal chir enk'ona chpam enkuerp.
61001014	Mpa' wet'am chir xa' qe'nchik kraj kinya' knaq enkuerp, chpa' xuk'ut Qajwal Jesucristo chinwach.
61001015	Xoq'je' knok knaq il rech tne' enk'ot chik iwuk', kna'tajna chiw, nejel chir kux xink'ut chiwach.
61001016	Mpa' ruk't jo'sb'altaq tzij xqaya'wa' ub'ixik chiw jn nimlaj choq'ab' ch'il upetb'al Qajwal Jesucristo, xa'ne' mpa' oj xqil ruk' qab'aq'wach chir Re' nim ub'anik.
61001017	Re'chir Jesucristo xuk'am che Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw jn unimal q'ij, xoq'je' jn mejb'al ib', xtaqlaq che suk'te' pkaj chpa' k'owa' jn k'otchik k'owa'laj unimal q'ij, jn ch'a'wem chir kub'ij: Re' June' Enk'ijol chir kinloq'oj, sub'laj kinki'ket ruk' Re'.
61001018	Ruk'ut oj xqata' jn ch'a'wem la' chir petnaq pkaj re'chir ojk'o ruk' puwi' jn tyox jib'.
61001019	K'o quk' oj xoq'je' uyoloj Dios chir q'axam knaq, re'k'ut chir saqlaj tzij, rimalk'ut chir utz ki'no kiya' ixikin che, chpa' jn q'a' chir kusaqab'saj qu'mal suk'te' ksaqerna, xoq'je' kwa'lajna jn nimlaj ch'imil rech usaqarb'al rechwa' kusaqab'saj iwanme'.
61001020	Rajwixik kich'ob' ri' nab'e, chir k'otnaq uyoloj Dios chir tz'ib'tal knaq chpam tyox wuj chir kir uwach xa' ruk' kino'jb'al wnaq.
61001021	Mpa' jn na'tb'al xpeta xa' rimal uriyb'al naq wnaq, xa'ne' nejel chijab' rech Qajwal Dios xich'a'wek, Re' Loq'laj Santil xyaw rech chke chir kux kib'ij.
61002001	Pumul xikije' xoq'je' jo'slajtaq ajq'axal uyoloj Dios chikixo'l tilimit jertaq tzij, xoq'je' chixo'l ix kikije'na jo'slajtaq ajtyojnel chir kikojna po'wle'kil tzeltaq tyojnik chir k'o k'ax chpam, xoq'je' kixutuj knaq kikojb'al chirij Qaqjaw chir Re' solow kech che kimak. Tijenk'ut kitzukuj k'ax chikij chir kinab'ej te'chik kpe nimlaj k'ax pikiwi'.
61002002	Sub'laj ik'iy kitarajna chikij chub'anik tzeltaq mak, kimak ire' chir jn b'ej rech saqlaj tzij kya' chpam yoq'b'al tzij.
61002003	Rimal uriyxik sub'laj pwaq, xoq'je' ruk' jo'slajtaq yoloj kib'an k'ax chiw, ire'k'ut qajna nimlaj k'ax pikiwi', jerchik chir itzoqom xe' mak, ruk'ut jn tzaqel kech kpe cha'nim.
61002004	Mpa' wa Qajwal Dios xukuyt kimak utaqo'n kaj chir ximaknek, xa'ne' xyutzaq pk'ixk'ol, xyujach pche' rech qu'mal, ikolom tla' rech nimlaj q'ataj tzij chir kpena.
61002005	Xoq'je' jertaq wnaq xusacht kimak, xo'w Noé chir ajb'i'nel yoloj rech jn suk'laj k'aslemal rech Dios xukol knaq ch'il wuqub' (7) rich'il, xutzaq k'utlaq jn nimlaj jab' pikiwi' rislaltaq wnaq rech nejel uwach lew.
61002006	Xoq'je' xyuqasaj xe' mak tilimit Sodoma ch'il tilimit Gomorra. Xyunajsaj knaq che chaj, re'k'ut la' k'utumb'al xuya' chke naqpla' chir kimakenna.
61002007	Pumul xusol knaq Lot, chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios chir kuch'ij te'chik k'o chikixo'l ajmakib'.
61002008	Mpa' Lot chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios, chir jaqal chikixo'l ni'j ajmaktaq wnaqe', sub'laj q'axew ranme' nejeltaq q'ij rimal rilik xoq'je' rimal uta'ik k'axlajtaq b'onoj chir kib'an ire'.
61002009	Ret'am Qajwal Dios k'e usol wnaq chir ch'aj kanme', rechwa' kiqajt putaqchib'al tzel. Xoq'je' k'yukol wnaq chir suk't kik'aslemal rechwa' kyutzaq chpam k'ax che jn q'ij rech q'ataj tzij.
61002010	Xoq'je' nimna tojb'al kya' chke ni'j chir ki'no chpa' kraj uriyb'al kityo'jil, chir ik'o chpam k'axlajtaq riynik, xoq'je' ik'o chpam tz'iltaq mak, xoq'je' kitzlaj uqatb'altzij Dios. Itak ruk' ki'no'oj, kik'amta chir kisukb'axek, kixijt kib' chuyoq'ik uq'atb'altzij Qajwal Dios.
61002011	Ruk'ut taqo'n rech kaj chir nimna kichoq'ab', xoq'je' nimna kiq'atb'altzij, k'ot tzij k'e kib'ana' chwach Qajwal Dios pikiwi' wnaq chir i'ajmak.
61002012	Pumul nik'ije' chir kiyoq' tyojnik chir kich'ob'ta, chpa' awaj chir k'ot kino'jb'al, xik'se'k xa' rech kichapek xoq'je' xa' irech tzaqel, ksach k'utna kiwach chpam jn tzaqel kech ire'.
61002013	Kik'amna ire' jn tojb'al rech jn kotkeklaj kik'aslemal, mpa' sub'laj qus kina' ire' chir ik'o chpam mak nejeltaq q'ij, re'k'ut la' chuwlajtaq mak, ire'k'ut chir kiwa' iwuk', xoq'je' kiki'ket chpam kimak.
61002014	Najnaq kib'aq'wach che mak chirij k'le'b'al, k'istajt kik'u'x che mak kich'ik'mij ajkojnel chpam mak chir tuqa'r kikojb'al, k'amannaq che kanme' uriyxik sub'laj mib'i'l, xoq'je' irilk'wa'l tzaqel.
61002015	Xkiya' knaq jn suk'laj b'ej, xkisach kib'ej, re' xkik'am ub'ej Balaam uk'ijol Beor chir xraj re' ucha'kik pwaq, rimal ub'anik mak.
61002016	Sub'laj k'ow xyaj rimal umak, mpa' jn kyej rech eqa'n chir kch'awtaj, re'k'ut xch'a'w ruk' Balaam chpa' uch'ab'al naq chij, xuya't luwar che jn ajq'axal na'tb'ale' chir kub'an umoxil.
61002017	Jla' kib'anik chpa' chq'ij k'wa', xoq'je' jla' kib'anik chpa' sutz' chir xa' ich'ik'mim rimal kiq'i', kechk'ut ire' jn nimlaj qu'mal chir kolom knaq chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
61002018	Kib'ijk'ut yoloj chir k'o nimal chpam, xoq'je' k'ot nojb'al chpam, ruk tzeltaq kichomnik kik'amb'ik nij wnaq chir te'ne' xyel laq chpam qu'mal chub'annik mak rech tyo'jil.
61002019	Kijit jn tzqaptejem chke wnaq, pumul ire' iximtelna chpam mak, mpa' naq chir xch'ak'enta kxim knaq che jaqlel ajnimnel rimal jn ajch'aknel.
61002020	Qatzijk'ut chir xikon che elemlaq chpam k'axlajtaq b'onoj rech uwach lew rimal uch'ob'ik uwach, Qajwal Jesucristo chir Ajsolel qech, pumul xkixim kib' jumulchik chpam ni'j b'onoj rech nab'e knaq, xich'ak k'ut, ruk'ut kik'aslemal sub'laj k'axnechik chwach kik'aslemal nab'e knaq.
61002021	Mpa' utzna mat' xkit'majna uwach jn b'ej rech jn suk'laj k'aslemal, chwach chir nab'e xkit'maj uwach tere' xitzalaj chikij, xkiya' knaq ub'anik jn tyoxlaj taqnik chir xya' chke.
61002022	Pumul xb'antaj kuk' ire' chpa' kub'ij jn qatzijlaj k'amb'al nojb'al: "Jn tz'e' kuk'amuluj utijik uxa'aw," xoq'je', "jn aq chir te' xch'ajtaj rij ktzalaj chub'alq'atxik rib' chpam xoq'o'l jumulchik."
61003001	Ix wixlal, chir loq' kix wilo, re' ri' jn ukab' wuj chir kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw, che kyeb' (2) wuj kink'usuj ruk' jn utzlaj yaj jn saqlaj ichomnik.
61003002	Rechwa' kna'taj chiw yoloj chir xkib'ij knaq nab'e tyoxtaq ajq'axal uyoloj Dios, xoq'je' utaqnik Qajwal Jesucristo chir Ajsolel qech, chir xya' ub'ixik kimal kab'lajuj Apóstoles.
61003003	Nab'e qit'maj chir kipena ptaq q'ij chqawach aj esaltaq wach, chir kib'inek chpa' tzeltaq kiriyb'al.
61003004	Kib'ijna: "¿Jalchi' k'ut k'owa' upetb'al chi' chir xujit knaq? Mpa' suk' jn q'ijla' chir xikam qachuch qaqaw, uwachna kib'onom nejel chpa'kux, k'ot k'extajnaq che, jla' kib'onom chpa' xmajtajlaq re'chir Qajwal Dios xukaneysaj nejel chpa'kux."
61003005	Nik'ije' ket'amta mpa' xkajt xkit'maj, chir jertaqtzij ruk' uyoloj Qajwal Dios xub'an kaj xoq'je' xub'an uwach lew, chir je' ipetnaq ruk' ja', xoq'je' xa' rimal ja' ik'aslek.
61003006	Rmalk'ut ri' chir nejel uwach kajlew xijeq' paja'.
61003007	Pumul kaj ch'il uwach lew chir ik'o chinime', ikoltel rimal upixab' Qajwal Dios, ikoltel rech q'a' re'chir kpe jn q'ij rech q'ataj tzij, xoq'je' rech sachb'al kiwach ajmakib'.
61003008	Pumul chiwla'much loq'lajtaq wixlal chiwet'maj, ruk' Qaqjaw, jn q'ij janam chpa' jun mil (1,000) janab', xoq'je' jun mil (1,000) janab' xa' janam chpa' jn q'ij.
61003009	Qaqjaw kb'oytajt ruk' kux ujitom knaq, chpa' kyeb'xub' kib'ij chir kb'oytajna, xa'ne' Re' k'o kuyb'ul uk'u'x chqe, krajt re' chir k'e jnaq chpam k'ax xa'ne' kraj re' chir qanejel qatzalq'amij qanme'.
61003010	Pumul uq'ijal Qaqjaw kpena chpa' jun elq'om chaq'ab', che jn q'ijla' nejel kaj sub'laj kitinenek, ksachna kiwach, xoq'je' nejel chir kux ik'o pkaj kijuluwna paq'a', ksachna kiwach, xoq'je' uwach lew ch'il nejel chak chir k'o chwach kiparexna.
61003011	Mpa' nejel ksachna uwach rimal k'ax chir petnaq, ¿kuxt rech mat' kixb'in chpam jn tyoxlaj xoq'je' suk'laj k'aslemal?
61003012	Qayi'em, xoq'je' qakuwim rech reyb'exik uq'ijal Qajwal Dios, tla'k'ut chir nejel kaj kumajna q'a' ksachna uwach, xoq'je' chir kux k'o pkaj kiparxik, xoq'je' kija'lajna.
61003013	Pumul oj qayi'ej jla' chpa' ujitom knaq, jn k'ak' kaj, xoq'je' jn k'ak' uwach lew, tla'k'ut jaqalwa' jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij rech Qajwal Dios.
61003014	Rechi' ix wixlal chir loq' kix wilo re'chir kiwiyej ri', chikojo' ichoq'ab' rechwa' kxuraq Dios chir k'ot tz'il chiwij xoq'je' k'ot mak kraqtaj chiwij, xoq'je' ixk'o chpam jn uxunem rech anme'.
61003015	Chich'ob'o', chir jn kuyub'ul uk'u'x Qajwal Dios, rech solb'alib', jla' chpa' xutz'ib'aj loq'laj qaxlal Pablo chiw, chpa' jn nimlaj nojb'al chir xya' che.
61003016	Che nejel wuj chir xutz'ib'aj, xch'a'w chirij ni'j tyojneme', k'o k'ut ni'j chir k'ax uch'ob'ik, ruk'ut ni'j chir tuqa'r kikojb'al kikotb'a' uxlaj chpa' kib'an che ni'jchik praj rech tyox wuj, rechwa' kitzaq kib' chpam k'ax.
61003017	Rechi' ix loq'lajtaq wixlal, mpa' ix iwet'amchik, chichijij iwib' rechwa' chir kixcharex tewa' rimal kisokb'al ni'j wnaqe', xoq'je' mixtzaq che ikojb'al.
61003018	Xa'ne' kixk'iyaq chpam jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' che rit'mixik chirij Qajwal Jesucristo chir ajsolel qech. Rechk'ut Re' jn unimal q'ij chinime', suk'te' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
62001001	Qatz'ib'aj b'ik chiw, chirij jun chir k'o chik re'chir xmajtajlaq, chir qato'om, xoq'je' qilom ruk' qab'aq'wach. Mpa' qilom uwach xoq'je' qachopom ruk' qaq'ab'. Rek'ut Re' jn yoloj chir k'o k'aslemal chpam.
62001002	Jn k'aslemal la' chir xk'utun chqawach, qe'oj xqilo, xoq'je' qaya' ub'ixik chiw ix jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik. Re'k'ut chir k'o ruk' Qajwal Dios chir xuq'aljansaj chqawach.
62001003	Qaya' k'ut ub'ixik chiw chir kux qilom, xoq'je' kux qato'om, rechwa' chir ix xa' ix junchik quk', chpa' oj, xa' oj junchik ruk' Qajwal Dios xoq'je' ruk' Uk'ijol Jesucristo.
62001004	Qatz'ib'aj b'ik ri' chiw rechwa' ktz'aq'at iki'kte'mal.
62001005	Re'k'ut ri' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir qato'om che Re', xoq'je' oj qaya' ub'ixik chir Qajwal Dios, Re', saqil, xoq'je' k'ot qe'naq qu'mal ruk' Re'.
62001006	Wa qab'ij chir qaroqom qib' ruk' Qajwal Dios, pumul qojb'inna chpam qu'mal, jo'sb'al tzij qab'ij, xoq'je' saqlaj tzijt qojtijin chub'anik.
62001007	Pumul wa chpam saqil qojb'inwa' chpa' Qajwal Dios chir k'o chpam saqil, qaroqom qib' chqawach, ruk'ut ukik'el Uk'ijol Dios kjuch'aj che nejel mak.
62001008	Wa qab'ij chir k'ot qamak, qatikel qasokaj qib', ruk'ut saqlaj tzij k'ot quk'.
62001009	Wa qajach qamak chwach Qajwal Dios, Re' xa' jun k'owa' ranme' xoq'je' suk' uk'aslemal rech kusach qamak, xoq'je' kusaqab'saj qak'aslemal che nejel tzeltaq mak.
62001010	Wa qab'ij chir k'ot mak qab'onom, qakoj Qajwal Dios che ajsoknel, ruk'ut utzij k'ot quk'.
62002001	Taq wilk'wa'l, kintz'ib'aj b'ik ri' chiw rechwa' kixmakenta, pumul wa k'o jnaq xmaknek, k'o jun kch'a'w pqawi', chwach Qajwal Dios Re'k'ut Jesucristo, chir suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios.
62002002	Mpa' Jesucristo xuya' rib' pe kamikal xa' rimal qamak, pumul xo'wt qamak oj xoq'je' kimak kinejel wnaq rech uwach lew.
62002003	Chri'k'ut qilwa' chir qatzij qet'am uwach, chir wa qanimaj utaqnik.
62002004	Pumul wa k'o jnaq kub'ij: "En wet'am uwach Dios," pumul kub'anta chpa' kub'ij utaqnik, june', xa' ksoknek, xoq'je' k'ot saqlaj tzij ruk'.
62002005	Pumul jun ku'no chpa' kub'ij uyoloj Dios, qatzij chir june' tz'aqatnaq loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios ruk'. Rimalk'ut ri' qet'am chir ojk'o ruk'.
62002006	Naq kub'ij chir jaqal chirij Jesús, b'inaq jla' chpa' xb'in Re'.
62002007	Ix wixlal, k'ak' taqnikt kintz'ib'aj chiw, xa'ne' jn taqnike' jerchik, re'k'ut chir xya' chiw re'chir xtiktajlaq, jn jer taqnike' re' uyoloj Qajwal Dios chir xito'o re'chir xtiktajlaq.
62002008	Pumul chinime' kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw jn k'ak' taqnik, chir saqlaj tzij, chirij uk'aslemal Cristo, xoq'je' pik'aslemal ix. Mpa' qu'mal tijen q'atnek, ruk'ut jn qatzijlaj saqil kpoqpetchik.
62002009	Naqpla' kub'ij chir k'o chpam saqil, pumul kritzlaj uwach rixlal, june' k'ona chpam qu'mal.
62002010	Naq kuloq'oj rixlal, june' k'o chpam saqil, k'otnaq chpa'kux ktzaq chirij.
62002011	Pumul naq chir kritzlaj rixlal, june' k'o chpam qu'mal, xoq'je' chpam qu'mal kb'inwa', xoq'je' ret'amta jalchi' k'ew chi', mpa' tz'ab'tel b'aq'wach rimal qu'mal.
62002012	Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix taq wilk'wa'l, mpa' ix sachtaj imak pub'i' Qajwal Jesucristo.
62002013	Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix chuch qajaw, mpa' xiwet'maj uwach Jesucristo chir k'ochik re'chir xtiktajlaq uwach lew. Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix, elb'om ch'il eltom, mpa' xixkon chuch'akik jn tzel.
62002014	Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix taq wilk'wa'l, mpa' xiwet'maj uwach Qajawxel. Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw ix chuch qajaw, mpa' ix xiwet'maj uwach jun chir k'ochik re'chir xtiktajlaq nejel. Kintz'ib'aj chiw ix, elb'om ch'il eltom, mpa' ix, ix kow, ruk'ut utzij Qajwal Dios k'o iwuk', xoq'je' xixkowan chuch'akik jn tzel.
62002015	Miloq'oj uwach lew, xoq'je' miloq'oj chpa'kux rech uwach lew. Wa k'o jnaq kuloq'oj uwach lew, june' k'ot loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios ruk'.
62002016	Mpa' nejel chir k'o chwach lew: Jn uriyb'al tyo'jil ch'il uriyb'al qab'aq'wach, xoq'je' jn nimal rech k'aslemal, je't kipe ruk' Qajwal Dios, xa'ne' je' kipe chwach lew.
62002017	Jn uwach lew ch'il nejel tzeltaq uriyb'al xa' iq'axel, pumul naq chir kub'an rajwerem Qajwal Dios mijumul ksach uwach.
62002018	Ix taq wilk'wa'l, uk'isb'altaq q'ij chik ojk'owa', jla' chpa' xito'o chir kpena jn anticristo. Tne' chinime' sub'laj che anticristo xikaynek, chri' k'ut qilwa' chir uk'isb'altaq q'ijchik ojk'owa'.
62002019	Ire' chqaxo'l xyelwa'b'ik, pumul it qech, mpa' xa't iqech ik'otnere' quk' chinime', pumul xyelb'ik rechwa' k'utnek chir kinejelt iqech.
62002020	Pumul ix xik'am Loq'laj Santil chir xuya' Cristo chiw, xoq'je' iwet'am iwenejel jn saqlaj tzij.
62002021	Kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw rexta chir iwet'amt jn saqlaj tzij, xa'ne' kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' chiw mpa' ix iwet'am jn saqlaj tzij, mpa' nejel jo'sb'altaq tzij je't kipe ruk' saqlaj tzij.
62002022	¿Naqk'ut jun chir kub'ij jo'sb'altaq tzij, re' tuk'ut jun chir kukojta chir Jesús Re' Cristo? June' re' anticristo, re'k'ut chir kukojt rech Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kukojt rech Cristo chir Uk'ijol Dios.
62002023	Nejel naqpla' chir kukojta chirwa Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, june' k'ot Dios ruk'. Naq kub'ij, Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, june' k'o Dios ruk'.
62002024	Joqo'qb'la' iwuk' chir kux ito'omlaq re'chir xmajtajlaq, wa kajeqe' iwuk' chir kux ito'omlaq re'chir xmajtajlaq, xoq'je' ix, ix jaqal chirij Dios xoq'je' ix jaqal chirij Uk'ijol.
62002025	Rek'ut ri' jn jitneme' chir ujitom knaq Re' chqe, jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
62002026	Kintz'ib'aj chiw chikij ni'j chir kixkisokaj.
62002027	Pumul ix xik'am Loq'laj Santil chir xuya' Jesucristo chiw, k'ot rajwixik chiw ix chir jnaqchik kuk'ut chiwach. Mpa' Re' Loq'laj Santil prechwa' kuk'ut nejel chiwach, saqlajtzij utyojnik Re', jo'sb'al tzijta, kixjoqo'qb'la' ruk' Cristo. Chpa' ityojxik ub'onom Loq'laj Santil.
62002028	Ruk'ut chinime', ix taq wilk'wa'l, kixjoqo'q chirij Cristo Jesús, rechwa' kub'e' qak'u'x chirij re'chir k'uten jumulchik, xoq'je' kjuya'twa' chpam k'ixb'al re'chir Re' kpetek.
62002029	Wa ix iwet'am chir Jesucristo suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios. Chiwet'majb'la' chir nejel naqpla' chir kub'an jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, ruk' Jesús k'se'naqwa'.
62003001	Chiwula'much, sub'laj loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios uyo'om chqe, rechwa' chir kb'ix rilk'wa'l Dios chqe, rechi' wnaq chir k'ot Dios kuk' ket'amt qawach, mpa' xkit'majt uwach Dios.
62003002	Ix qaxlal chir loq' kix wilo, chinime' ojchik rilk'wa'l Dios, tne' maja' k'utnek chir kux qilik, re'chir kojo'pen chwach Dios, qet'am k'ut oj, re'chir Jesús kpetek jnamchik qab'anik chpa' Re', mpa' qilna uwach Re', jla', chpa' ub'anik re'.
62003003	Naqpla' uyo'om jn ukub'ul uk'u'x chirij Cristo, utikel kuch'aj ranme', jla' chpa' Jesucristo sub'laj ch'aj ranme'.
62003004	Nejel naqpla' chir kmaknek, xoq'je' kuxolq'opij pixab', mpa' mak jn uxo'lq'opxik pixab'.
62003005	Iwet'amchik ix, chir Jesucristo xk'uten chwach lew rechwa' kresaj mak, k'ot mak chirij Re'.
62003006	Nejel naqpla' chir k'o chirij Cristo kmaken te'chik, nejel naqpla' chir kmaknek rilomt uwach, xoq'je' ret'amt uwach Cristo.
62003007	Taq wilk'wa'l miya' iwib' chpam sokb'al, naqpla' chir kub'an jn suk'laj q'atb'altzij, june' suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios, jla' chpa' Cristo suk' uk'aslemal.
62003008	Naqpla' chir kub'an mak je' kpe ruk' tzel, mpa' jn tzel, re' umojomlaq ub'anik mak suk'te' re'chir xtiktajlaq uwach lew. Rimal k'ut mak xpe Uk'ijol Qajwal Dios chwach lew rechwa' kusach uwach uchak jn tzel.
62003009	Nejel naqpla' chir je' k'se'naq che Qajwal Dios, kmaken te'chik, mpa' ruk' Qajwal Dios alexnaqwa', kmaken te'chik mpa' ruk' Qajwal Dios k'se'naqwa'.
62003010	Chri'k'ut kik'utenwa' rilk'wa'l Dios, xoq'je' chri' kik'utenwa' rilk'wa'l tzel. Nejel naqpla' chir kub'ant utzil, xoq'je' kuloq'ojt rixlal ruk't Dios petnaqwa'.
62003011	Re'k'ut ri' utzij chir ito'om re'chir xmajtajlaq, chir rajwixik qaloq'oj qib' chqawach.
62003012	Jnamta chpa' xub'an Caín, chir xok tzel pranme' xukamsaj uchaq' ¿kuxk'ut rech xukamsaj uchaq'? Caín xukamsaj uchaq' mpa' re', uchak tzel ku'no, pumul uchaq' suk' uk'aslemal chwach Dios.
62003013	Ix wixlal, mtzaq ik'u'x chirwa wnaq chir ket'amt uwach Dios kixkitzlaj.
62003014	Qe'oj qet'am chir xjel laq chpam kamikal xojq'ax chpam jn k'aslemal, k'e qaloq'oj k'ut qaxlal, naq chir kuloq'ojt rixlal, june' jaqal chpam kamikal.
62003015	Nejel naq chir kritzlaj rixlal, june' ajkamsenel, iwet'am k'ut ix chir k'otnaq aj kamsenel kajaqe' ruk' re' jn k'aslemal chir k'istechik.
62003016	Chri' k'ut xqit'majwa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x, mpa' Re' xuya' uk'aslemal pe kamikal qamal oj, xoq'je' oj rajwixik qaya' qak'aslemal kimal ire'.
62003017	Pumul naq chir k'o umib'i'l rech uwach lew, kutuyuj rixlal chir k'o rajwixik che, pumul kutz'apij ranme' chwach, ¿kux ub'anik kajaqe' loq'b'al uk'u'x Dios ruk' june'?
62003018	Ix taq wilk'wa'l, mqaloq'oj qaxlal xa' ruk' qachi', xoq'je' xo'wt ruk' qaq', xa'ne' qaloq'oj ruk' chak ch'il ruk' saqlaj tzij.
62003019	Chri' k'ut qet'majwa' chir oj rech saqlaj tzij, qajaqb'a' k'utna qanme' chwach Qajwal Dios.
62003020	Tne' qanme' qoj uqasaj xe' mak, Qajwal Dios nimna ub'anik Re' chwach qanme', Re' nejel ret'am.
62003021	Loqlaj taq wixlal, wa qanme' qoj uya't xe' mak, k'o ukub'ul qak'u'x chwach Qajwal Dios.
62003022	Nejel kuxpla' qata' che, Re' kuya' chqe, mpa' qab'ono chpa' kub'ij utaqnik, xoq'je' qab'ono chir naq che k'amar chwach Re'.
62003023	Re'k'ut ri' utaqnik Re', chir qakojo' pub'i' Uk'ijol Re', Jesucristo, xoq'je' qaloq'oj qib' chqawach chpa' taqnik uyo'om chqe.
62003024	Naqpla' kub'ono chpa' kub'ij utaqnik Re', june' jaqal chirij Dios, xoq'je' Dios jaqal ruk' re', chri' k'ut qit'majwa' chir Re' jaqal quk', rimal Loq'laj Usantil chir uyo'om chqe.
62004001	Loq'laj taq wixlal, xa' mikoj kech nejel santil, xa'ne' china'na santil nab'e, wa je' ipetnaq ruk' Qajwal Dios; mpa' sub'laj che jo'slajtaq ajq'axal uyoloj Dios kib'in chwach lew.
62004002	Chri' k'ut kiwit'majwa', wa jn wnaq chir k'o Loq'laj Usantil Dios ruk', june' kub'ij chir Jesucristo xk'un chwach lew, xb'inek chpa' naq wnaq chir k'o raqan uq'ab', june' je' petnaq ruk' Dios.
62004003	Wa naq wnaq chir k'o santil ruk', pumul kuq'aljansajta chir Jesucristo je' petnaq ruk' Dios, jn santile' je't petnaq ruk' Dios; jn santile', re' usantil anticristo, re'k'ut june' chir ito'om ix chir kpetek, ruk'ut chinime' k'ochik chwach lew.
62004004	Taq wilk'wa'l, ix, je' ixpetnaq ruk' Dios, xixkon k'ut chkich'akik, mpa' nimna ub'anik Jun chir k'o iwuk' ix, chwach jun chir k'o chwach lew.
62004005	Nik'ije' chir k'ot usantil Dios kuk', xa' irech uwach lew, rechi' chir xa' rech uwach lew kib'ij, ruk'ut wnaq rech uwach lew utz kito'o.
62004006	Oj, oj rech Dios, naq chir ret'am uwach Dios kuta' qech, naq chir rext Dios kuta't qech, chri' k'ut qit'majwa' uwach jn santil rech saqlaj tzij, xoq'je' qit'majwa' uwach jn santil rech jo'sb'al tzij.
62004007	Loqlaj taq wixlal, qaloq'oj qib' chqawach, mpa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x je' petnaq ruk' Dios, nejel naqpla' chir kuloq'oj rijil utz'aq'at, june' ruk' Dios k'se'naqwa', xoq'je' ret'am uwach Dios.
62004008	Naqpla' chir kuloq'ojt rijil utzq'at, june' maja'na krit'maj uwach Dios, mpa' Dios loq'b'al k'u'x Re'.
62004009	Chri' k'ut xk'utenwa' chqawach jn loq'b'al k'u'x, mpa' Qajwal Dios xutaqlaq jun che Uk'ijol chwach lew, rech qoj k'se'wa' rimal Re'.
62004010	Re'k'ut ri' jn loq'b'al k'u'x, re'ta chir oj nab'e xqaloq'oj Dios, xa'ne' Re' nab'e xoj uloq'oj, xoq'je' xutaqlaq Uk'ijol pe kamikal rech tojb'al qamak.
62004011	Loq'lajtaq wixlal, wa jla' qaloq'xik xub'an Dios, xoq'je' oj rajwixik qaloq'oj qib' chqawach.
62004012	K'ot jnaqaq mijumul rilom uwach Dios, wa qaloq'oj qib' chqawach, Qajwal Dios jaqal quk', ruk'ut loq'b'al uk'u'x tz'aqatnaq chpam qak'aslemal.
62004013	Chri' k'ut qet'majwa' chir oj, oj jaqal chirij Re', xoq'je' Re' jaqal quk' oj, mpa' Re' uyo'om Loq'laj Usantil chqe.
62004014	Xqilk'ut oj, xoq'je' xqaq'aljansaj ub'ixik chir Re' Qajawxel xutaqlaq Uk'ijol, chkisolik wnaq chwach lew.
62004015	Nejel naq chir kuq'aljansaj ub'ixik chir Jesús Uk'ijol Dios, Dios jaqal ruk' re', xoq'je' re' jaqal ruk' Dios.
62004016	Ruk'ut oj xqit'maj k'ut, xoq'je' xojkojon k'ut chirij jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir Dios kuya' chqe, Dios loq'b'al k'u'x re', naq kajaqe' chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x, june' jaqal chirij Dios xoq'je' Dios jaqal ruk' re'.
62004017	Chri' k'ut xtz'aqatwa' jn loq'b'al k'u'x quk' oj, rechwa' kub'e' qak'u'x che jn q'ij rech q'ataj tzij, jla' chpa' ub'anik Re', xoq'je' jla' qab'anik oj chwach lew.
62004018	K'ot nab'alib' chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x, xa'ne' jn tz'aqatlaj loq'b'al k'u'x kresaj pnaq jla' jn nab'alib', mpa' jn nab'alib' k'o k'ajse'b'al wach chpam, rechi' wa k'o jnaq kuna' rib', june' maja' ktz'aq'at loq'b'al k'u'x ruk'.
62004019	Qe'oj qaloq'oj Dios, mpa' Dios nab'e xoj uloq'oj.
62004020	Wa k'o janaq kub'ij: "En kinloq'oj Dios," pumul kritzlaj rixlal, june' jo'sb'al tzij kub'ij, mpa' naq kuloq'ojt rixlal chir kril uwach, kux ub'anik kuloq'oj Dios chir krilt uwach.
62004021	Re'k'ut ri' utaqnik Dios chir k'o quk', naq chir kuloq'oj Dios, uloq'ojb'la' rixlal xoq'je'.
62005001	Nejel naqpla' kukojo chir Jesús Re' Cristo, june' ruk' Dios k'se'naqwa', naq kuloq'oj uqaw Qajwal Jesucristo, kuloq'oj xoq'je' Uk'ijol Dios.
62005002	Chri' k'ut qet'majwa', chir loq' k'eqil rilk'wa'l Qajwal Dios, chirwa loq' qil Qajwal Dios, xoq'je' qab'ano chapa' kub'ij utaqnik.
62005003	Re'k'ut ri' loq'b'al k'u'x che Dios, chir qakol utaqnik, mpa' utaqnik Dios alt uk'amik.
62005004	Mpa' nejel jnaq chir je k'se'naq ruk' Dios kowan chuch'akik uwach lew. Rek'ut ri' jn nimlaj ch'ak'nem, chir qakojb'al xuch'ak uwach lew.
62005005	¿Naq k'ut jun chir kowan chuch'akik uwach lew, xa'ne' re' jun chir kukojo chir Jesús, Re', Uk'ijol Dios?
62005006	Re'k'ut june' Jesucristo, chir xk'unek rimal ja' ch'il kik', pumul xo'wt ruk' ja', xa'ne' ruk' ja' ch'il kik', re'k'ut Loq'laj Santil kuq'aljansaj chirij, mpa' Loq'laj Santil, saqlaj tzij Re'.
62005007	Mpa' ixub' (3) kiq'aljansaj pkaj, Qajawxel, uk'u'x tzij, ch'il Loq'laj Santil, che ixub' kib'an xa' jun.
62005008	Xoq'je' ixub' (3) kiya' q'alsenem chwach lew: Loq'laj Santil, ch'il ja', ch'il kik', che ixub' (3) xa' janam kib'ij.
62005009	Wa qak'omo chir kux kiq'aljansaj chijab', nim k'utna ub'anik chir kux uq'aljansam Dios, mpa' re' ri' q'alsenem rech Dios, chir kux ub'im chirij Uk'ijol.
62005010	Naqpla' kukoj rech Uk'ijol Dios, uk'omomb'ik pranme' chir kux q'aljansam chirij Cristo, naq chir kukojt rech Dios, xub'an ajsoknel che Dios, mpa' kukojt jn q'alsenem chir uyo'om Dios chirij Uk'ijol.
62005011	Re'k'ut ri' jn q'alsenem, chir Dios xuya' jn k'aslemal chir mijumul k'istechik, re'k'ut jn k'aslemal la' chir k'o ruk' Uk'ijol.
62005012	Naq k'o Uk'ijol Dios ruk', k'o uk'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, naqpla' k'ot Uk'ijol Dios ruk', june' k'ot uk'aslemal chir mijumul k'istechik.
62005013	Re' ri' xintz'ib'ajb'ik chiw ix, ix chir kixkojon chirij ub'i' Uk'ijol Dios, rechwa' kiwet'maj chir k'o ik'aslemal chir mijumul k'istechik xoq'je' rech kixkojonna chirij Uk'ijol Dios.
62005014	Re'k'ut ri' jn uk'ub'ul qak'u'x chirij Re', chir kuxpla' qata' che chpa' rajwerem Re', Re' kuto'o.
62005015	Wa qet'am oj chir kuto'o kuxpla' qata che, qet'am chir qak'omo chir kux qato'om che.
62005016	Wa k'o jnaq kril naq rixlal chir tijen kmaknek, mak chir rext kamikal, chuta'b'la' puwi' chwach Qajwal Dios, ruk'ut Qajwal Dios kuya'na kik'aslemal ni'j chir kimaken ruk' mak chir rext kamikal. Mpa' k'o mak rech kamikal, pikiwi' nik'ije' kimb'ij en chir kta'taj.
62005017	Nejel jech'laj q'atb'altzij mak re', pumul k'o mak chir rext kamikal.
62005018	Qet'amk'ut chir nejel jnaq chir k'se'naq ruk' Dios kmakentechik, mpa' Re' Uk'ijol Dios kchajen rech, ruk'ut jn tzel kuchaptechik.
62005019	Qet'amk'ut chir oj, oj rech Dios, ruk'ut nejel wnaq chir kikojt rech Dios, je ik'o xe' uq'atb'altzij tzel.
62005020	Pumul oj qet'am chir Uk'ijol Dios xpetek, xk'un uya' qachomb'al rechwa' qet'majwa' uwach jn qatzijlaj Dios, ojk'o ruk' Jesucristo chir qas saqlaj tzij. Re'k'ut Re' jn qatzijlaj Dios xoq'je' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
62005021	Ixtaq wilk'wa'l, chichijij iwib' minimaj wachb'al. B'antajaq b'la'.
63001001	En, chir en nimaj wnaq chik, kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' che jn cho'omlaj chuchu', xoq'je' kintz'ib'aj chke ral, ire'k'ut chir loq' k'e wilo chpam jn saqlaj tzij, xo'wt en, xoq'je' nejel chir ket'amchik uwach jn saqlaj tzij.
63001002	Xa' rimal jn saqlaj tzij chir jaqal quk' xoq'je' kije'na quk' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
63001003	Jn loq'laj ritzil anme', xoq'je' jn loq'laj k'axk'ab'al k'u'x, xoq'je' jn uxunem rech anme' chir petnaq ruk' Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' petnaq ruk' Jesucristo, chir Uk'ijol Dios, kojoqb'la' iwuk' chpam jn saqlaj tzij xoq'je' chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x.
63001004	Sub'laj xinki'ktek mpa' xinraq jujun chke awal chir tijen kib'in chpam saqlaj tzij, jla' chpa' taqnik chir xuya' Qajwal Dios chqe.
63001005	Ruk'ut chinime' kinta' jn toq'ob' chaw at nan, reta chir kintz'ib'aj b'ik jn k'ak' taqnik chaw, xa'ne' re' jun chir yo'om knaq chqe re'chir xmajtajlaq, chir rajwixik qaloq'oj qib' chqawach.
63001006	Re'k'ut ri' jn loq'b'al k'u'x, chir qojb'inaq chpa' kub'ij utaqnik, re'k'ut ri' jn taqneme': Chir kixb'inaq chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x, jla' chpa' ito'omlaq ix re'chir xmajtajlaq.
63001007	Mpa' sub'laj che ajb'i'nel sokb'al tzij xyel laq chwach lew, chir kiq'aljansajta chir Jesucristo xk'un chwach lew chpa' naq chij chir k'o utyo'jil xoq'je' k'o ub'aqil. Naq chir jri' ku'no, re'k'ut jn ajsoknel xoq'je' re' anticristo.
63001008	Chpa' naq che' chir kuya' uwach, pumul xa' ksach uwach che jla', chiwula' iwib' ix piwechwa', rechwa' kisacht uwach ichak, xa'ne' chir tz'q'at rijil uk'ixel ichak kik'amo.
63001009	Naq kusach ub'ej xoq'je' kjaqe't chpam jn tyojnik rech Cristo, k'ot Dios ruk', naq chir kajaqe' chpam jn tyojnik rech Cristo, june' k'o Dios ruk', xoq'je' k'o Uk'ijol Dios ruk'.
63001010	Wa k'o jnaq k'un iwuk', pumul re't jn tyojneme' kuya' chiw, mik'uluj piwichoj xoq'je' miya' jn utzlaj petb'al che.
63001011	Mpa' naq chir kub'ij che june': "Utz apetik," re' jun ruk' chub'anik ni'j tzeltaq uchak.
63001012	K'o sub'laj yoloj kintz'ib'aj b'ik chiw, pumul kwajtena chinime' utz'ib'xik chpam wuj ch'il tz'ajb'al, mpa' wiyi'em b'enem iwuk' rechwa' qojyolow chqawach, rechwa' ktz'aq'at qaki'kte'mal.
63001013	Kitaqb'ik ritzil awach ral achaq', jun chir cho'om. B'antajaq b'la'.
64001001	En, chir en nimaj wnaq kintz'ib'aj jn wuje' che Gayo, loq'laj qaxlal, re'k'ut chir loq' kwil psaqlaj tzij.
64001002	Loq'laj wixlal, re' uriyb'al wanme' en, chir at karaq sub'laj che utzil, che nejel chpa'kux, xoq'je' chir k'ot ya'b'il pak'aslemal, jla' chpa' awanme' sub'laj uroqom utzil.
64001003	Mpa' sub'laj xinki'kitek re'chir xik'un qaxlal chir xkiq'aljansaj jn saqlaj tzij, xoq'je' chir xa' jun atk'owa' chpam jn saqlaj tzij.
64001004	K'ot jnaqchik nimlaj enki'kte'mal chwach june', chir kinto'o chir wilk'wa'l tijen kib'in chpam jn saqlaj tzij.
64001005	Loq'laj wixlal, at, xa' jun ayo'omwa' akojb'al re'chir k'e animaj qaxlal xoq'je' re'chir k'e animaj qaxlal chir kipe che jnchik tilimit.
64001006	Xkiq'aljansaj uyolik jn loq'b'al k'u'x chir k'o awuk', chikiwach jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel, utzk'ut ka'no chir k'e ato', rechwa' kitaqej kib'ej chir kimojom, mpa' re' la' k'amer chwach Qajwal Dios.
64001007	Mpa' ire' xyelb'ik rimal uloq'xik ub'i' Qajwal Jesús, k'ot xkik'am ire' chke wnaq chir it aj Israel.
64001008	Rechi' chir rajwixik k'e qato' ire', qaya' kiwarb'al, rechwa' qojto'n ruk' jn saqlaj tzij.
64001009	En xintz'ib'aj b'ik jun wuj chke jun ch'ob' che qaxlal chirij Qajwal Jesucristo, pumul Diótrefes chir kuk'ul uk'u'x taqnem pikiwi' ajkojnel, re' krajt kuk'am qaq'atb'altzij.
64001010	Rechi', wa kimb'e iwuk', kinnatajna che re' ni'j uchak chir tijen ku'no chir tijen kub'ij molomtaq tzij ch'il sokb'altaq tzij chiqij, pumul kub'e't uk'u'x ruk' ri', xoq'je' kyuk'ulujt qaxlal, xoq'je' chirwa k'o jnaq kraj kyuk'uluj, re' ke uq'atuj, xoq'je' k'eresajb'ik chikixo'l jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel.
64001011	Loq'laj wixlal, mab'an awech chpa' kub'an jn qaxlale', xa'ne' b'ana' chir kux utzil. Naq kub'an utzil, june' rech Dios. Naq kub'an k'ax, june' rilomt uwach Dios.
64001012	Kinejel utz uq'aljensesik Demetrio xki'no, xoq'je' utzij Qajwal Dios jla' kch'a'w chirij, xoq'je' oj jla' qab'ij chirij Demetrio. Iwet'amk'ut ix chir jn q'alsenem chir qaya' oj, re' saqlaj tzij.
64001013	K'ona k'iy chir kwaj kintz'ib'aj chaw, pumul kwajt kintz'ib'ajb'ik chinime' ruk' wuj ch'il tz'ib'al.
64001014	Mpa' re' kwaj en, kwul awach cha'nim jla' qojyolow chqawach.
64001015	Re't b'la' jn uxunem rech anme' kije' awuk'. Kiya' pnaq ritzil awach ni'j qaxlal chir ijenk'isik quk', xoq'je' b'ana' toq'ob' ya' pnaq ritzil kiwach ptaq kijujnal qaxlal chir ijen k'isik' quk'. B'antajaq b'la'.
65001001	En Judas, jaqlel ajnimnel rech Jesucristo, en uchaq' Santiago, kintz'i'b'aj jn wuje' chiw ix, ix chir ix loq', xoq'je' ix sik'im rimal Qajwal Dios chir Qaqaw, xoq'je' ixkoltel rimal Qajwal Jesucristo.
65001002	Kiyaqb'la' iwuk' ix jn k'axb'al k'u'x ch'il jn uxunem rech anme', ch'il jn loq'b'al uk'u'x Qajwal Dios.
65001003	Loq'laj taq wixlal, sub'laj enkuwim itz'ib'xikb'ik' chirij jn solb'alqib' chir xa' janam ub'anik, xoq'je' rajwixik chinwach en chinime' itz'ib'xikb'ik, rech kinta' jn toq'ob' chiwach, rechwa' kikoj ichoq'ab' chuchajxik jn kojb'al chir xya' chke tyoxtaq ajkojnel.
65001004	Mpa' ik'o ni'j chijab' chir ruk' jo'sb'altaq tzij xyok chixo'l, ire' k'ut chir sub'laj jer tz'ib'tal knaq chikij, chir ire' irech nimlaj k'ax, itzeltaq chijab' chir kik'ex jn loq'laj ritzil ranme' Qajwal Dios chwach jn k'axlaj tzq'aptejem, xoq'je' kiq'aljansajta chir Qajwal Dios ch'il Jesucristo, ire' ijun che Dios.
65001005	Tne' ix iwet'amchik, pumul kwaj en kinna'taj chiw chir Qajwal Dios, nab'e xye resajlaq wnaq aj Israel pujuyb'al Egipto. Tere' xusach kiwach naq chir xkikojt rech.
65001006	Xoq'je' taqo'n rech kaj chir utzt xki'no, xa'ne' xkitakb'a' knaq kichoj, ruk'ut Qajwal Dios xyutz'apij pche' chir qu'm upam chb'e q'ij chb'e saq, rechwa' kub'an nimlaj q'ataj tzij pikiwi' che jn uk'isb'al q'ij.
65001007	Xoq'je' chpa' tilimit Sodoma, ch'il tilimit Gomorra, xoq'je' tilimit chir isutennaq chikij ire' xkijach kib' chpam tzeltaq mak rech tyo'jil, xoq'je' xujalchik xki'no, jn chij xmaken chirij tyo'jil ruk' jnchik chij. Rechi' xkitij k'ax re'chir xqajlaq q'a' pikiwi', xyo'kses k'ut che k'utumb'al chikiwach nejel wnaq, chir ik'o pk'axk'ol chpam jn q'a' chir mijumul kchupek.
65001008	Pumul xo'wt ri', xoq'je' ni'j chijab'la' i'ajb'anal taq wich'ik, kitz'ilib'saj kityo'jil, kitzlaj uwach uq'atb'altzij Qajwal Dios xoq'je' kib'ij wastzij che nimlaj utaqnem Qajwal Dios.
65001009	Pumul Miguel chir nimlaj utaqo'n kaj re'chir kch'ojen ruk' jn tzel, xoq'je' xib'e k'elajtzij chirij utyo'jil Moisés, pumul Miguel xub'ant anme' chuq'atik tzij puwi', xo'w xub'ij che: "Re' Qajwal Dios ktujek'o."
65001010	Pumul ni'j chijab'e' kib'ij wastzij chirij chir kux ket'amt uwach, ruk'ut chir kux ket'am uwach, ire' kib'ono chpa' kib'an awaj chir ket'am pe kechwa', pumul xa' rech kamseb'al kech.
65001011	¡K'ax kech, ni'j chijab' la'! Mpa' xkik'am b'ej chir xuk'am Caín jer, chir xukamsaj uchaq', xoq'je' xa' rimal uch'akik sub'laj pwaq jla' xki'no chpa' xub'an Balaam jer, xoq'je' jla' xki'no chpa' xub'an Coré jer chir xuya' rib' pe kamikal rimal utakil.
65001012	Kixb'al kilik ni'j chijab' la' chpam inimq'ij rech loq'b'al k'u'x chir kik'uluj, k'ot mejb'al ib' kuk'. I'ajyuq' chir xo'w kib' ire' kichijij, jla' kib'anik chpa' sutz' chir k'ot ja' kik'omomlaq, chir kicharex b'ik rimal kiq'i', xoq'je' jla' kib'anik chpa' che' chir kiwachent puq'ijal, ikamnaq chik che uka'mul, xoq'je' chpa' naq che' chir b'uqum ruk' nejel ra'.
65001013	Janam kib'anik chpa' urep ja' rech mar chir kwatzwek, kwatzew k'ut kik'ix ire', xoq'je' janam kib'anik chpa' ch'imil chir xkisach kib'ej, chke ire' k'ut xtoswa' jn nimlaj qu'mq'ab' rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
65001014	Xoq'je' Enoc, chir uwuq xe'na'al chirij Adán, xuya' na'tb'al pub'i' Qajwal Dios chikij ni'j wnaqe', xub'ij: "¡Chita'much! Chir kpe Qaqjaw kuk' sub'laj che mil utaqo'n kaj.
65001015	Rech k'un uq'ata' tzij pikiwi' kinejel wnaq, xoq'je' k'un upaxij kanme' kinejel tzeltaq wnaq, chirij kichak rech tzeltaq mak, xoq'je' chirij wastaq tzij chir xich'a'w che Qajwal Dios."
65001016	Ni'j wnaqla' xa' kijek'chi'nek, xoq'je' iwich', xo'w kitzukuj ub'anik tzeltaq kiriyb'al, sub'laj kinimersaj kib' ruk' kiyoloj, kiraq ub'ixik utzlajtaq yoloj rechwa' k'o kesaj che jnchik.
65001017	Pumul ix wixlal, chir loq' kix wilo, k'unaq pik'u'x ni'j yoloj chir xkib'ij knaq Apóstoles rech Qajwal Jesucristo.
65001018	Xkib'ij k'ut ire': "Chir che uk'isb'altaq q'ij kipena wnaq chir i'aj esalwach, chir kib'in ruk' tzeltaq kiriyb'al."
65001019	Rek'ut nik'ije' chir kijach kiwach qaxlal, kichomen xo'w chirij uchpa'ku'x uwach lew, k'ot Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios kuk'.
65001020	Pumul ix wixlal, chir loq' kix wilo, chikub'a' iwib' puwi' jn tyoxlaj kojb'al, chib'ij ich'awem chwach Dios pe Loq'laj Santil.
65001021	Kixjoqo'q chpam jn loq'b'al k'u'x rech Qajwal Dios, chiwiyi'ej jn k'axb'al uk'u'x Qajwal Jesucristo, tne' kumajt chiw, chir kuya' jn k'aslemal rech chb'e q'ij chb'e saq.
65001022	Chitoq'ob'saj kiwach qaxlal chir xa't jun k'owa' kikojb'al.
65001023	Che isolo' pnaq ni'jchik, che ichapa' pnaq pa'nim rechwa' kitzaqt paq'a', ruk'ut chke ni'jchik k'axk'ab'aq ik'u'x ruk' nab'alib', pumul chichijij iwib', xoq'je' chiwitzlaj kiq'u' chir k'o chikij re'chir kimaken ruk' kityo'jil.
65001024	Re'k'ut Qajwal Dios chir xa' Jun che Dios chir k'o nimlaj kownem ruk', kowan chqakolik rechwa' qojqajt chpam mak, rech kjuk'utwa' ruk' ki'kte'mal chwach unimal uq'ij, chir saqlo'loj chik qak'aslemal.
65001025	Xo'w che Jun chir k'o loq'laj chomb'al ruk', xoq'je' jun che Dios, Ajsolel qech, Qajwal Jesucristo, rech Re' jn unimal q'ij, jn nimlaj kownem, ch'il nimlaj choq'ab' chinime' xoq'je' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
66001001	Re' ri' q'alsenem rech Jesucristo, chir xya' che rimal Dios, rechwa' kuk'ut chikiwach jaqlel ajnimnel rech, chir kux rajwixik q'axna cha'nim, xa'k'ut jla' xuq'aljansaj, xutaqlaq utaqo'n kaj chuk'utik chwach jaqlel utaqo'n chir Juan ub'i'.
66001002	Re'k'ut Juan xuq'aljansaj uyoloj Qajwal Dios xoq'je' xuq'aljansaj uyoloj Cristo xoq'je' xuq'aljansaj nejel chir kux rilom.
66001003	Sub'laj utz rech naq chir kunik'ij uwach wuj xoq'je' sub'laj utz kech naq chir kita' ruk' kixikin yoloj rech Dios chir xuq'axaj Loq'laj Santil, xoq'je' kikojo chir kux tz'ib'tal chpam, mpa' xqetlaq uq'ijal ub'antejik.
66001004	En, Juan kintz'ib'aj b'ik jun wuje' chke wuqub' (7) ch'ob' chke ajkojnel chir ik'o pujuyb'al Asia, chik'ama'b'la' jn ritzil anme' ch'il jn uxunem rech anme' rech jun chir Re' chinime', xoq'je' Re' nab'e knaq, xoq'je' Re' chir kpena, xoq'je' kech wuqub' (7) che santil chir ik'o chwach loq'laj ukub'ulb'al.
66001005	Xoq'je' rech Jesucristo jn testig chir xa' jun k'owa' ranme', chir Re' nab'e xk'astaj chikixo'l kamnaqib', xoq'je' k'o uq'atb'altzij pikiwi' nimaqtaq ajtaqnel rech uwach lew. Re'k'ut Cristo chir loq' xoj rilo xoq'je' xjutzqapsaj che qamak ruk' ukik'el.
66001006	Xub'an k'ut chqe oj jn loq'laj taqnem, xoq'je' xub'an ajnimnel chpam richoj Qajwal Dios chqe rech uDios chir Uqaw, rech k'ut Re' jn unimal q'ij xoq'je' jn nimlaj kownem chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'.
66001007	Chiwla'much, Qajwal Jesucristo kpe pe sutz, kinejel wnaq kilo, xoq'je' kil ni'j wnaq chir xikamsen rech, kinejel tilimit rech uwach lew kib'isnek xoq'je' kyoq' chirij. B'antajaq b'la'.
66001008	En, En jn Alfa xoq'je' En jn Omega, majb'al rech xoq'je' k'isb'al rech, xcha' Qajwal Dios, jun chir Re' chinime', xoq'je' rech nab'e knaq, xoq'je' Re'k'ut chir kpena, jun chir k'o nejel choq'ab' ruk'.
66001009	En Juan, chir en iwixlal chirij kojb'al, xoq'je' en jun iwuk' che jn nimlaj k'ax, xoq'je' en jun iwuk' che jn nimlaj uq'atb'altzij, xoq'je' en jun iwuk' chpam jn kuyb'ul k'u'x chirij Jesús, xink'un che jn chaqab' jib' chir k'o pe mar, Patmos ub'i', xa' rimal uyoloj Qaqjaw xoq'je' xa' rimal uq'aljensik Jesús.
66001010	Enk'o pe Loq'laj Santil pe jn q'ij rech Qaqjaw, xinta' jn nimlaj ch'a'wem chuwij kawulpa' uch'ab'al naq su'.
66001011	Kub'ij k'ut: En, En jn Alfa xoq'je' En jn Omega, En, En nab'e xoq'je' En uk'isb'al. Tz'ib'aj chwach jn wuj kux kawulo, taqa'b'ik kuk' wuqub' (7) ch'ob' chke ajkojnel chir ik'o pujuyb'al Asia, che jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Éfeso, che jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Esmirna, che jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Pérgamo, che jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Tiatira, che jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Sardis, che jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Filadelfia, ch'il jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Laodicea.
66001012	Xinka'y k'ut chuwij rech kintuyuj naq kch'a'wek, xwil wuqub' (7) chik'b'al kindele chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq.
66001013	Chikixo'l wuqub' (7) chik'b'al kindele, xwilk'ut jun chir kawulpa' Uk'ijol Chij chir suk'te' ko'pen uq'u' chuqul raqan, ukojom jn pas chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq.
66001014	Saqlo'loj nejel uwi' chpa' lana xoq'je' chpa' chuntew, ruk'ut b'aq'wach jla' chpa' urep q'a'.
66001015	Ruk'ut raqan kpoqpetek chpa' ch'ich' bronce, chir b'onom ch'aj che chpam jorn, ruk'ut uch'ab'al jla' chpa' jn nimlaj ja' chir kchojnek.
66001016	K'ok'ut puse'b'al uq'ab' wuqub' (7) ch'imil, kel k'utlaq puchi' jn michit jutz'utz' uwi' chir kyeb' (2) praj rey, uplaj jla' chpa' q'ij chir kpoq'petek re'chir kub'e' uchoq'ab'.
66001017	Re'chir xwilo, xintzaq chwach chpa' naq kamnaq, pumul Re' xuya' use'b'al uq'ab' pinwi' xub'ij chwe: Maxij awib', En, En nab'e xoq'je' En, uk'isb'al.
66001018	En, chir Enk'asel nab'e knaq xoq'je' En chir xinkamna, pumul chinime' Enk'aslek suk'te' chb'e q'ij chb'e saq. B'antajaq b'la'. Wuk' En, k'owa' jn lawe rech kamikal xoq'je' jn lawe rech k'ixk'ol.
66001019	Rimal ri' tz'ib'aj chir kux xawulo, xoq'je' tz'ib'aj chir kux k'o chinime', xoq'je' kux kpena chqawach.
66001020	Re'k'ut ri' jn owam ajwerem rech wuqub' (7) ch'imil chir xawulo chir k'o puse'b'al Enq'ab' xoq'je' wuqub' (7) chik'b'al kindele chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq, wuqub' (7) ch'imil, kuk'ut taqo'n rech kaj kech wuqub' (7) ch'ob' che ajkojnel, ruk'ut wuqub' (7) chik'b'al kindele kuk'ut wuqub' (7) ch'ob' ajkojnel chirij Qajwal Jesucristo.
66002001	Tz'ib'aj che taqo'n kech jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Éfeso: "Jri' kub'ij jun chir k'o wuqub' (7) ch'imil puse'b'al uq'ab', chir kb'in chikixo'l wuqub' (7) chik'b'al kindele chir b'onom ruk' q'an pwaq.
66002002	Wet'am En, nejel achak chir ab'onom, xoq'je' wet'am jn k'axlaj achak ch'il jn kuyb'ul ak'u'x, wet'am xoq'je' chir kach'ijt ni'j tzeltaq wnaq, xoq'je' wet'am chir apojom kichak ni'j chir kikojkib' che Apóstoles, pumul it Apóstoles, xoq'je' xye arqo chir xa' kijo'snek.
66002003	Wet'am chir sub'laj atijom k'ax, xoq'je' wet'am chir k'o kuyb'ul ak'u'x, xoq'je' sub'laj akojom achoq'ab' rimal chir kaloq'oj Emb'i', xoq'je' chir ab'onomt tuqa'r.
66002004	"Pumul k'o jun kch'a'n chawij chir xaxutuj knaq jun chir xaloq'oj nab'e.
66002005	Rechi' na'tjaq chaw, jalchi' xat tz'aqwa' chi', tzalq'amij awanme', kat tzaljaq ruk' Qaqjaw; b'ana' chir kux xamaj ub'anik nab'e knaq, wa kanta kimpe awuk', kwesaj chik'b'al akandele puluwar chirwa atzalq'amint awanme'.
66002006	Pumul re' ri' utz kwil En, chir kux tijen ka'no, chir kawitzlaj kichak aj Nicolaítas, En xoq'je' kwitzlaj.
66002007	"Naq k'o uxikin, chuta'b'la' kux kub'ij Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios chke ch'ob' ajkojnel chirij Qajwal Jesucristo. Naq kch'aknek kinya' che chir kutij uwach jn che' rech k'aslemal chir k'o punik'jal paraíso rech Qajwal Dios."
66002008	Tz'ib'aj xoq'je' che taqo'n kech jn ch'ob' che ajkojnel chir ik'o Esmirna: "Jri' kub'ij Jun chir nab'e xoq'je' uk'isb'al, Jun chir xkamek pumul xwa'laj chikixo'l kamnaqib'.
66002009	En wet'am achak xoq'je' wet'am jn nimlaj q'oxom chir aq'axam, xoq'je' wet'am amub'a'il tne' qatzij chir k'o amib'i'l, wet'am xoq'je' chir katkiyoq' naq chir kikojkib' che judíos, pumul it judíos xa'ne' i'uq'ab' richoj tzel.
66002010	Maxij awib' che k'ax chir kaq'axajna. Wula'much mpa' jn tzel kukojna pche' jujun chiw ix, rechwa' chir iwenejel kixpajna, kitijk'ut nimlaj q'oxom che lajuj (10) q'ij. B'ana'b'la' jun che akojb'al suk'te' che akamikal, kinya'na jn acorona chaw chir k'istechik.
66002011	"Naq chir k'o uxikin, chuta'b'la' chir kux kub'ij Loq'laj Usantil Qajwal Dios che jn ch'ob' chke ajkojnel chirij Qajwal Jesucristo. Naq chir kch'aknek k'otnaq k'ax rech ukab' (2) kamikal kuroqo."
66002012	Tz'ib'aj xoq'je' che taqo'n kech jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel rech Pérgamo jri' kub'ij: "Jun chir k'o jn michit jutz'utz' uwi' xoq'je' ka'praj rey.
66002013	En wet'am achak xoq'je' wet'am jalchi' k'owa' awuchoj chi', je k'o awuchoj tla' chpa' k'owa' nimlaj ukub'ulb'al tzel, pumul akojom ach'oq'ab' at taran chuwij, ayo'om teknaq kojnem chuwij, xa'tne' che q'ij re'chir xkamses Antipas, jun chir knuq'aljansaj tla' chpa' jaq'alwa' jn tzel.
66002014	"Pumul k'o wuk' En, kyeb'xub' chpa'kux chir kch'a'n chawij mpa' ik'o awuk' ni'j wnaq chir kajta kiya' knaq jn tyojnem rech Balaam, re'k'ut Balaam chir xutaqchi'j Balac chir xub'an chke wnaq aj Israel chir kimaknek, xyutaqchi'j chutijik tib'lil chir q'axamchik chikiwach wachb'al xoq'je' xub'an chke chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil.
66002015	Xoq'je' ik'o ni'j wnaq awuk' chir kajt kiya' knaq jn tyojnem kech ni'j chir kb'ix Nicolaítas chke, chir jn tyojnemla' kwitzlaj En.
66002016	Rechi', chir tzalq'amij awanme', kat tzaljaq wuk', mpa' wa kat tzalajt wuk' kimpena awuk' pa'nim, kinch'ojen kuk', ruk' jn michit rech Enchi'.
66002017	"Naqpla' k'o uxikin chuta'b'la' chir kux kub'ij Loq'laj Santil che jn ch'ob' ajkojnel. Naq chir kch'aknek kinya'na che chir kutij jn maná chir owtelek, xoq'je' kinya'na jn k'al saq b'aj che chir tz'ib'tal jn k'ak' b'i' chwach, chir k'ot jnaq ret'am uwach, xo'w naq chir k'amaw rech."
66002018	Tz'ib'aj xoq'je' che taqo'n kech jun ch'ob' che ajkojnel rech Tiatira: "Re' ri' kub'ij Uk'ijol Qaqjaw, Jun chir ub'aq'wach janam chpa' q'a' chir kjulwek, ruk'ut raqan janam chpa' q'an ch'ich' chir kpoqpetek.
66002019	En wet'am kux nejel ka'no, xoq'je' wet'am loq'b'al ak'u'x, wet'am akojb'al, xoq'je' wet'am animnik, wet'am xoq'je' kuyb'ul ak'u'x, wet'am xoq'je' achak chir kab'anna, nimna chwach nab'etaq chak chir xa'no.
66002020	"Pumul k'o jun chir kch'a'n chawij, chir kaya' utem jn xaq chir Jesabel ub'i', chir kukoj rib' che ajq'axal uyoloj Dios, chir k'e utyojij xoq'je' kyumin jaqlel ajnimnel wech chub'anik mak rech tyo'jil xoq'je' kyuch'ik'mij chutijik tib'lil chir q'axnaqchik chikiwach wachb'al.
66002021	En xinya' sub'laj q'ij che rechwa' kutzalq'amij ranme', pumul re' krajt kuk'ex ranme' rechwa' kuya' knaq jn mak chirij tyo'jil.
66002022	Wula'much chir jn xaqla' kintzaq chu' uch'at, ruk'ut naq chir kimaken chirij tyo'jil ruk' re', kikije' chpam jn nimlaj k'ax, xo'w chirwa kitzalq'amij kanme' kiya'qan jn tzel uchak.
66002023	Ruk'ut ni'j ral jn xaqe' k'e Ensokoj suk'te' kikamna, kit'maj k'ut nejel ch'ob' che ajkojnel, chir En wet'am kux k'o pe kanme', xoq'je' kux k'o pe kichomb'al wnaq, kinya' k'utna pijujnal chpa' ichak.
66002024	Pumul chiw ix xoq'je' chke ni'jchik chir ik'o Tiatira, chke ni'jchik chir k'ot jn tyojnemla' kuk', chir ket'amt uwach jn owam chomnik rech jn tzel, kimb'ij chiw chir kintzaqt sub'laj eqa'n chikij,
66002025	pumul chikolo' chir kux k'o iwuk' suk'te' kimpena.
